ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: The teddy bear Lobotomite returns... my teddy bear. How can I assist in relieving your curiosity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 泰迪熊无脑人回来了…我的泰迪熊。我要做什么才能帮着你减轻好奇心呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite who SAVED us! Hello.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是救了我们的那个无脑人！ 你好啊。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *So was Mobius as twisted as he looked in person? Can't believe you entered the Forbidden Zone and lived. None of us can.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *莫比乌斯是否真的有那么扭曲？我简直不敢相信你进入了禁区还能活着回来。我们之中没人能做到。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_greeting_000142c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Any new research?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *有什么新的研究？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_greeting_000142c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THANK YOU FOR WHAT YOU HAVE DONE. THE HELPING, THAT IS. WE LIKE THAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你为我们做的事情。那份帮助，我们对此非常欣喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I FEEL AN ODD EMOTION... PLATITUDE? ATTITUDE? NO, WAIT. GRATITUDE, THAT'S IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感受到一种奇怪的情感…单调？态度？不，等等。是感谢，对，就是它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142bc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE ARE LABORING AWAY SCIENTIFICALLY ON YOUR BEHALF. TOILLESS RESEARCHERS THAT IS WHAT WE ARE. TOIL. TOIL. TOIL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一直在为你科学地工作。我们就是轻松快活的研究员。我们要继续辛勤工作，辛勤，辛勤，辛勤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE LOBOTOMITE RETURNS. OUR LOBOTOMITE. HAS DR. MOBIUS BEEN DENOMINATORED INTO SCRAP METAL AND VOICE MODULE PARTS AS WE HOPED?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人回来了。我们的无脑人。莫比乌斯博士是否已经如我们所愿，碎成废金属和语音模组了呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Klein AWAITS! As do we all.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -克莱因正等着！我们所有人都是。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The LOBOTOMITE animal before me! What other terrifying terrors will plague us in our quest for knowledge? Communists? Communist ANIMALS, perhaps?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -站在我面前的无脑动物啊！在我们寻求知识的过程中，还有什么可怕的恐怖会困扰我们？共产主义者？也许是共产动物？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00013515_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Be warned, attempt to propaganda ME, I will shriek as a frightened babe, calling loyal Cyberdogs to my aid. Do you comprehend, Commie animal?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我警告你，别试图向我宣传什么，我将会像个惊恐的婴儿那样哭叫，呼叫忠诚的赛博犬来帮助我。明白了么，共产动物？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00013515_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Thanks SO much for sparing Gabe - I know he's really QUITE killable, which is why I had to AUGMENT him.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -非常感谢你能饶了加布。我知道他真的很可能被杀死，这就是为什么我需要不断强化他。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00012cde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But you needed NONE of that. You're QUITE elusive - or fleet-footed. More so than our old mailman - HE didn't get far before Gabe caught him.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -但是你不需要。你很难被抓住，或者说跑的非常快。甚至比我们以前的老邮差还快。他那时还没跑多远就被加布追上了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00012cde_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -SO - you put down Gabe. Thank you - a scamp, but really, his highly-augmented combat programming could have proved meddlesome.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那么，你放倒了加布。谢谢你，他是个小混蛋，但是真的，加布那高度增强的战斗程序确实很不好对付。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00012cdf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -In any event... thank you for putting him down. One LESS test subject to catalogue and sort - clearly a FAILURE of doggie cybo-engineering.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不管怎么说…感谢你放倒了他。这样就少了一个要去编目和归类的实验体。显而易见，这是一个犬类机器化工程的失败品。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00012cdf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The LOBOTOMITE returns! What insidious plan can it have brewing in its horrid mind? What Commie anti-American propaganda will it spew?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -无脑人回来了！他可怕的脑袋里在酝酿着什么阴险的计划呢？又会进行什么反美共产宣传？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00013516_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I see you and your Brain reached a compromise. How pleasant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我发现你和你的大脑达成一致了。真是可喜可贺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016058_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hypothesize after the indignant frequencies my receptors had... recepted, such a partnership-based conclusion would be... low on the "likely" scale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大脑刚才发出的频率是如此愤愤不平，假设我的接收器接收到那样的频率，还能成为同伴的可能性…就很低了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016058_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm? Y... oh... hello there. Eh... you... are there, aren't you? Forgive my confusion, so hard to tell these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？伊…呃…你好啊。呃…你…在那里，不是吗？原谅我的混乱，这些单词老害我口胡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000402d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem familiar, somehow. I'm guessing... eh... you're here for your brain, perhaps? It's just up there. Such a nice brain, young, very bright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很眼熟，怎么说呢。我猜…呃…你来这，大概是为了你的大脑，是吗？它就在那边。多么棒的大脑，既年轻，又非常聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000402d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little hard to see you, can you walk into my left... er, right FOV cone? Ah, that's it, you're coming into focus nicely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想看到你有点困难，能不能走到我的左…呃，你的右边？啊，就是那里，这下你的图像清晰多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000402d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, go on! You've wasted enough of my valuable time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续，继续！你已经浪费我足够多的宝贵时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00015b6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well? What are you waiting for? Get moving and leave me in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧？你在等什么呢？赶快走，让我一个人静一静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00015b71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No time to waste! Go deal with the Think Tank!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有时间给你浪费了！快去处理那些思想体！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00015b6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Don't worry about me. We can talk more when we're both back at the Sink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！不用担心我。我们都回到汇聚节点以后，可以接着聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00015b6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bark.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <狗叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03x8d_greeting_0001096f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm... You took care of them brains pretty good, baby. Nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…你好好关照过那堆大脑了嘛。宝贝。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016031_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm having the most peculiar feeling of déjà vu right now. That's French, for... eh... well, uh... déjà vu, I believe. Have we met before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我有种非常奇特的Deja Vu的感觉。那是法语…呃…啊…“似曾相识”，应该是这个意思。我们以前见过么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000402e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always nice to see you, baby. Bring me any new plants from outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 见到你总是令人高兴，宝贝儿。从外边给我带来了什么新植物么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016032_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh... oh yeah, baby, feels good to be on-line again! Yeah, all circuits on-line... ready to receive your seed.
ESP.TRADUIT: >哦…哦耶，宝贝儿，再次上线的感觉真好！耶，所有电路已连接…我准备好接受你的种子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should really see Dr. Klein. We're all awaiting the results of your experiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真应该去见见克莱因博士。我们都在等着你的实验结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are an unusual specimen to so boldly... walk... into the mighty expanse of the Think Tank. Fearless and proud as a teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个独特的样本，如此大胆…居然敢走到…强大的思想体面前。像只泰迪熊一样无畏和骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f62f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between the extraction of their higher reasoning abilities and urination-inducing fear, most Lobotomites dare not approach us. Let alone speak to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些被抽离了理智，一害怕就到处排泄的无脑人，大多数都不敢靠近我们，更别说和我们说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f62f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yet you have no such fear, facing me, epidermis flushed with blood, plasma running molten beneath, your face contorting with... muscular expression.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你站在我面前，没有丝毫害怕。哦，你的皮肤充满血色，血浆在底下滚滚流淌，你的脸受肌肉控制，产生各种表情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f62f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you... indulge me? Say a... few words? Face towards the monitors, please... so that I might record it... for further examination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能…满足我吗？就说…几句话？对着我的监视器说，麻烦你了…那样我才能记录下来…然后更深入地研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f62f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you return, as curious as a teddy bear. Are you stuck in a looping gesture of greeting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了，像泰迪熊一样好奇。你陷入了代表问好的循环姿势里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f630_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein's an impatient man, wouldn't keep him waiting.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *克莱因可是个没耐心的人，别让他等太久。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_greeting_000142c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Breaking News: Talking Lobotomite arrives in Think Tank. Its purpose? Unknown. Undefinable. Its presence here? Unpossible.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *重大新闻：会讲话的无脑人抵达智库。它的目的？不清楚，无法理解。它在这里出现的可能性？不可能。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_greeting_0000f62d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT ARE YOU DOING BACK? MOBIUS' THREATS PERSIST! WORSE, HE'S FILLING UP OUR TRANSMISSION STORAGE HOLOTAPE TO CAPACITY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来做什么？莫比乌斯的威胁仍然存在！更糟糕的是，他要将我们存储广播磁带的空间占满了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000142bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I THOUGHT I HEARD THE PACIFICATION FIELD KICK IN. ALL RIGHT, SHHH. NOBODY. MOVE. I'LL HANDLE THIS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我听着像是有人进入了平静场…没错，嘘。没人。都过来。我会处理这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000030b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BE WARNED, INTRUDER! YOU ARE IN THE PRESENCE OF THE MIGHTY THINK TANK OF BIG MT, THE COLLECTIVE GENIUSES OF... WE...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：警告，入侵者！你正面对着强大的大山脉思想体，智慧的集合…我们…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000030b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...BY OPPENHEIMER, WHICH ONE OF YOU SELF-PROFESSED GENIUSES HAS BEEN ADJUSTING MY VOLUME KNOB? WHO WAS IT?! WAS IT YOU, 8?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：…以奥本海默的名义！你们中哪个自认天才的家伙扭了我的音量旋钮？是谁？是你吗，8？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000030b1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you at the Sink. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在汇聚节点再见。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00015b6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh! It's bad enough the indignities you've put me through, must you continue to prattle on at me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呸！你对我的无礼行为已经够过分了，你还要继续对我胡说八道么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00015b6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to see you back. I trust the adventuring is going well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴看到你回来。我想探险一定非常顺利吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016048_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: MOBIUS. ALWAYS THE SAME BROADCAST. HE'S CLEARLY MAD, DRIVEN INSANE BY HIS FLAWED AND IMPRECISE KINDERGARTEN-LEVEL RESEARCH METHODOLOGY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：莫比乌斯。总是同样的广播。显而易见，他疯了，被他自己那漏洞百出的的幼稚园级的研究方法论给整疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000030b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DID YOU RETRIEVE THE TECHNOLOGIES YET? WE NEED THEM, AS I HAVE INDICATED.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把那些技术回收了吗？如我已经说明过的，我们需要这些技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Slightly quieter, redundant in second half. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LOBOTOMITE. DO YOU UNDERSTAND ME? CAN YOU SPEAK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：无脑人。你能听懂我说什么吗？你能说话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at the way the tongue rolls in its mouth like some sort of... mucousy muscled worm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：看它嘴里那舌头卷曲的样子，就像是…粘稠的，有肌肉组织的蠕虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's you again. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，又是你，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00015b6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well, look who finally dragged themselves in out of the Wasteland. And where have we been, hmm? Crawling through pits of radioactive muck again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，看来有人终于把自己从废土之外拽回到这里了。我们去过哪儿，嗯？屈身在充满辐射的泥潭里爬行？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000ac67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the meat has returned. Lovely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，肉肉回来了，真可爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000ac68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU. LOBOTOMITE WHO UNDERSTANDS US. I AM DR. KLEIN. DO NOT BE FRIGHTENED. WE ARE BENEV... ER, MEAN YOU NO HARM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你，这只能明白我们在说什么的无脑人。我是克莱因博士。不要害怕。我们非常善良…呃，我是说不会伤害你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Our efforts have turned against us! In playing GOD, we created a MONSTER!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-这是报应！我们想要扮演上帝，最终制造了一头怪兽！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps as we were ruthlessly lobotimizing it with our cutters, we filled this skinevelope with... awareness. A teddy bear with new stuffing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：也许我们用刀无情地切下它的大脑的时候，我们赋予这个皮壳子…意识。一个用新内容物填充的泰迪熊诞生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Wait. If what you're theorizing is this Lobotomite understands us... can reason with us...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*停。就是说你认为这只无脑人能理解咱们…可以跟咱们理性地交流…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THEN THIS MAY BE JUST THE ANSWER WE'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR. AT LAST, A CHANCE TO...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：那么这可能就是我们一直要找的答案。终于，是时候了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d4_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 detects incoming transmission! EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d5_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indignant here, he didn't do anything! EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH, "DR. O," WAS IT? LIKELY STORY, O COULDN'T SPARK TWO NEURONS IF THEY WERE IN A LATTICE OF BIOMED GEL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：哦，"O博士"，难道是你？有此可能，O没法同时触发生物凝胶罐子里的两个神经元。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What? Me? Breaking news, Klein, it wasn't me - all right?! I am the robotical engineer, 8 is soundwaves, that's his "specialty."*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*什么？你说我？真是爆炸性新闻，克莱因，那不是我，你懂么？我是个机器人工程师，8才是搞声波的，那是他的“专长”。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You always do this, you always demean me in front of guests! And it's not "O," all right, it's...!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你总在做这样的事，你总是在客人面前掉我面子！而且那个不是“O”，好吧，它是…！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134bc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ENOUGH! EITHER OF YOU DO IT AGAIN, IT'LL BE THE LAST TIME. NOW... NOW...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：够了！我不管你俩谁做的，记住没有下次了。现在…现在…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...GREAT. NOW I FORGOT WHAT I WAS SAYING... WHAT WAS I TALKING ABOUT?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：…很好。现在我记不起刚刚要说什么了…我刚才在说什么来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134bd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It's a LOBOTOMITE. Here! In the DOME!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-这有只无脑人。在这儿！在穹顶！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH, AS IF THIS SITUATION COULDN'T GET ANY WORSE, NOW WE'VE GOT LOBOTOMITES. DALA, GET THE SPRAY BEFORE IT EXCRETES ALL OVER EVERYTHING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：哦，还能更糟吗，我们怎么和无脑人共处一室。达拉，在它到处排泄前把它处理掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Dr. Klein! A TRANSMISSION from the FORBIDDEN Zone! Coming right at US!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士！是禁区的传讯！冲我们来的！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT CAN ONLY BE...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：这只可能是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Klein... if my hypothesis is correct, this Lobotomite is the repository of the brain we sent the signal to - the skinvelope once containing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：克莱因博士…我们曾给某个在外面的大脑发过信号，没猜错的话，这只无脑人就是存放那个大脑的容器，曾经是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If so, it's proof that there may indeed be something beyond the Crater.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：如果是这样，那这个环形坑外面的确存在着某些事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just look at it... the way it blinks. It's like a big hairless teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：噢看看它…看它眨眼的方式。就像只大大的秃头泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I KNOW WHAT IT IS, DALA, I WANT TO KNOW WHY IT'S DOWN HERE. WITH ITS... ITS LIMBS ALL OVER EVERYTHING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我知道它是什么，达拉，我想知道它为何会在这。而且…它的肢体长得到处都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND... ARE THOSE... PENISES I SEE WRIGGLING ON ITS FEET? DISGUSTING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：还有…那些在它脚上扭曲蠕动的…是生殖器？好恶心…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe those are toes, Dr. Klein. Little teddy bear toes. Penises are much larger than those tiny extremities... Eh, not that I would know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我认为那是脚趾，克莱因博士。小泰迪熊的脚趾。生殖器要比那些小玩意大很多…呃…不是，关于这些我什么都不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't recall the human penis ever being that large.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我怎么不记得人类的生殖器有那么大。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It depends on one's own frame of reference, Doctor O. Look at its little nose with its two orifices for ingesting oxygen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：这取决于每个人自己的参照系，O博士。啊快看它那个小鼻子，上面有两个吸氧的孔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOSES? BY THE GREAT STATIC, THESE LOBOTOMITES CONFOUND ME WITH THEIR SHEER NUMBER OF USELESS EXTREMITIES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：鼻子？我的“大静电”啊，这些无脑人怎么有这么多没用的肢体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Dr. Klein! Look at it, its head movements, the primitive jelly eye-monitors!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士！看，它头部的动作，还有那原始的胶状眼部监视器！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree with Borous' histrionic findings. This little Lobotomite is unusually attentive for something whose brain has been extracted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我赞同鲍鲁斯博士那表演戏剧般的发言。这只无脑人作为一个大脑被移除的生物，注意力集中的很不寻常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NONSENSE. LOBOTOMITES CAN'T COMPREHEND US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：胡说八道。无脑人不可能理解我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 suggests a plan of action. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *8, have you been in the Mentats again? If we slow down our auro-processo-receptors to understand this excretion, we'll all be rendered ignorant!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*8，你又在嗑曼他特？如果我们放慢高贵的接收器认真观察它的排泄行为，我们就太掉价了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALL OF YOU, POWER DOWN, SHUT UP, AND LET ME PROVE ONCE AND FOR ALL HOW WRONG YOU ALL ARE. AS USUAL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：所有人，关闭电源，闭嘴，让我彻底证明你们错的多么离谱。如以往一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it isn't my old colleagues, the mighty "Think Tank" of Big MT. Big FOOLS, all of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的老同事吗，大山脉万能的思想体们，大笨蛋们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00013f1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got some plants for me, don't you? Yeah, I can smell it all over you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我带来了一些植物是吗？是的，我能从你身上闻出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f057_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hello! Still waiting for that seed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你好！我还在等着种子哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f058_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back! And the brains didn't lobotomize you! Well, not any worse, at least. Hooray!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了！而且那些大脑们没把你的大脑切掉！呃，至少没有更坏。太好啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016033_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was getting lonely without you here. Clean, eh, but lonely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没有你会变得很寂寞。虽然会比较干净，呃，但是很寂寞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh God, look at you! You're... filthy. I suppose you'll... want to clean up then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦上帝，看看你！你…太脏了。我想你会…想要清洗一下？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f07d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been working with that Biological Research Station, haven't you? I suppose you'll want to... clean up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚刚跟生物研究站一起干过活，是吗？我想你会想要…清洗一下？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f07e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between you and me, I think the Central Intelligence Unit is a bit of a snob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 私底下跟你说吧，中央智能单元就是个势利小人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f07f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, you poor dear! Come over here and have a drink, wash off some of that... horrible, sticky... blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，你这可怜的家伙！快过来喝口水，冲掉那些…可怖、粘稠的血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hello there! Can I get you a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你好啊！要不要来口喝的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f081_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I trust matters regarding your brain were resolved to your satisfaction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信关于你大脑的问题已经圆满解决了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016035_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're planning to stay a while, I could see clear to giving you a once-over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你准备在这待一会，我可以帮你再检查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016036_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmph... well how about that? Old Auto-Doc's back on-line. Well, all right, come here, let's have a look at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯啊…怎么样了？老自动医生重新开始工作。很好，对，过来，让我看看你的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f60e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You require some additional services?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要些额外的服务吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f60f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got yourself some serious hurts there, friend. Cracked patella, two bruised ribs, and if I ain't mistaken, your brain's missing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你伤的很重啊，我的朋友。髌骨碎裂，两根肋骨挫伤。而且如果我没弄错，你的大脑也不见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f610_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better climb in and let me have a look see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好能进来，让我仔细检查检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f610_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got yourself some serious hurts there, friend. Cracked patella, two bruised ribs, and if I ain't mistaken, your brain's recently been replaced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你伤的很重啊，我的朋友。髌骨碎裂，两根肋骨挫伤。而且如果我没弄错，你的大脑不刚刚被换过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016037_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better climb in and let me have a look see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好能进来，让我仔细检查检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016037_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you ain't the fittest horse that ever ran a race, but you don't appear in immediate danger of keeling over. I can patch you up if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你不算是最强健的，但也不会就这样倒下。只要你愿意，我就能治好你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f611_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are, without a doubt, the healthiest son of a bitch I've ever seen wandering the Big Empty. Ain't got no use for an old digital sawbones like me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，你是我在大坑洞里见过最健康的家伙，就不需要我这把数字老骨头操心啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f612_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There now. As good as God ever made you. You just mind you keep that leg out of any radioactive waste, and rub liniment on it twice a day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你的腿现在跟新的一样好。你只要注意别靠近放射性废料，然后一天擦两次药就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f613_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never trusted those Think Tank brains. Gave off a stench like ivory tower elitism. And brine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来就不相信穹顶的那些脑子。他们总是散发出象牙塔精英主义的酸臭味。还有罐子里的盐水味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome home, Citizen! Find any seditious materials out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回家，公民！找到什么反动材料了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah! Good day, Citizen! Library Processing Unit 232.7 is on-line and ready to eradicate sedition!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！日安，公民们！图书处理单元232.7已启动，随时准备铲除反动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0000f614_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings, Citizen! Ready to receive seditious materials!
ESP.TRADUIT: 向你致敬，公民！时刻准备着接收反动材料！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00011db0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might I be safe in the assumption that matters with the Think Tank have been satisfactorily concluded, vis-à-vis your residence in this domicile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请恕我失礼，既然已圆满处理了与思想体的纠纷，您是否准备在此定居呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0001603a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will sir be staying for any considerable length of time during sir's visit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷此次光临，不知是否要在此逗留一段时间呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0001603b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salutations and felicitations, sir, and a most jocund welcome to the Sink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，向您致以问候和祝贺，热烈欢迎您光临汇聚节点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00011db1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am your electronic valet and household central processor. May I be of service, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是你的电子仆人和中央智能管家。需要我为你做什么，老爷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00011db1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might I be of service, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么可以帮到您，老爷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00011db2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, please, please tell me you stomped Dr. O's brain into a fine paste! Did he squeal? Did he beg? God, I hope he begged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，拜托，拜托告诉我，你把O博士的大脑踩成浆糊了没有！他嚎叫了么？哀求了么？哦上帝，我希望他哀求过！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0001603c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the flatware bitch now, O?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他妈的谁是餐叉了，啊，O？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0001603c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate myself for asking this, but... did you bring me any new mugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恨我自己会问这个，但是…你给我带来马克杯了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0001603d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You! Hey, you! Yeah you! Got any mugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你！嘿，你！没错，就是说你！弄到小马克杯了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000128f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh please, please tell me you brought me some coffee cups!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，求你了，告诉我你给我带来了咖啡杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000128f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the brains dealt with, soon we can spread our rule across the Mojave! All will eat burned toast and despair!
ESP.TRADUIT: 料理掉那些大脑后，用不了多久，我们就可以在整个莫哈维散布我们的规则了！所有人都要吃烤好的吐司，并感到绝望！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0001603e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you were away, my plans have marched steadily forward. Beware, Caesar! Beware, NCR! Soon will dawn the Age of the Toaster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在时，我的计划正稳步展开。当心点，凯撒！当心点，NCR！我烤面包机的时代很快就要到来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_0001603f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahahaha! I am on-line once again! Tremble, world, before my electric heating coil of doom!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈哈哈！我再次启动了！世界将在我的末日般的电子加热线圈前颤抖！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000128fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Yes! Soon my work will be complete! Soon the world will burn in nuclear fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！是的！很快我的作品就要完成！不久世界就将在核爆的火焰中燃烧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000128fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any more sweet, innocent little kitchen appliances for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有天真可爱的小厨具要给我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000128fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You out-brained the big brains? That is so... hot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打爆了那堆大脑的脑浆！？真是…太酷了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, you're back! I missed you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你可回来啦！我想死你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016041_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, you're back! I missed you! Unlike some frigid bitches I could name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你可回来了！我想死你了！不像某个性冷淡的婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016042_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm... that was a nice little, uh, catnap. How long was I out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这真是个香甜的，呃，美梦。我睡了多久？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been seeing the other light switch, haven't you? Am I not enough for you any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和另一个开关幽会去了是不是？你有我还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000155ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're back. Did that trampy other light switch finally kick you to the curb?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你回来了。那个贱开关最后把你甩了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000155ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been seeing the other light switch, haven't you? Am I not enough for you any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和另一个开关幽会去了是不是？你有我还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000155ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi again, sweetie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！又见到你了哦，甜心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00013584_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you're to be congratulated on the recovery of your missing organs. Bravo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白，能够找回你丢失的器官非常值得庆贺。太好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016043_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to see you've decided to visit again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你决定再来见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016044_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to see you've decided to visit again. I hope it's not to see that useless little strumpet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能再来真好。希望你没去找那个没用的小荡妇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016045_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my. Partial functionality restored - that's less than optimal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦天呐，部分功能恢复了，虽然比最佳状态还要差点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000134df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I illuminate you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要我怎么给你启迪呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00013585_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you beat the big brains at their own game, huh? Guess you'll be putting your walking shoes on again, hitting that old lonesome road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你在那群大脑的游戏中击败了他们，嗯？我猜你接下来又要继续旅行了，去踏上那条古老的孤独之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look who's back to kick off the dust. Hope you ain't still singing them Old World Blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看谁风尘仆仆地回来了。希望你没再唱那旧世蓝调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_00016047_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh-ee! Yeah, dig that sweet music! Damn, it's good to be back on-line!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦耶，那音乐太赞了！该死的，被重新启动真好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000137e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the haps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_greeting_000137e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Predictable. The Lobotomite specimen returns. Its purpose? Repetition. Chances of success? High.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *不难推测，那个无脑人试验体回来了。其目的？自身的强迫症。我推测的正确率？很高。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_greeting_0000f62e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I CAN HEAR YOUR PENIS-TIPPED FEET TROMPING AROUND.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能听见你生殖器脚趾跺来跺去的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dialogueklein_hello_0001217c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HAVE YOU DONE ALL WE ASKED? IF NOT, WE WILL NOT HESITATE TO ASK AGAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要求的事你都完成了么？如果没有，我们会毫不犹豫的再次要求你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dialogueklein_hello_0001217e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE ONE WHO DEFENDED US FROM MOBIUS. HELLO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个帮助我们抵御莫比乌斯的人。你好啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dialogueklein_hello_00012180_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it isn't the fascinating little Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是那个迷人的小无脑人嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_hello_0001216e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love to hear you breathe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢听你的呼吸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_hello_00012174_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it isn't the beautiful ping of my radar-scan picking up a heroic Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 叮，看我的雷达扫描到了谁，这不是英勇的小无脑人么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_hello_00012177_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite! Has it come for HELLOS? You'll get no such satisfaction from ME.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是那只无脑人！它来是为了一句问候？你不会在我这里得逞的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_hello_00012168_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Have you come for HELLO? Oh, I'll give you a HELLO. A HELLO unsurpassed in all creation!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你来这为了一声“你好”？哦，那我会给你一句“你好”。全宇宙都无可比拟的“你好”！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_hello_00012169_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The ONE who SAVED us! To you, I bestow a hello. Hello.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是救了我们的那个人！让我授予你问候。你好啊。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_hello_0001216a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Stop hovering. I mean, if you want.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *别转来转去了。我是说，你不介意的话。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_hello_0001213a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't understand how you can stand those leg things.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我不明白你怎么能忍受那些腿一样的东西。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_hello_00012141_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Thanks for helping us. Don't get a big head or anything, even if I am insanely jealous.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *谢谢你帮了我们。尽管我发疯一样嫉妒，也请不要介意。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_hello_00012153_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I come in peace, visitor. Take me to... Oh. That's your line isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有敌意，来访者。请容许我…哦，这好像应该是你的台词？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_hello_00012184_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yellow. Uh... Hallow. No, wait, uh... oh, hello. Yes, that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 笔毫。呃…泥蒿。不，好像不是。呃…你好。对，对，就是这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_hello_00012185_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So nice seeing you again - for perhaps the first time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次见到你太好了，或许是第一次见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_hello_00012186_1.ogg
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dialogue8_hello_00012157_1.ogg
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dialogue8_hello_00012166_1.ogg
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dialogue8_hello_00012167_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, the uh... goodbye part of our little chat, then. Uh... Goodbye. Please mind the equations on the floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，那个…我们的谈话要暂时结束了。呃…再见。请注意地上的方程式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_goodbye_0000402c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time for me to go. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是时候离开了。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. A MOST GOOD BYE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，最诚挚的道别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_goodbye_00004025_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Until NEXT time, then! Provided there IS a next time. For ANY of us!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那么，下次见！如果能有下次的话。咱们俩都是！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_goodbye_0001350a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind, we've spoken enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要介意，我们已经聊得够多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Until our next scheduled audio transmission and reception, then.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *嗯，期待和你的下次音频交互。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_goodbye_0000f62b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we've spoken long enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们已经聊得足够久了。
的确，那个…我们的谈话要暂时结束了。呃…再见。请注意地上的方程式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([010166E8]NVDLC03DialogueArcade) 010166E8 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bark. Bark.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <狗叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until our next interaction, my intriguing little Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次我们再交流，我迷人的小无脑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_goodbye_0000f62c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've spoken enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈的足够多了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Again, "Like it matters. Get lost." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dialogue8_goodbye_0001022c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't avoid the deadly laser sting of Dr. Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是莫比乌斯博士的致命激光尾刺，你挡不住的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015edd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a pre-recorded attack message indicating my desire to commit violence on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一条预先录制的攻击信息，表明我想要撕碎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015ede_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crush them with your pincers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你的钳子撕碎他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015edf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-42, attack, in the name of Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: X-42，以莫比乌斯的名义，攻击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015ee0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't escape me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你躲不开的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015ed8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robo-Scorpion, attack!
ESP.TRADUIT: 机械蝎，攻击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015ed9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go, my minion, sting them in the name of all that is Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧，我的仆从，以莫比乌斯的名义刺穿他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015eda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you. Now, I end you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你了。现在，我会终结你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015edb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no match for Science!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本比不了科学！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015edc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HOW DO YOU FIRE THIS THING?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要怎么将这玩意点燃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Who turned out the lights?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！谁把灯关掉了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Somewhat confused and scared. Spoken through one of the trauma suits. Wild wasteland line from Doctor Who. ESP.ORIGINAL: <Small number of bones rattling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <一小部分骨头发出响声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03corpsesuitvoice\nvdlc03gen_attack_00015ed0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AttackinG. With a capital G.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进攻！大写的进攻！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee5_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dialogue8_attack_00015ef6_1.ogg
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dialogue8_attack_00015ef7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -An attack in the Dome - from BEYOND the Dome!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -穹顶里的攻击——从穹顶之上来的！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ef2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite! It has COME for us!-
ESP.TRADUIT: - 无脑人！它来找我们了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ef3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I will unleash the incredible power of our atomic attacks!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我将会释放我们攻击中不可思议的原子力量！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ef4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to rip out your stuffing, little teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会将你身体里的填充物全部掏出来的，小泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_attack_00015eef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going on a ride on the giggle bus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会在咯咯作响的巴士上踏上旅途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_attack_00015ef0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will blast you back to 2060.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把你炸回2060年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_attack_00015ef1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I am so going to attack this target with my weapons.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我将会用我的武器攻击这个目标。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_attack_00015eea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't even know what my weapons do.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我甚至都不知道我的武器都有什么作用。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_attack_00015eeb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O my, that's what my attack protocols feel like.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *O，原来我的攻击程序是这样的。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_attack_00015eec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Let's gang up on it! Guys? Anyone?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *让我们联手对付它！伙计们？有人来么？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_attack_00015eed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *If we scare it, maybe it'll give up!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *如果我们吓唬吓唬它，也许它就放弃了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_attack_00015eee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If a protracted battle is what you desire, so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想打场持久战，那就如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I attack you. Oh, yes, attack. You.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我攻击你。哦，是的，攻击。你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you think you're a match for Science?! You two couldn't possibly have a relationship, you have nothing in common.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你觉得你也配和科学较量？！你们两个一点关系都没有，一点都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've made Science mad! Very mad, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经让科学发疯了！真的，相当疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AIGHHHH! KILL IT! KILL IT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！杀了它！杀了它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DOES THIS WEAPON HAVE SOFT LOCK? ANYONE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这武器有没有保险？有人告诉我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BEHOLD THE POWER OF - SCIENCE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝尝科学的力量！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_attack_00015ee4_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pitiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可怜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking for a weak spot? There ARE NO WEAK SPOTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想寻找弱点？没有弱点可寻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_hit_00015e82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's make this sporting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们动起身来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defiant to the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反抗吧，直到你的终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_hit_00015e85_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 快停下！你会毁掉外壳的。

ESP.TRADUIT: 只管摧毁，我会弄更多的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -What is this unholy violence?!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这是什么罪恶的暴力？！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dialogueborous_hit_00015e96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Such pain as I've never experienced!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我从来没有体验过这样的疼痛！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dialogueborous_hit_00015e97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Ouch! STOP! Ow! OW.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -好疼！停！噢！噢。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dialogueborous_hit_00015e98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot believe you would hit a gender-neutral entity such as myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信你会攻击我这样的中性存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_hit_00015e92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This repeated hitting does not put you in a good light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的反复击打对你不会有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_hit_00015e93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, god, yes, hit me. I love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，上帝，对，打我。我喜欢这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_hit_00015e94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unh! Treat me like a lab animal! Make me your teddy bear, pull my stuffing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！像对实验动物一样对待我！把我当做你的泰迪熊，把我里边的东西都扯出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_hit_00015e95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Not the monitors! Or the shell!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *别打监视器！也别打外壳！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_hit_00015e8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Take my lunch money! Take it!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *拿走我的饭钱！拿去吧！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_hit_00015e90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ooooooh, you're making me mad!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦啊啊！你快把我逼疯了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_hit_00015e91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that pain I feel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是疼痛吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dialoguemobius_hit_00015e8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That burns my biogel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那烧灼着我的生物凝胶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dialoguemobius_hit_00015e8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I lose another monitor...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我失去了另外一个监视器…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dialoguemobius_hit_00015e8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AIGH! MY TANK! IT PUT A DING IN IT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！我的罐子！它在上面打了个坑！

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT SCRATCHED MY TANK!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它划伤了我的罐子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have GOT to be kidding me.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_death_00015ea6_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我的机械蝎！
