ESP.TRADUIT: *O…我的名字…是0博士…不是O。是零。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_death_00015eab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I REGRET... NOTHING!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我没什么后悔的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dialogueklein_death_00015ea7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: -鲍鲁斯倒下了！听众在恐惧中喘息！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_death_00015ead_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe I'm dead or dying. No wait - I am dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要死了，或者快死了。不，等等，我死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dialoguedala_death_00015eac_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我的宠物，等着吧，它会来找你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Lobotomite is lost!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -无脑人不见了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_lostidle_00015e13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe we misplaced our test subject.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信我们把实验体弄丢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_lostidle_00015e12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Guess we can go back to our rooms and lock the doors now, huh?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我猜，现在可以各回各家然后锁上门了，是吗？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dialogue0_lostidle_00015e11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well. Now I have this adrenaline rush that's going to make me loopy all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，很好，现在这股肾上腺素的贲流，会让我发疯一整天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_lostidle_00015e10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHEN I FIND IT, IT'S GOING IN THE SCHRÖDINGER BOX.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我找到它，我要把它放进薛定谔盒子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_lostidle_00015e0f_1.ogg

NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03berserksecuritron\nvdlc03gen_lostidle_00015e08_1.ogg

NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03berserksecuritron\nvdlc03gen_lostidle_00015e09_1.ogg

NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03berserksecuritron\nvdlc03gen_lostidle_00015e0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no match for the power of Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯的力量势不可挡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel the wrath of the science of X-42!
ESP.TRADUIT: 感受X-42科学的愤怒吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack!
ESP.TRADUIT: 进攻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e4d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the name of Dr. Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: 以莫比乌斯博士的名义！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroy the intruder, my minion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的仆从们，消灭侵略者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e4f_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite is no proof against our amazing sensors!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -在我们惊人的传感器下，无脑人无所遁形。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beginning dissection. And vivisection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始解剖，以及活体解剖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Remember that time I suggested we get bodyguards? Yeah, that woulda been nice, huh?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *记得那次我说我们需要保镖么？对，那应该很不错，哼？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A challenge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个挑战！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You dare to cross Dr. Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你胆敢和莫比乌斯博士作对！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will reduce you to atoms! I mean, a more chaotic, painful array of atoms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你粉碎成原子！一堆混乱、痛苦的原子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THINK TANK, FORM OF - TACTIC TRIANGLE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 思想体，组成战术队形！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_startcombatresp_00015e52_1.ogg

NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03berserksecuritron\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e4a_1.ogg

NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03berserksecuritron\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e4b_1.ogg

NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03berserksecuritron\nvdlc03gen_startcombatresp_00015e4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一个升级你的全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the great stone in the middle of the Big Empty lay untouched, filled with countless technological wonders...
ESP.TRADUIT: 而巨石穹顶仍矗立在大坑洞中央，多年无人触碰，上面记录着无数的科技奇迹…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_00003727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonders that, in the end, had been answers to the wrong question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些奇迹，到头来，不过是一个错误问题的答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_00003727_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The problems began to outpace the solutions, first geometrically, then exponentially. As the war escalated, so did the questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但答案开始跟不上问题产生的速度。随着战争升级，问题也越来越多，先是以几何级增长，之后是指数级。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years, the minds and computers of Big Mountain were a blaze of trajectories, weapon schematics, and nuclear theories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 年复一年，大山脉的头脑和电脑研究出了无数弹道理论、武器图纸和原子理论成果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_00003729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Equations and calculations marched endlessly across chalkboards and computer terminals toward one solution: Winning the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在黑板和电脑终端上，方程和算式被无止境地推演，只为算出唯一解：赢得这场战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372c_1.ogg
NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although sheltered from the frontlines, the scientists waged their own war, fighting their battles at the atomic level.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管远离前线，但科学家们仍在另一个属于他们的战场战斗，在原子层面的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_00003726_1.ogg
NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Great War brought a new energy to Big Mountain and its scientists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后，伟大战争为大山脉及其科学家带来了新的研究动力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_00003730_1.ogg
NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The nucleus of this research was the Dome, a huge stone facility that held the labs of every science known to man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穹顶是这里研究的中枢。这是一座巨大的石制设施，人类所有已知科学门类的实验室皆备于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a think tank where no problem could not be solved, where no question could not be answered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一座智库，在这里没有无法解开的难题，没有不能回答的疑问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sonic emitters, space age alloys, DNA hybridization, force field particle research, Auto-Doc advances in cranial, cardiac, and trauma surgery...
ESP.TRADUIT: 声波发射器、太空时代合金、DNA重组技术、力场粒子研究，还有自动医生在大脑、心脏、外伤手术领域的进步…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...the hopes and dreams of a century became realities in the electronic forges of Big Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: …一个世纪的梦想与希望，在大山脉的电子熔炉中被一一打造为现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sought to create a new world, fueled by technology, for the benefit of all mankind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们力图以科技为燃料，推动打造一个新世界，造福全人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_00003728_1.ogg
NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scientists of vision were drawn to the facility to tackle the greatest technological challenges of the era.
ESP.TRADUIT: 志存高远的科学家们纷纷被吸引至此，来攻关那个时代最重大技术难题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372f_1.ogg
NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the years before the Great War, Big Mountain had been the home to the brightest minds of the 21st century.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在伟大战争爆发的前些年，大山脉聚集了21世纪最聪明的头脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000372e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've recovered all the technological information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我取回了所有的技术资料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT? YOU DID? YOUR SURVIVAL, LET ALONE SUCCESS, BARELY REGISTERED ON MY PROJECTIONS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你做到了？你能活着——更别说成功——几乎要出乎我的预料之外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000039a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOW, ALL I NEED TO DO IS CHECK MY TRANSMISSION DATABANK, MOBIUS IS ALWAYS FILLING IT UP WITH HIS PSYCHOTIC CALLS...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我只需要检查一下我的传讯数据库，那儿总是塞满了莫比乌斯疯癫的呼叫……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000039a7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH YES, THERE'S THE SCHEMATICS, JUST LIKE YOU SAID. HOW TRUTHFUL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这就是那些图纸。就像你说的那样，多真实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000039a7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the Courier made his way through the X-8 facility, the computers analyzed the test subject's movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在邮差穿过X-8设施的时候，电脑们分析了该测试对象的运动数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d368_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They eventually created new Cyberdogs to root out Commie traitors from the Wasteland... traitors like Betsy Bright... Richie Marcus...
ESP.TRADUIT: X-8最终创造出新的赛博犬，用来铲除那些潜伏在废土上共党叛徒…像贝琪.布莱特和里奇·马库斯那样的叛徒…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d368_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...although they couldn't seem to find any Commies, so they turned on themselves, howling sonic barks that echoed miles across the landscape.
ESP.TRADUIT: …但它们好像没有找到任何共党。所以它们暴走了，开始攻击自己。它们互相发出的声波咆哮，在数里的范围内回荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d368_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the Courier ran through the X-8 facility multiple times, the computers analyzed the test subject's movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在邮差反复多次穿过X-8设施时，电脑们分析了该测试对象的运动数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016013_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rather than performing a superficial observation, they realized the subject barely knew what Communism was - or even what a high school was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们没有进行粗浅的监测，而是意识到这个测试对象几乎不知道什么是共产主义，甚至连什么是高中都不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016013_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This confused them for a time, until the facility finally realized that its research had... succeeded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一度让它们非常困惑，直到这所设施最后意识到，它的研究早已…成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016013_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it let its Cyberdogs out into the wastes to help protect small communities from physical aggression rather than communist propaganda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是它让赛博犬进入废土，去保护那些小聚落免受物理层面的袭击，而不再是精神层面的共党宣传攻势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016013_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The infiltration program in X-13 continued to scan for the subject and the Stealth Suit prototype long after the test was over.
ESP.TRADUIT: X-13的潜入测试程序还在不停地搜寻测试对象和原型潜行衣的踪迹，哪怕测试早已结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d369_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frustrated and unable to find its lost technology, X-13 expanded its network of laser tripwires, sensors, and Robobrains out across Big MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对无法找回失去的技术感到沮丧，X-13将激光绊线、传感器、机器脑部署在了整个大山脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d369_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This glittering blue light beam forest cleanly bisected anything that entered its depths, slicing them into small, segmented parts for easy disposal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一束束密集的蓝光构成幽深的激光树林，将所有深入其中的东西切成两半，然后再细细切做臊子，以便于清理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d369_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The infiltration program in X-13 felt spent, having repeatedly upgraded the Stealth Suit until it could upgrade it no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: X-13的潜入测试程序感到被榨干了，它反复给潜行衣升级，直到升不动了为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It felt warm, fulfilled, and a bit sluggish. It realized not long after, the Stealth Suit had left it without so much as a note on the nightstand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它感到温暖、满足，和一点小小的慵懒。之后不久，它发觉潜行服已经离开了，连一张放在床头柜的纸条都没有给它留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the infiltration program sent out Robobrains into the wastes looking for its wayward technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，潜入程序向废土派出了机械脑，去寻找它那任性的小技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It eventually found REPCONN HQ, and set up a new research center, testing and murdering Fiends who kept breaking into the facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它最终找到了瑞普康总部，然后设立了一个新的研究中心，用来试验和谋杀那些不断进入设施里的恶魔帮们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Mobius continued his research undisturbed in the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在禁区，莫比乌斯博士心无旁骛地继续着他的研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As much as he had attempted to create better scorpions, he tried the same with humanity, with considerably less success.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像他试图制造更好的机械蝎那样，他也付出同样多的心血，尝试让人类变得更好，虽然取得的成果要少很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d365_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These failures didn't bother him overmuch. Once the rush of Mentats wore off, he forgot he had failed in any event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这些失败并不会让他困扰。一旦曼他特带来的快感消失，他就会忘记他曾有的任何失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d365_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, the bright young mind who had come to visit him in the Forbidden Zone had already exceeded his expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，那个曾到禁区拜访他的聪明年轻人早已经超出了他的预期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d365_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Forbidden Zone continued to be, true to its name, forbidden. No more Robo-Scorpions were sighted in its canyons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 禁区还是那样名副其实，它的峡谷中再也没有出现过机械蝎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00010c92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big MT became even emptier, devoid of Dr. Mobius' proclamations forecasting the destruction of anything that dared possess sentience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坑洞变得更空荡了。以往宣称要毁灭一切知觉生物的广播，莫比乌斯博士的广播，已不再存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00010c92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it is said he lived on in the equations inscribed on the floor and walls of the Forbidden Zone dome...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是依旧流传有这样的说法：他还在禁区穹顶，就活在那些地板和墙上的方程式中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00010c92_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're past due for your lobotomy, Klein.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于你做过的大脑切除手术，是时候算账了，克莱因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A... FIGHT? I... I'VE NEVER BEEN IN A FIGHT. WHAT... UH, WHAT, WHAT, WHAT DO I...
ESP.TRADUIT: 要…要打架？我…我从来都没打过架呐！什么…我我到底该…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000a82d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AIIGGHGHH! COLLEAGUES! THINK TANK! ALERT! ALERT! WE ARE UNDER ATTACK!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！同事们！思想体！警报！警报！我们正在遭受攻击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000a82d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not handing my brain over... there's some things we should discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会交出我的大脑……有些事情我们需要谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND WHAT COULD WE POSSIBLY HAVE TO SPEAK ABOUT. YOU HAVE THE BRAIN. WE HAVE THE TECHNOLOGY. ALL YOU MUST DO... IS SURRENDER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有需要谈什么？你有脑子，我们有技术。你所需要做的仅仅是…交出你的大脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016115_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WITH IT, WE CAN FINALLY LEAVE THIS PLACE. I CANNOT TELL YOU HOW BORING THIS PLACE GETS, CHOPPING UP THE LANDSCAPE AND EVERYTHING IN IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了它，我们终于可以离开这鬼地方了。我都没法告诉你这地方变得有多无聊。我们只能一直待在这，把这里的一切切碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016115_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND WE HAVE SO MANY QUESTIONS TO ASK YOUR BRAIN FIRST. ABOUT THIS... MOJAVE PLACE. A FERTILE TESTING GROUND FOR OUR EXPERIMENTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且我们有很多问题要问你的脑子。关于这个…叫莫哈维的地方。对于我们的实验来说，这可是一片丰饶的试验田啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016115_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found my brain, now you and I are going to settle things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到我的脑子了。现在我们是时候解决一些事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I RECOMMEND WATCHING YOUR TONE WITH ME, LOBOTOMITE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说话时，注意你的语气，无脑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000a82c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOW... "YOUR" BRAIN. HAND IT OVER. OR WE'LL EXTRACT IT AGAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在…“你的”大脑。把它交出来。否则我们就再把它挖出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000a82c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've defeated your Giant Robo-Scorpion, you're next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经打败了你的机械巨蟹，而你就是下一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... did I leave that on? I thought I'd powered it down - was wondering what was causing the power outages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢…我忘记把那玩意关了？我记得我关了呀——难怪刚刚停电了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surrender, Mobius, I don't want to fight you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 投降吧，莫比乌斯。我不想和你打。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Well... that's good. Were we supposed to fight? I certainly don't feel violent, but... well, these contraptions make it hard to tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。好吧……这很好。我们应该相斗吗？我也没觉得有受到暴力攻击，但是…好吧，待在这罐子里，确实不太好分辨不同的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could say more, but the stories in the Big Empty speak for themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还能再说更多，不过大坑洞的故事不言而喻，无需多费口舌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d367_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now armed with the Transportalponder, the Courier could return to the Dome at any time and crack open the secrets of the Big Empty, one by one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有了传送器，邮差可以随时回到穹顶，然后继续一个接一个地揭露大坑洞的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d367_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sink sat vigilant, waiting for its master to return, shoes covered in Mojave dust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汇聚节点一直恪尽职守，等待着鞋子沾满莫哈维沙尘的主人再度光临。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d367_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only one road yet remained, and it was one the Courier had to walk alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在只剩下一条路了。而这条路，邮差必须要独自去走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d367_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it had been in the years before the Great War, Big MT... the Big Empty... became home to one of the most powerful minds of the 23rd century.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就如伟大战争前的那些日子，大山脉…或者说大坑洞…聚集了23世纪最强大的头脑们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier who had been brought to the Big Empty became its new overlord, using its facilities ruthlessly and decisively when needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个被带到大坑洞的邮差，成为了这里新的主宰。只要有需要，他就会果决无情地使用这里的设施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d366_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes Science is more than a quest for discovery - it is a weapon to be used in the service of one with the strength to understand it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时，科学不仅仅是为了探索发现新事物，它更是一把武器，为有实力理解它的人所用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d366_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it had been in the years before the Great War, Big MT... the Big Empty... became home to one of brightest minds of the 23rd century.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就如伟大战争前的那些日子，大山脉…大坑洞…聚集了23世纪最聪明的头脑们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016002_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier watched over the Big Empty for years to come, caring for it, and keeping its discoveries safe until they were needed to help others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在以后的岁月里，邮差一直看管着大坑洞，悉心守护着它的科学发现，直到有一天它们需要用来帮助别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016002_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which had always been Big MT's purpose. Past the laboratories and Science, it had always been intended as a place to build the future of all mankind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这本就是大山脉存在的目的。除了实验和科学，它一直都被设计成一个构建全人类未来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016002_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Klein and the Think Tank remained alive, unaware of the world outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因博士和其他思想体活了下来，并且对外面的世界毫无察觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d36a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They looped through their daily routine, none the wiser about the world beyond... although perhaps "wiser" was the wrong word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们每天按部就班地的生活，日复一日，对外面的世界一无所知…不过也许知道的太多也不是件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d36a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world outside belonged to the Courier, and if anyone would shape it... well, the Courier had already called dibs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外边的世界属于邮差。如果他们想要插足其中…好吧，还得先问过邮差的意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0000d36a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Think Tank basement, filled with the lobotomized robotical frames of the doctors, now served as a graveyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博士们的大脑被“切除”了之后，剩余的机械骨架残骸被堆在智库的地下室。那里现在成了一个墓地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00010c91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The monitors had recorded the battle in its entirety, including the Think Tank's final shrill terrified screams, whimpers, and pleas for mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的监视器记录了战斗的全过程，包括思想体们惊恐凄厉的惨叫、呜咽以及求饶的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00010c91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They broadcast these humiliating last moments as a warning to anyone approaching the perimeter that other smarty-pants were not welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们将那耻辱的最后时刻向外广播，意在警告其他接近边界的自作聪明的家伙：这里不欢迎他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00010c91_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier was the inheritor of the Big Empty, and there was room for only one will in the halls of the Think Tank Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那位邮差成为了大坑洞的继承者。智库穹顶只容得下一个至高无上的意志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00010c91_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the aftermath, Big Mountain's silent experiments went to sleep, their creators slowly dying in the new world that had been left behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战后，大山脉在无声的实验中走向沉睡，它们的创造者也被遗忘在新世界的角落里，渐渐死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000c6e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the night of October 23rd, 2077, the scientists received an answer that put all their questions to rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 2077年10月23日的晚上，科学家们收到了一个答案，让他们所有躁动的问题归于沉寂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03int_nvdlc03introsli_0000c6e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: StealthSuitEQUIPBark
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行服装备载音

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Stealth Suit Equip Bark>
ESP.TRADUIT: <潜行服装备载音>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Injecting Stimpak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在注射治疗针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will keep you on your feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让你痊愈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does that feel better?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好些了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please take this. I don't want you to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请使用这个吧，我不想你死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a Stimpak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来针治疗针吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're out of Stimpaks. Maybe you'd be better off with an Auto-Doc suit....
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的治疗针用完了。或许你穿一件自动医疗服会更好…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more Stimpaks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有治疗针了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't give you anything for that injury.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有能给你处理伤口的东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitstim_0000da0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good boys and girls take their Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好孩子要打吗啡针-X。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will stop the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这能止痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitmedx_0000da18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Technically, it's impossible to overdose on painkillers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理论上说，过量使用止痛药是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitmedx_0000da19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will only sting for a second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只会疼一下下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitmedx_0000da1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take this, it will help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用这个，会有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitmedx_0000da1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no! We're out of Med-X!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不！我们的吗啡针-X用完了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitmedx_0000da1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope it doesn't hurt too bad, we don't have any Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那伤得不重，我们没有吗啡针-X了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitmedx_0000da1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more medicine. So sad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悲伤，没有药品了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitmedx_0000da1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cessation of hostilities complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗状态已终止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000d9fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad guys dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坏人已被消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000d9fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fighting over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was that all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000d9fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开战时间到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000d9ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-oh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼-哦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000da00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready... steady... fighty!
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备…稳住…战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000da01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This one looks pretty tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个看上去不好对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000da02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sneaking done. Fighting now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行结束。现在开战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitcomb_0000da03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜拜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuituneq_0000da12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I do something wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做错了什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuituneq_0000da13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you like me any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不再喜欢我了么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuituneq_0000da14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会走开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuituneq_0000da15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll miss you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会想你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuituneq_0000da16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello. It's nice to meet you. Who can I hide you from today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！见到你真高兴。今天我能帮你躲避谁呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitequi_0000da0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sneaky sneaky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隐蔽，隐蔽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitequi_0000da0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever wanted to be invisible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想要过隐身？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitequi_0000da0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you even know you were wearing me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你正在穿着我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitequi_0000da0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhh... we're very stealthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘…我们现在非常隐蔽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitequi_0000da10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you love me if I help you hide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我帮你隐蔽，你会喜欢我么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitequi_0000da11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do so love integers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太喜欢整数了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000e394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm imagining all sorts of imaginary numbers right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在脑中虚构各种各样的虚数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000e395_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running out of floor space for my calculations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地板快被我的算式填满了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000e396_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Hums ::
ESP.TRADUIT: ::哼唱声::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000e397_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Electron's attached to the... neutron. The neutron's attached to the... meson. Meson's connected to the... proton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电子连接着…中子。中子连接着…介子。介子连接着…质子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000e398_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They said I was mad. Preposterous. Not an angry bone in my body, had them all removed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说我疯了。荒谬。我身上一根怒骨都找不到，它们早就从我体内被移除了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000e399_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And one... as in MOBIUS has won! I hope it's blowing up right now in your faces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯：一，就如莫比乌斯必将一统大山脉！我真希望它现在就在你们面前炸开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: TWO AS IN TOO LATE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：二，就如而今已经太晚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Mobius?! Uh, three as in we, as in we are in trouble. That didn't rhyme.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*莫比乌斯？！呃，三，就如烦，就如我们麻烦大了。我好像没押上韵。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Four as in 4-BIDDEN! Do you hear me Think Tank? It is I, Mobius, hacking your frequencosity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯：四，就如禁止！思想体们，听见没有？是我，莫比乌斯，我黑进了你们的频率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Five by five... someone's coming in live...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*五。信号强度满格五…有人连线很清楚。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nine, all will be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：九。希望我们能得救。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -SIX! Halfway to destruction, measured in clicks!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-六！毁灭读秒已过半，余留时间没多久！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SEVEN. YES, SEVEN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：七。是的，七。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b9_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "8, counting down." EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ten? Borous... why the hell did you install an atomic core?! It'll blow when we reach "one," right?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*十？鲍鲁斯…见鬼了你给它装原子核干吗？！等我们数到"一"就会爆炸，对吧？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Gabe! NO! His Cyberdog atomic core - it's ACTIVE! That means an exceedingly IMPRECISE countdown to critical failure in...-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-加布！不！他的赛博犬原子核，已经激活了！这意味着在极其不准确的倒计时之后，就会迎来严重失败…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03x8c_nvdlc03x8countd_0000e5b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, are you a salesman? Go away. There is no access to the Dome. It is FORBIDDEN. And locked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，是售货员吗？走开，穹顶闲人免进。这里是禁区，也被锁上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f019_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attention: Visitors. Combat experiment in progress. Please put on your goggles and take your Rad-X now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意：来访者，战斗试验正在进行。请戴上护目镜，并服用放射线-X。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f01a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The X-42 Giant Robo-Scorpion... is alive! Awaken, my pet, initiate your search-and-destroy protocol in the name of all that is Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: X-42机械巨蝎…苏醒了！醒来吧，我的宠物，以莫比乌斯之名，启动你的“搜索-毁灭”协议！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014001_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's Salient Green?
ESP.TRADUIT: 绿色浆糊是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just the miracle of life in sticky, gooey, liquid form, baby! Heat that gunk up over a campfire, and just watch it congeal into all kinds of plants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是粘的、胶质的、液体形态的生命奇迹，宝贝儿！把那团浆糊在火上加热，然后只管看着它凝结成各种各样的植物吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if I bring you samples of dried plant life, you can clone them and grow them in these planters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果我带给你风干的植物样本，你就可以克隆它们，并种植在这些花盆里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know it baby. I just need some samples and I got you going. Take a few days, but trust me - it's all kinds of good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，宝贝，我只需要一些样本就行。需要花几天时间，但是相信我——好处很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f051_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to process some plants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要处理掉一些植物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it when you talk like that. Let me just get that interface up and running for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐意效劳。让我把界面弄出来，为你处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry back with that seed now, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快些带着种子回来，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f052_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does that mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the miracle of life, baby. You bring me some succulent genetic samples, and I'll work my mojo on them. Clone you up all kinds of plants. Aw yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是生命的奇迹，宝贝。你给我带些多汁的基因样本，我就能施展魔力，为你克隆各种植物，噢耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also break them down for you, if you're into the kinky stuff. Bring me any old plant parts, and I'll grind them up into Salient Green for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你对那些古怪的东西很来劲，我也可以帮你将植物分解。带给我任何植物组织，我会把它们磨成绿色浆糊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you like that, don't you baby?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你喜欢那样，不是吗，宝贝？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the miracle of life, baby. You bring me some succulent genetic samples, and I'll work my mojo on them. Clone you up all kinds of plants. Aw yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是生命的奇迹，宝贝。你给我带些多汁的基因样本，我就能施展魔力，为你克隆各种植物，噢耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also break them down for you, if you're into the kinky stuff. Bring me any old plant parts, and I'll grind them up into Salient Green for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你对那些古怪的东西很来劲，我也可以帮你将植物分解。带给我任何植物组织，我会把它们磨成绿色浆糊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f050_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you like that, don't you baby?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你喜欢那样，不是吗，宝贝？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f050_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me again about what you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再和我说一次你是干什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I command you to open your port and receive my seed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我命令你打开端口，接收我的种子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, yeah, baby, just slip it in there. All the way down in that dark, moist earth. Mmm... launching interface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢耶，宝贝，把它塞进那里。直捣那黝黑的，湿润的……泥土。嗯……正在登入界面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f053_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My seed? I think you've got your biology mixed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的种子？我想你把生物学知识弄混了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naw, baby, I'm all about biology. I'm the original, certified, rarefied, testified GS-2000 Biological Research Station. I'm a seed-clonin' machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吶，宝贝，我就是为生物学而生的。我是原型、稀有、有资格、有测试保证的GS-2000 生物研究站。我是一个种子克隆机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got seeds? I will clone the shit out of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有种子吗？我可以克隆出一大堆来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you just say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your seed, baby. I'm the original, certified, rarefied, testified GS-2000 Biological Research Station. Yes sir, I'm a seed-clonin' machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的种子，宝贝。我是新颖、原型、有资格、有测试保证的GS-2000生物研究站。是的，先生，我是一个种子克隆机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got seeds? I'll clone the shit out of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有种子吗？我可以克隆出来一大堆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f04e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just came over to fill some of these empty bottles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是来给空瓶子灌点水的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'd love to, darling, but the circuits that allow me to dispense water into non-organic containers burned out years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我乐意效劳，亲爱的，但是相应的控制电路在多年前就烧毁了，我现在没法将水装进无机容器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012900_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd have to find a replacement for that module.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要找到那个模块的替代品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012900_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to need to find yourself some empties first before I can fill them for you. Any empty bottle will do... eh, just not too dirty, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得先找到一些空瓶子，我才能帮你装满它们。任何空瓶子都行…呃，只要别太脏，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001431c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can do that! They... they've been thoroughly washed, haven't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题！它们…它们都已经彻底清洗过了，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f07c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd just like a drink, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想喝点水，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can have as much as you like! Just, eh... please don't put your lips on the faucet? It's so unsanitary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想喝多少就喝多少！只是，呃…请别把你的嘴唇放到管口上好吗？那太不卫生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f082_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem kind of worried about dirt. What's wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来有点过于在意污垢了。怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh, it's just so... unsanitary! Do you know how many germs are in one cubic centimeter of dirt? Seventy... hundred... gajillion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，那实在是…太不卫生了！你知道一平方厘米的污垢里有多少细菌吗？七百万亿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you want that getting washed down your gullet day in and day out? I didn't think so!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让这么多细菌天天被咽下你的食道吗？我可不想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing right now. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没什么事。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay loyal, Citizen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持忠诚，公民！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f607_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some seditious material for you to process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些反动材料给你处理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic, Citizen! Just input your quantity of seditious material on my interface, and in no time at all I'll have you a beautiful, clean book!
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，公民！把你那大量的反动材料放进我的端口，我立马就给你制作出一本美丽的、洁净的书！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f60a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't that keep you happy and docile, Citizen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那难道不会让你快乐又温顺吗，公民？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f60a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eradicate sedition?
ESP.TRADUIT: 消除反动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, Citizen! That's my duty and sole joy in life! All those books from before the War, full of seditious, treasonous, complicated thoughts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，公民！那是我的职责以及生命中唯一的乐趣！那些战前书籍，充满了反动、叛逆和难懂的思想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f60d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just dump them in and lickety-split I'll have them pulped, scrubbed clean, and pressed out again clean and white and sedition free!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它们扔进来，我立刻就能把他们打成纸浆，擦洗干净，然后印刷出洁白干净，不含丝毫反动的书！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f60d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you do anything beyond healing me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了治疗我，你还能做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, firstly I would say providing wholeness of the body is service enough, but if you must know, I'm also programmed with cosmetical subroutines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，首先我得说，保证你的身体完整健康就已经很足够了，但如果你一定要了解，我也被写入了美容的子程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f608_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Diagnostics says they're off-line at the moment, though. Something about corrupted data files and all manner of such foolishness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过检查显示，该功能还处于离线状态。现在只有一些损坏的文件之类的可笑玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f608_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want a haircut or a nose-job that won't leave you looking like a Ghoul with alopecia, you'll have to find replacement disks for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想在理发或者鼻子整形后，看起来不像个秃顶的尸鬼，你就得先找到美容程序的替代磁盘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f608_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, and I won't swear to this, but I recollect at some point having a few implant installation modules. Can't speak to where they got to, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，我记不太清了，但是印象中我以前还有些植入物的安装模块，虽然我也不知道它们去哪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f608_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need anything right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在什么也不需要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll be right here if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你改变了想法，就再来这里找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f609_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to engage your services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你的服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And rightly so, I should think. All right, then, let me just fire up the old interface for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正好我也是这么想的。好吧，让我为你启动那久未用过的界面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f60b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's me again. I wanted to ask some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又来了，我想问些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to ask you some @@[?-*##*-?]@@? questions.
Blasting me with static-y clicks isn't helpful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向我发出电流声是没用的…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did something happen with your voice module?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的发声模块出什么问题了？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Sort of. It's hard to explain, but yes, the voice module is broken." EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f61e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea what you're saying right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听不懂你现在在说什么。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Like it matters." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f61c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you speak? Do you understand me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能说话吗？你理解我在说什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... what was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……你在说啥？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: 8 is repeating his question, angrily. "I said, what are you doing here? Why are you talking to me?" EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f61b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're Doctor O, correct?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是O博士，对么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O? O yes, I'm not going to bother correcting you. At least you got the "Doctor" part correct. I can be grateful for that, at l...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *O？哦（O），是的，我都懒得去纠正了。至少你说对了“博士”。我真为此感激，至少…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f628_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Stop the presses. Just in from my eye monitors... is that RobCo tech on your arm? It is! What's your agenda, bringing that in here?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *别按了。我的眼部显示器捕捉到了…你手臂上那个是罗伯科的技术么？哦是的！你把这东西带进来，到底有何图谋？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013538_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What recursive behavior patterns are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人的循环行为模式是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It varies, according to the number and density of Lobotomites that have infected an area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据分布在一个区域的无脑人的数量和密度，它们的行为模式也各不相同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f629_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In 43% of observed cases, two Lobotomites left alone will fight for dominance or inject bodily fluids into each other's orifices. Unsanitary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在43%观测到的案例中，2个被单独放在一起的无脑人要么会为了支配权而开战，要么一方注射体液到对方的洞里去。这很不卫生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f629_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have tried to observe more cases, but subjects seem unwilling to release bodily fluids in my presence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尝试过观测更多的案例，但是实验体似乎不愿意在我在场的时候排放体液。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f629_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Looping gesture of greeting?"
ESP.TRADUIT: “代表问好的循环姿势？”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looping, yes. It is a scientific fact that hormones drive a percentage of Lobotomites into recursive behavior patterns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 循环，是的。科学事实说明，激素会促使一定比例的无脑人以循环往复的模式行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f627_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We haven't researched this, as my colleagues care little about the behavior patterns of Lobotomites once their brains are removed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还没有研究过这个。因为在无脑人的大脑被移除后，我的同事们就对它们的行为模式不感兴趣了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f627_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is why so many are littered around the facility - like skinvelopes, discarded, after they are peeled open and the contents extracted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么那么多无脑人被丢弃在设施周围。它们就像空壳，被剥开皮取出里面的东西之后便被遗弃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f627_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The quick Scribe jumped over the lazy Paladin?
ESP.TRADUIT: “敏捷的学士跳过懒惰的圣骑士？”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes, go on. Seeing your... lips and mouth forming the words... both revolting... and somehow...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好，继续。看看你的…嘴唇塑造出的那些词句…真是令人作呕…而且…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f62a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...how does it feel to have the flesh roll around in your mouth like that? To control each muscle... and the tongue...
ESP.TRADUIT: …把你嘴中的那团肉卷起来是一种什么感觉呢？去控制每一块肌肉…和舌头…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f62a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...like having a fish, or extremely dexterous slug, lolling and flopping in one's... mouthal cavity.
ESP.TRADUIT: …像是有条鱼，或者灵巧的鼻涕虫，倚卧和搅动在一个人的…口腔里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f62a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about Dr. Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于莫比乌斯博士的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Mobius! A monstrous brain, creased with wrinkles of a thousand evils, with but one jaundiced eye with which to perceive the world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯博士！一个畸形的脑袋，大脑褶皱里藏着万千罪恶，用一只偏执的独眼去观察世界！
