ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f632_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exiled from the Think Tank for crimes too heinous to remain in recorded memory. And, perhaps, differences in research methodology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他因为罪大恶极而被思想体流放。也或许，是因为研究方法的差异。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f632_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His one terrible eye forever peers at us, an eye of ever-increasing magnification. He watches from his Dome in the Forbidden Zone, spying on us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他恐怖的独眼永远注视着我们，一只越来越大的眼睛。他从禁区的穹顶监视着我们所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f632_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this thing on? This is Mobius - Dr. Mobius. We're... initiating some kind of emergency test shutdown... in five...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听得到吗？这里是莫比乌斯，莫比乌斯博士。现在准备测试紧急关停功能…倒计时从五开始…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f989_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Four, as in Forbidden...
ESP.TRADUIT: 四，就如禁止…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f98a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Three, as in tree...
ESP.TRADUIT: 三，就如参天巨木…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f98b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two, as in "Et Two, Brutus?"...
ESP.TRADUIT: 二，就如“连你也起二心了吗，布鲁图斯？”…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f98c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One, as in none. Oh look, the emergency overload is initiating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一，就如一无所有。哦看，紧急过载程序已启动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0000f98d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough. I had questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，我有事情要问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome, 8. It was my pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用谢，8，很高兴能帮到你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll talk to Klein in a second, quit pressuring me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会立刻和克莱因谈的，别再催我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, haven't dealt with Mobius yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我还没有解决莫比乌斯博士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, I'll get the technologies, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我会找到那些技术的，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I probably should put it to use counting cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，或许我该用它来记牌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have an ear for it, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，我会留意的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I just heard the rhythm in the sequence is all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我只听到一系列有规律的音韵。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I am quite impressed." EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000113d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't get away from their code, even with voice modules, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你有声音模块的时候，也摆脱不了他们的代码，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've hacked enough RobCo terminals to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我可是黑了很多的罗伯科终端才知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just full of surprises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我震惊了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I am quite impressed." EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really make me want to kick that voice box of yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的让我想踹你的音箱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll just move on, I need time to figure this out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先这样吧，我需要时间来弄明白这事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... yes, definitely a pattern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…没错，你的发声确实有一种模式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget I brought it up. Until I bring it up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了我提起过这事吧，在我再次提起它之前。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I said, technical. Very technical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如我所言，有技术含量，太有技术含量了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea what you just said. Moreso than usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更甚往常，完全不知道你在说啥。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Oh, I won't even bother remembering this." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001022a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should have asked who you used to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许我本应该问你以前是谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds important. I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来还挺重要。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I have a very important role here doing stuff." EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010225_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... good to meet you... uh... double... circle... a... dash... whoever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…很高兴见到你…唔…两个…圆圈…一个…破折号…是谁都好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knew asking you would be useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就知道问你没用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swear your brain... tank... thing just sparked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓你的大脑…罐里的…它的神经亮了一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sound agitated. Or you're percolating. Or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听上去很激动，或者你在试探，或者别的什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you rather I called it the Big Shithole?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我叫它大粪坑吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, easy there... whatever you are. Brain. Jar. Thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，放轻松……不管你是什么。大脑、罐子，还是什么东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to get indignant, was just asking a question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这么生气，只是问个问题而已。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "You need to learn manners." EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you just said, "this place seems like a scientific loony bin," I agree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你刚才说，“这地方像是个疯狂科学家聚居地”，我同意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you all right? Kind of ran out of steam in the middle there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事吧？跟泄气了一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sound a little down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听起来有些失落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got it already, those two names give you nightmares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，那两个名字是你的噩梦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to pop a monitor shaft if you keep that up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你继续这样，你的显示屏杆就要坏掉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right... just calm down. Didn't mean to alarm you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧…淡定，淡定。不是故意吓你的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I apologize for my emotional display. But it is a serious matter what you have brought up." EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010230_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the Big Empty... uh, Big Mountain, that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我谈谈大坑洞（Big Empty）……呃，也就是大山脉。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Well, it's the nexus of all our research. Our home, you might say." EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010231_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the Big Empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我谈谈大坑洞（Big Empty）。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about these technologies Klein wants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我谈谈那些克莱因博士想要的技术吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The more you speak... something's... technical about the way you're squawking at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的越多……总觉得你冲我叫嚷的方式……似乎带有某种系统性和专业性。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Why, yes, that's correct. Well done." EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010228_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, after listening a bit - that's RobCo termlink protocol you're broadcasting, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，听了一些之后…你在播放的是罗伯科终端链接协议，对吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I couldn't possibly expect you to understand." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010229_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a... pattern to your speech or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的语言，或者别的什么……有某种模式

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Why, yes, that's correct. Well done. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010236_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're emitting characters in patterns of 8, bracketed, with tone adjustment at the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你使用和8一样的模式发言，然后在结尾处调整了一下语气。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I couldn't possibly expect you to understand." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010237_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty sure you can understand me, and I want some answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信你能理解我的意思，我想要些答案。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better not be cussing me out right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好别在骂我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is... that a yes? Or a no? Or... a yes-no?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是知道？还是不知道？还是既知道又不知道？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Dr. Mobius or the Forbidden Zone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道关于莫比乌斯博士或者禁区的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you some questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你一些问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... uh... is too bad. Or good. Or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那……唔，太糟了。或者很好。或者别的什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Questions? Like what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题？比如说？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Previous test subjects who have come here have had many questions for us. We answered them with science, fire, and termination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先前到这里的实验体也有很多问题要问我们。我们用科学、火力和终结回答了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010252_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This used to be a mountain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里以前是一座山？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Big MT was quite big indeed until the Great Static. Then the top of the mountain was used as part of a detonation experiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，大 山脉确实很大，直到“大静电”事件。在那时，山顶还被用来做爆炸试验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010251_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This cleared additional space in the Crater, however, allowing us more real estate to build upon. Convenient. Efficient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过现在这坑洞里腾出了额外空间，允许我们建造更多实验场所，真是方便高效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010251_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Previous test subjects?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先前的实验体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes. We've had other subjects visit. It's why we had to calibrate the pacification field and warm up our brainial beams and vivisectors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的。有别的实验体来过。这就是为什么我们不得不校准好平静场，准备好脑波射线和解剖器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010255_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only a short time ago, we had three minus one subjects arrive, and they ruined several experiments and even injured two of our staff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久之前，我们有“3减1”个实验体来访，他们破坏了几个试验，甚至伤了我的两个同事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010255_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is a shame their brains left with them. With you, however, we have taken precautions to insure that problem won't repeat itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个耻辱，他们居然保住了自己的脑子。但是对于你，我们已经实施了预防措施，保证同样的问题不会重演。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010255_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've conditioned you so you can't speak of this place, discuss our secrets, or attempt to use force against us in any way. Isn't that nice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经束缚住了你，所以你无法谈论这个地方，无法讨论我们的秘密，或者试图以武力反抗我们。不错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010255_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Big Empty... uh, Big Mountain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我谈谈大坑洞（Big Empty）……唔，大山脉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This mountain... now crater... encompasses the sum total of knowledge of humankind. It is Big MT. Where all questions can be answered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座山…现在的环形坑…包含有人类所有的知识。这就是大山脉，在这里，所有问题都能找到答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll see. No matter what your questions, Big MT will provide the answers. As it has done for so many before you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会看到的。不管是什么问题，大山脉都会提供答案。不管是给你，还是给你之前的许多人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Big Empty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我讲一下大坑洞（Big Empty）吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The "Big Empty?" Now, that's not a proper title for this research facility. You sound like previous test subjects that came here.
ESP.TRADUIT: “大坑洞（Big Empty）？” 其实吧，用这个代号来称呼这所研究设施并不是很妥当。你和先前来这里的那些实验体一样，弄错了这里的代号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010256_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand how the tech Klein wants will help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不理解克莱因博士想要的技术都有什么用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll all become clear. If not, at least we will have the technology here at the Dome where all technology belongs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马上就会真相大白的。就算没有，至少我们能把这些技术放回穹顶——这里是它们应该在的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we have all the technology, all the answers, we can share it with the world, piece by piece. All will be in order. And all will be like Big MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们掌握了全部的技术，找到所有的答案，我们就能跟全世界共享，一件接一件。之后万物都将井井有条，一如“大山脉”这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you remove my brain? And... how?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要拿走我的大脑？还有…你是怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, removing it is a simple procedure. Well, except the complications it can cause to the heart and spine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，取走脑子是很简单的操作，假如你不去管这样做会对心脏和脊柱造成的并发症。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010254_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But once the heart and spine are gone... no trouble at all. Clamp the subject down, one laser incision around the skull, crack, snip, done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是一旦心脏和脊柱也被去掉…那就什么问题都没有了。按紧实验体，再用镭射切开它的头骨，把脑子取出来。搞定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010254_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The brain is finally free of the skinvelope, which is then kept automated for clean up duties around Big MT. Lobotomites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑从此不再受皮囊的限制。皮囊，也就是无脑人，从此会一直在大山脉自动执行清洁任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010254_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With you, however, something is definitely wrong. We've never had a Lobotomite who kept speaking after being forcibly lobotomized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你嘛，肯定有哪里不对劲。没有一只无脑人，在我们切掉它们的脑子后，还能不停地说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010254_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am relieved the pacification field is working. If it didn't, I would broadcast some concern to my colleagues about safety protocols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸亏“平静场”还在正常运行，不然我就要和同事们抱怨安全协议的问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010254_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "First head chief researcher?" Lot of titles.
ESP.TRADUIT: “一级首席主研究员？”这头衔太多了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is a name without a title or suffix for the sake of hierarchy? It is a long-standing quantification of personality and importance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是名字不带有头衔或后缀，如何表示出一个人地位的高低？头衔可以有效量化人的品质和重要程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could not do without it. Surely you must be aware of the gravity of such attached appellations - just as surely as you must have a title.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能没有它，你必须明白这些头衔的份量，就像你自己也必须有一个头衔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 211 doctorates? How is that even possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 211个博士学位？怎么可能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, we create not only scientific marvels here at Big MT, but new sciences as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么不可能，我们在大山脉里不光创造了科学的奇迹，也创造了新的科学门类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010249_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything can be quantified, categorized, and dissected until every group can be subgrouped or partitioned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万物皆可量化、分类、解析，直至每个部分都能建立联系，并成为一个更大系统的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010249_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's "formography?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么是“形体学”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's excessive examination of the human form to achieve psychological arousal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是种过度关注人体的研究，为了达到精神上的性奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010253_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disgusting. I would never succumb to such... base appetites. Distractions. Filthy, filthy distractions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真恶心，我绝不会屈从于这种恶趣味的。真是恶趣味，太龌龊了，龌龊的恶趣味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010253_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you? What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么人？在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, my little bear of teddyness, I am Doctor Dala, first head chief researcher of mineralogy and medicinal sciences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，我的小泰迪熊。我是达拉博士，矿物学和医学的一级首席主研究员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have 211 doctorates in both applied sciences and techniques to apply those sciences. I also possess a degree in Curiosity and Advanced Curiosity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在应用科学和应用这些科学的技术领域拥有211个博士学位。我还有着好奇学和高级好奇学学位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is merely schooling, however. When possible, I prefer field work and observation to holotape eidetics. It has proven useful, especially now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然那都只是书斋上的学问。有可能的话，我更喜欢跑跑田野，做实地考察，而不是分析全息磁带的图像。这种工作方式公认很有用，尤其是现在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have become the expert on humanology and Lobotomite behavior here at Big MT. My research doesn't descend into formography, it is only Science.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在大山脉这里，我成了一名研究人类、无脑人行为的专家。我的研究只是科学而已，无关什么“形体学”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not right now. I have questions instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行，我有些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not exactly. I have questions I need answers to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不完全是。我有问题，也需要回答。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How randomized. Ask your... questions then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真独特。那你…问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An interrogation. How fascinating. Please begin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是审讯么。真吸引人。请继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001024f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you are stuck in a looping gesture of verbal intercourse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许你陷入“言语交流的循环姿势”里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010250_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and... here's a tip. That's customary, isn't it... been so long, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…给你小费，这是惯例，不是吗…上次好像都是很久以前了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012377_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: B-b-bloop. Buuuuh-buh-bloop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗噗。噗噗噗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012378_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: B-b-bloop. Phew. Last little bit there. Ahhh. Hooo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗噗…好，还差一点。啊啊，哦哦哦哦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmmmm. Thank you, Lobotomite. Please... you must come back for further study when I've had a rest. I'm a little sensitive right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…谢了，无脑人。我休息好后请你务必回来，让我进一步研究。我现在有点敏感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012379_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened with the visitors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来访者做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask Doctor O... and you could have asked 8 once, until he was severely damaged in the attack. We like him better this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问O博士去…如果8博士没在那次袭击中受损，你也可以去问他。不过我们更喜欢他现在的样子就是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010260_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was the question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他问了什么问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not know, nor should we try to access it. Perhaps Klein has the logs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我们也不该尝试再去访问它。也许克莱因还留着记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001025e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My evaluation would be to let your own curiosity go. I do not think that Klein remembers the conversation as being satisfactory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的评估是：扔掉你的好奇心吧。我觉得克莱因也不会认为这是次合意的谈话，更不会把谈话内容记住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001025e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was another Courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里还有另一个邮差来过吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. You must have met others in your travels. This one had met other couriers, too, although it sounded as if he hadn't met the correct one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。你在你的旅途中肯定也遇见过其他的同行。这个邮差也一样，尽管听起来他还没遇到对的那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001025f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He asked us all many questions, and then he asked a most perplexing one... we had to segment the event out of our memories for safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他问了我们很多问题，令人费解的问题…安全起见，我们不得不删除了那段记忆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001025f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sometimes called a "Courier."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有时被称作“邮差”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, a mailman. A delivery man. Someone who takes parcels from place to place using their primitive feet or similar conveyance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，邮递员，送信的，利用他们原始的脚，或者同样原始的代步工具，带着包裹从一个地方跑到另一个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001025d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are the second one I've met in recent times. Very different specimens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我最近遇到的第二个“邮差”。你们作为样本真是大不相同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001025d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-13 breached? No... even that stealth suit won't hide you from my Robo-Scorpion army. Sting the intruder, my pets! Sting them until they are stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: X-13被入侵了？不…在我的机械蝎面前，你就算穿了潜行服也无处可藏。宠物们，给我去蜇入侵者！把他们蜇到傻了为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03x13mobiu_000105a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you recovered the Sonic Emitter schematics - or was it the frequency? No matter. It'll broadcast your screams as my Robo-Scorpions destroy you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…你取回了声波发射器的图纸，亦或是频率？不过也不重要了，反正我的机械蝎毁灭你时，它会广播你的惨叫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03x8mobius_000105a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Mobius' message - can you replay it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能重放一遍莫比乌斯博士的来讯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF YOU MUST. HE'S CLEARLY DERANGED. ALL RIGHT, WHERE IS THE INFERNAL PLAY BUTTON? AH. HERE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你一定要的话。他已经完全疯了。好吧，那个该死的播放按钮在哪来着？啊，在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_mobiusmessage_00010711_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it isn't my old colleagues, the mighty "Think Tank" of Big MT. Big fools, all of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的老同事们吗，大山脉万能的思想体们，你们所有人都是大笨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010712_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is I, Dr. Mobius, transmitting from my dome-shaped... dome in the Forbidden Zone. A zone... that is, yes... forbidden to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我，莫比乌斯博士，我从穹顶样子的…禁区穹顶发来通讯。那里是个…对，你们被禁止靠近的区域。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010713_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even now, my deadly Robo-Scorpions swarm across Big MT with their pincers and pointy laser tails. Soon, all Science will be mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我那致命的机械蝎群正凭借着巨钳和激光尾刺横行大山脉。很快，所有的科技都将属于我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010714_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the technologies sealed in the Big MT research centers cannot save you. So cower in your "Think Tank." Wait, for the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大山脉研究中心里的技术也救不了你们。所以都给我龟缩在"智库"里，等着…你们的死期吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这些了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011952_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011953_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, is someone playing with the power...? My X-42 Giant Robo-Scorpion lives AGAIN!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，有人摆弄过电源…？我的X-42机械巨蝎又活了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00010913_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... it looks like the target drones got activated and - oh, how cute, they're engaging the X-42 Giant Robo-Scorpion. Let's see the shrapnel fly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…看起来靶机启动了…哦，太可爱了，他们在与X-42机械巨蝎交战。快看这弹片漫天纷飞的景象！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000111ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.1. Boot Damping Sensors online.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.1。靴子阻尼传感器已上线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitupgr_0001126f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.2. Aural Subnet online.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.2。听觉子网络已上线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitupgr_00011270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.3. Torso fitment synced to user's physiology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.3。使用者生理机能数据已同步至躯干配件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitupgr_00011271_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test data processed... Firmware updated to version 1.4. Impulse Accelerator online.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试数据处理完毕…固件已更新至版本1.4。脉冲加速器已上线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitupgr_00011272_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test data processed... Advanced Optics Online.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试数据处理完毕…高级光学设备已上线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitupgr_000154e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ton of things sounds good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是有成吨的瓶盖比较保险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] AGAIN, THE LOGIC OF THE REQUEST IS CLEAR. TONNAGE IS NOT NEEDED, ONLY ADEQUATE WEIGHT. EVERYONE, DISPLAY YOUR THINGS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]克莱因：又一次，你需求的逻辑很明确。成吨不至于，但要有足够重量。诸位，都拿出来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001132f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, let's be logical about this. I don't need a ton, just as much as I can carry in trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，让我们更有逻辑一点。我用不了一吨，只要在交易中足够用就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO. IF THOSE DON'T WORK, THEN YOU WILL HAVE TO SELL IT YOUR NOSE OR SOME OF YOUR PENISES.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]克莱因：没有了。如果那些没用的话，你就必须割下鼻子或一段生殖器卖掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011330_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still feels a little light. Might need a little more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是感觉有点轻。可能需要再来一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] IF I WERE NOT AS INTELLIGENT AS I AM, I WOULD FEEL AS IF PERHAPS I AM BEING TRICKED. UNPOSSIBLE. O - MORE.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]克莱因：要不是我这么聪明，我就会发现我被忽悠了。这当然是不可能的。O，再来点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011331_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd hate to come back and ask for more. A little extra would guarantee you're not disturbed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一不够，我也不希望还跑回来找你要。多给一点，我保证不会再来打搅你们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO. IF THOSE DON'T WORK, THEN YOU WILL HAVE TO SELL IT YOUR NOSE OR SOME OF YOUR PENISES.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]克莱因：没有了。如果那些没用的话，你就必须割下鼻子或一段生殖器卖掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011332_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... excuse me, do you have any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…我问一下啊，还有更多瓶盖吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] AGAIN, YOUR LOGIC IS UNASSAILABLE IN ITS SIMPLISTIC NEED. O?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]克莱因：又一次，你的逻辑在这简单的需求中无懈可击。O博士？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011319_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This amount clearly represents a deficiency in the amount of caps needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，这点数量的瓶盖距离所需数量还有一定距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO. IF THOSE DON'T WORK, THEN YOU WILL HAVE TO SELL IT YOUR NOSE OR SOME OF YOUR PENISES.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]克莱因：没有了。如果那些没用的话，你就去割下鼻子或自己的生殖器卖掉吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001131a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you say "barter?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说“交易”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I CANNOT DISPUTE YOUR LOGIC. DO WE HAVE OBJECTS TO ACTIVATE THE CHIP'S EXCHANGE ROUTINES?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的逻辑无可非议。各位，用来激活人格芯片交易功能的东西，我们这里有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can trade with the Sink Intelligence? Then I'll need something to activate that function, won't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能和汇聚节点的人工智能做交易？那我还需要些东西来激活这个功能，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO, O DID. HE FAVORS THAT ARCHAIC TERM OF COMMERCE. I SEE NO NEED TO ELABORATE ON SUCH DATED METHODS OF MATERIAL GAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]不，只有O会这样。他很偏爱那种古老的商业方式——以物易物。我实在无法理解，为什么要使用如此陈旧的方式来获取物资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001137a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... before I go "reclaim" this tech, are you sure your plan will work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…在去“回收”技术前我多问一句，你确定你的计划会奏效吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] THE PLAN IS VERY COMPLICATED. WE ARE STILL CALCULATING HOW IT WOULD WORK IF IT SUCCEEDED. THAT IS OUR PART OF THE PLAN.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]这计划很复杂。我们尚在计算它成功后将会如何运行。但那是计划里我们要做的，不是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001132b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly is the plan? You're losing me in the generalities, I need specifics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那计划到底是什么？你总是模棱两可，我想听细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] WE ARE ALWAYS SURE IN WHAT WE DO. YOU MUST BE SURE IN WHAT YOU DO. WHICH IS GETTING THESE TECHNOLOGIES FOR US.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我们永远清楚自己在干什么。你也要清楚你要干什么：为我们取回那些技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001132c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You extracted my brain... but what do you mean, "misplaced" it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们取出了我的大脑…但你说“弄丢了”是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ripped out my brain, where the hell is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是你们挖走了我的脑子，那它到底去哪了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You took out my brain, heart, and spine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们取走了我的大脑、心脏，还有脊椎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT AUTO-DOC-JUNKHEAP WAS ONE OF MOBIUS' CREATIONS, LIKE THE REST OF THE TALKING SCRAP METAL IN THE ATTIC.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：那台垃圾自动医生，像其余在楼上的能说话的废铁一样，是莫比乌斯的杰作之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011335_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *After that, the brain lost itself - not in the metaphysical sense. Might have gotten flushed into one of the pipes. Actually, that's pretty likely.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*在那之后，你的大脑就迷失了，我不是指形而上学意义上的。它可能被冲进管道里了，唔，很有可能。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011336_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -If so, it was FLUSHED all the way to MOBIUS! Fwooooooosh! That... is the sound of FLUSHING.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-那样的话，它就会一直被冲到莫比乌斯那里！哗啦！那是…我在模仿水流声。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BY THE FISSURE OF ROLANDO... ENOUGH OF THIS BIOLOGICAL SURGERY TALK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：以罗兰多脑沟之名…别再讨论这个生物的外科手术问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LOBOTOMITE, LISTEN TO MY VOICE. IT DENOMINATES ME TO ASK, BUT... WE NEED YOUR HELP.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人，听我说，我们需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011338_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IN MOST PROBABLE OF PROBABILITIES, OUR ENEMY, MOBIUS, HAS YOUR BRAIN. THIS IS NOT GOOD. HE WILL MOST LIKELY COME AFTER OUR BRAINS NEXT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的敌人，莫比乌斯，很有可能拿到了你的大脑。这可不太妙，目测他下一步就要来取我们的大脑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011338_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE WANT YOU TO STOP HIM. SOMEHOW. WITH SCIENCE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们想请你去阻止他，对，用科学的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011338_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be correct, you should say, "the Auto-Doc" took out your brain. It did all the heavy lifting. It has never worked so hard before. It was unusual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：需要纠正一下，应该说是“自动医生”取走了你的大脑。它完成了所有这些繁重的工作。它以前可没这么勤快，这很不寻常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: It worked so hard on your surgery, it destroyed its own memory. Zzt. How odd. I bet your brain remembers what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你做手术时它干得很卖力，以至于把自己的存储芯片都烧坏了。真古怪。我敢打赌你的大脑肯定还记得当时发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011333_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much surgery did you do on me? I feel like a badly-put-together jigsaw puzzle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我做了多少手术？我感觉自己像是拼图一样，被强行拼凑在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is my responsibility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：这是我的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although in truth, the Auto-Doc had done most of the work already. Quite industrious, almost cut into all my investigations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，自动医生已经完成大部分工作。它真的很能干，都快把我的工作部分也干完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011357_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once it had removed the brain and I misplaced it, other organs began to cry for direction using your nerves as telegraph wires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在它把你的大脑取走，而我又把大脑弄丢以后，你身体的其他器官就开始用神经发报，哭着喊着寻求指令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011357_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rather than let them send their signals, I removed them as well. Shhh, little organs. Go to sleep in your tanks, Dala loves you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与其让它们不停发信号，我索性连它们一并切除了。嘘嘘嘘，小器官们，回罐子里睡觉吧，达拉爱你们哟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011357_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -First, was the HEART!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-首先，是心脏！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011358_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is a little proud here, talking about brain transmissions and shit. Oh, yeah. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011359_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Wait, I mean... SECOND was the heart. Brain was first. THIRD... was the SPINE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-等等，我想说的是…第二个才是心脏。首先应该是大脑。第三个…是脊柱。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is a little proud here, talking about brain transmissions and shit. Oh, yeah. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001135b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Spine. Totally overrated, that arrangement of vertebrae.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*脊柱。看来真高估你了，你只能排在第三位。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *"Look at me, with my lumbar and thoracic curvature." Never had a use for any of that. Spineless is what I prefer.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *“瞧瞧我腰椎和胸椎的曲度。”这些都没有用，我更喜欢无脊椎。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001136b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why am I all cut up? I feel like some kid was playing with my insides.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我被切开了？我感觉就像一帮小屁孩在玩我的内脏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I hurt all over!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我浑身都是口子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] DALA. WAS IT NECESSARY THIS TIME?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]克莱因：达拉，这次有必要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001132d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't explain the laser-sutures on my chest... and on my spine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不能解释我胸口和背脊上的激光缝合口是怎么回事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] MAYBE YOU SHOULD HAVE REMOVED ITS VOICE BOX, DALA. I'M SURPRISED YOU DIDN'T, ACTUALLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]克莱因：也许你该把它的发声元件也移除掉，达拉。我真的很吃惊你竟然没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001132e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that why I feel so odd - and heavy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我感觉这么古怪和笨拙的原因？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lobtomizing? You lobotomized me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑切除？你把我的大脑切了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You removed my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们移除了我的大脑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We removed your brain, yes. So soft. Barely wrinkled, yet so... flush with knowledge and experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：是的，我们取走了你的大脑。软软的，几乎没有褶皱，而且…还充满知识和经验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001131e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brain extraction technology has been standard practice at Big MT for an immeasurable amount of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在大山脉，大脑提取技术形成一套标准操作流程已经有很长时间了，我们对此有丰富经验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001131f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Once the brain was out, then came the COILS. The TESLA coils... the coils of NIKOLA Tesla.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-一旦大脑被取出，空地儿就会被线圈占据。是特斯拉线圈…尼古拉.特斯拉的线圈。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011320_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is a little proud here, talking about brain transmissions and shit. Oh, yeah. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011321_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, 8, no need to brag. Wherever your brain is, it's transmitting thoughts to you through the... what... the, um... uh...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*对，8，没必要吹嘘。无论你大脑在哪，它还是会向你传递思想，通过…呃…通过啥…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011322_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The TESLA COILS! In its HEAD!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-特斯拉线圈！在它头里面的！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011323_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is fortunate in many respects. If your brain was anywhere in the Dome, why, you could access your aggression centers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：这挺幸运的。假如你的大脑在穹顶这的任何地方，怎么说呢，你就能发起攻击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: CIRCUMVENTING THE PACIFICATION FIELD. THIS IS A NO-NO. WE HAVE NEVER BEEN IN A FIGHT. WE DO NOT WANT THAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：那意味着“平静场”失效，这是禁忌。我们从未战斗过，我们也不想战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011325_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Reminds me of my days in American High. And Richie Marcus.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-我又想起了我念美国高中的日子，还有里奇.马库斯…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011326_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Dr. Klein, WAIT! I... I don't believe those gestures were random. Random AT ALL.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士，等等！我…我不觉得那些手势是随机的。全都不是。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011317_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It's been following our conversation! The Lobotomite... understands us!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -它在听我们说话！这只无脑人竟然…竟然能理解我们在说什么！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Display middle finger.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <竖起中指>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] NOW IT'S HOLDING UP AN ARRAY OF FULLY-ERECT HAND PENISES. IF IT TRIES TO INSERT THEM, ACTIVATE VIVISECTORS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]克莱因：现在它的手上竖起了一条勃起的生殖器。如果它想插入，马上启动活体解剖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011329_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Hold up one finger, point at self. Point at them, hold up five fingers.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <竖起一根指头，指着自己。指一指他们，伸出五根手指。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] GREAT. NOW THE PENIS ON ITS HAND IS ACHIEVING ERECTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 克莱因：该死，现在它手上的生殖器全都勃起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001132a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Blink slowly with a blank expression.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <面无表情地慢慢眨眼>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] WHAT... WHAT IS IT DOING? DID WE INSTITUTE ELECTROSHOCK? OR IS IT EXCRETING?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]克莱因：它在做什么？我们是不是电到它了？还是说，它在排泄？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011376_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Wave hands and nod.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <摆摆手点点头>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] CLEARLY THERE WAS ELECTROSHOCK. JUST LOOK AT IT, ITS FACIAL TISSUES SAGGING ALL OVER THE PLACE.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]克莱因：很明显它是触电了。看看它，面部组织全都下垂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011378_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't tell me what I need to find, I can't help you, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不告诉我应该找什么，我便无法帮助你，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. Brains can't talk... well, most brains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 少来了，大脑又不能讲话…呃，大多数不能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brain would know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的大脑会知道？

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT CAN "COMMUNICATE" THE PROCEDURE WHEN WE EXAMINE IT. IT IS CONCEIVABLE TO TRACE ITS SURGICAL SCALPELPRINTS ONCE WE HAVE THE BRAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能通过它了解当时的手术流程。一旦拿到你的大脑，我们就能循着手术刀留下的痕迹一路追索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001138d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: MIGHT TAKE SOME TIME BUT YOUR BRAIN HAS NO PAIN NERVES TO SCREAM AT US WHILE WE DISSECT IT. CONVENIENT. I DETEST SCREAMING IN MY LAB.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能要花些时间，但你的大脑没有痛感神经，也就没法在被解剖的时候朝着我们大叫。真方便，我讨厌在实验室里听到尖叫声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001138d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the Comp-Doc does... what Mobius would do if he was here, chopping me up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以自动医生干了…莫比乌斯在这也会干的事，像这样把我切开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] YES. ALWAYS LEAVES BACKDOORS INTO THINGS, HAVE TO KEEP FINDING THEM AND CLOSING THEM.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]对。他总是给东西留后门。我们总是要找出他留的后门，然后封闭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001138b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE AUTO-DOC IS NOW ERASED OF HIS ROUTINES, IT WAS THOROUGH. ONLY MOBIUS WOULD KNOW FOR SURE WHAT HAPPENED WITH THE PROCEDURE... PERHAPS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生的程序已经彻底损坏了，现在只有莫比乌斯确切地知道手术过程中发生了什么事…大概。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001138b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL, AND YOUR BRAIN, OF COURSE. IT WOULD KNOW AS WELL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，当然了，还有你的大脑，它也会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001138b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mobius set up the Auto-Doc medical routines, so you think he's responsible for the post-organ-dump?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯编写了自动医生的程序，所以你认为是他把我的大脑弄走了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] WE CAN DISCUSS THIS ANOTHER TIME WHEN YOU'VE EVOLVED. FOR NOW, MY PATIENCE LEVELS ARE RAPIDLY DEPLETING.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我们可以以后再谈这个问题，等你进化完全之后。现在，我已经快不耐烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001138c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said... "surge" code? You mean like computer stuff in the Doc?
ESP.TRADUIT: }你刚才说…“手术”代码？你是指自动医生里像软件芯片一类的东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] MOBIUS' LEGACY CODE WAS IN THE OLD AUTO-DOC, YES. IT FRIED ITSELF AFTER YOUR PROCEDURE, SO WE COULDN'T TELL FOR SURE.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]对，那台旧的自动医生确实遗留有莫比乌斯的代码。但在完成你的手术后，自动医生就烧坏了，所以我们没法确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT IS UNFORTUNATE. WE WOULD HAVE BENEFITED FROM KNOWING HOW THE BREAKTHROUGH OCCURRED. EVEN IF WE INSTALLED ANOTHER CHIP, THE INFORMATION IS LOST.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很不幸，我们本可以从你这次的手术中获益，这可是次突破性的进展。但即使我们再给自动医生装上另一个芯片，手术信息也找不回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011392_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this Auto-Doc surgery code you mentioned?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚刚提到自动医生的手术代码，那是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] WE CAN DISCUSS THIS ANOTHER TIME WHEN YOU'VE EVOLVED. FOR NOW, MY PATIENCE LEVELS ARE RAPIDLY DEPLETING.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我们可以以后再谈这个问题，等你进化完全之后。现在，我已经快不耐烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand how poisons can dumbify you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白毒药怎么能降低你们的智力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I AM NOT CERTAIN. PERHAPS IT ONLY AFFECTS MACHINES. IF SO, YOU MAY BE IMMUNE.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我不太确定。也许它只对机器有影响。如果是这样，你应该是免疫的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011398_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF IT IS CHEMS, THEN WE HAVE NOTHING TO FEAR. SINCE WE ARE AFRAID, IT MUST NOT BE CHEMS AND YOU NEED NOT FEAR, WHICH MEANS YOU CAN TEST IT. LOGICAL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它是化学品，那么我们就没什么好怕的。既然我们害怕，那它就一定不是化学品，那么你也就不必害怕，也就是说你可以安心对它进行测试。合乎逻辑吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011398_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robo-Scorpions drain intelligence from living creatures - how? Chems?
ESP.TRADUIT: 机械蝎可以降低生物的智力？怎么做到的？用化学药物吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] APPARENTLY THEY CAN. IT SEEMS AS IF YOU MAY HAVE BEEN STUNG YOURSELF.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 这不是很明显吗。看起来你自己已经被蜇伤过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011399_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... the metal scorpions can sting you stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等…机械蝎的尾刺能把你们蛰成傻子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] DR. O IS CERTAIN OF HIS FINDINGS. AND NO ONE ELSE IN THE THINK TANK IS WILLING TO TEST THE RESULTS. LOSS OF BRAINIAL POWER - TERRIFYING.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 0博士对他的发现深信不疑。我们思想体也不会有人愿意去亲身验证。大脑力量的流失…没有比这更恐怖的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001139a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: O HAS SAID ON MANY OCCASIONS HIS INABILITY TO COMPREHEND MOBIUS' ROBO-SCHEMATICS IS BECAUSE OF REPEATED ROBO-SCORPION STINGS.
ESP.TRADUIT: O博士曾经说过，很多次都是因为机械蝎尾刺的不断骚扰，他才没能解读出这些蝎子的机械电路图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001139a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These mechanical Robo-Scorpions "consume" intelligence? Are you certain of your findings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些机械蝎能“降低”智力？你确定吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] APPARENTLY THEY CAN. IT SEEMS AS IF YOU MAY HAVE BEEN STUNG YOURSELF.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]这不是很明显吗。看起来你自己已经被蜇伤过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000113a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your voice module got damaged, I heard. In an attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说，在一次袭击中，你的发声模块受损了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Sort of. It's hard to explain, but yes, the voice module is broken." EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000113b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. If someone would take the time, you're more than just sound effects in a tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。如果某些人愿意花点时间，你说起话来就不会像在罐子里发出无意义声音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no, I understand it's hard to learn a new language.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，我明白再学一门新外语很难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So your broadcast pattern is RobCo termlink, but not by choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此你的发声模式是罗伯科公司的终端链接协议，不过你不是有意这样发声的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your damaged voice module... can you tell me about the attack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你受损的发声模块…能否告诉我关于这次袭击的事？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Sort of. It's hard to explain, but yes, the voice module is broken." EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000113ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to brag, but I was always more perceptive than everyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是吹牛，但我总是比其他任何人更敏锐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, all life is patterns, you just got to let the unconscious process them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，生命都有各自的模式，你只是下意识在运行那些代码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... I just realized I'm understanding you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…我想我开始明白你在说什么了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the code's got some problems, I'm not arguing that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，代码是有些问题，我没在否认。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh-heh, nice pun on the header file ref.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿嘿，关于头文件的双关语，听着不错。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000113e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't sound too convinced there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的话听起来没什么说服力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine. Can we move on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，好的，我们能继续了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right. Don't get all sympathetic and mushy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好，别那么多愁善感嘛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like, uh, I would ever hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像..唔..我会伤害你们。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Why, yes, that's correct. Well done." EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000114ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what it means to be attacked without warning, trust me, 8.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在没有戒备的情况下被突然袭击…我知道这是什么滋味，真的，相信我，8。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I couldn't possibly expect you to understand." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000114b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No wonder you're all skittish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难怪你们变得那么胆小。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that took control of the trains? Before you all shut it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他借此控制了所有火车？在你有机会关掉它之前。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So one of the visitors didn't damage it - he reprogrammed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以其中一位来访者没有破坏O，而是重编了它的程序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a waste of time, forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是在浪费时间，算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not... sure. What you meant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…确定，你什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't catch that. Maybe part of the damage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不怎么了解，或许是那次损伤的一部分？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't really have a choice. And thanks for the gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的没有别的选择，多亏了你在用的这副罗伯科装备。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000114dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it won't work on attack protocols. Still, I may need someone on my side in a debate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这对攻击协议没什么用。不过，在争论中我可能会需要有人站在我这边。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011476_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And lastly, if I ever need you to blindly agree with me, you will. Understood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，视乎我的需要，你得随时准备无条件支持我。明白了吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011475_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, unlock your room, I want what's in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，打开你的房间，我想要里面的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And some Microfusion Cells...
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一些微型核聚变电池…

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011478_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Let's see what you have. I'll take these Energy Cells...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。让我看看你都有些什么。我可以拿走这些能量电池…

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001147c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, don't make me regret this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，别让我为此后悔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right, quit your grinning, you idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，把你咧着的嘴闭上，你个白痴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a problem. I know what it's like to be experimented on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题不大，我知道被当成试验对象是什么感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll only take a second to violate your rights and make your voice mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！只需几秒钟就能剥夺你的权限，把你的声音变成我的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001147b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's termlink code, don't worry, I'm not going to take advantage of your exposed code.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算那是终端链接代码，也别担心，我不会利用你暴露出来的代码的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011479_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011479_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... if you're speaking that code stuff, I can hack you, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…既然你在用的是那些代码，那我岂不是有办法黑掉你？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Why, yes, that's correct. Well done." EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001147d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's RobCo termlink protocol, doesn't that mean it can be hacked?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是罗伯科终端链接协议，岂不是说我能把它黑掉？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "I couldn't possibly expect you to understand." EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001148a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The less said about it, the better. Let's move on and forget about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再说了。让我们忘掉它，这事就让它过去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Usually, I can find some Cram lying around. Put some duct tape around the lid, good to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常，我能在身边找到一些罐头，只要把胶带贴在盖子周围就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I usually just take a fusion cell and oscillate its charge, vibrates for like, an hour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通常取一块核聚变电池，使它里面的电荷震荡，震荡一小时。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing to be embarrassed about, it's just that it's best to keep that stuff private, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么不好意思的，只不过最好还是在私密场合干那事，懂吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there had to be some other way to fire it up. Can we at least talk it over next time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，一定有其他方法能让它启动。下次我们能至少先商量一下吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "Yes... ahem... sorry about that." EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001147a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you fire up the Sonic Emitter when I arrived again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我返回时你是怎么把声波发射器启动的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, about when I first arrived. Tell me you didn't sonjaculate into the... my... Sonic Emitter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当我第一次回来的时候，你没射在我的声波发射器上，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I have a Mentat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能给我来个曼他特么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, of course you can. I am well-versed in the Science of sharing. Well, when not chemmed out of my sphere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，当然可以。我一向乐于分享。嗯，只要我没磕药嗑到失去理智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011524_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another? Why, of course. Happy to contribute to Science through chemistry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再来一颗？当然可以。很高兴能够利用化学药品来为科学做贡献。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back within the sequential span of twenty-five hours minus one, I'll have more... or is it two or three more spans? Time, you elusive creature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过25减1个小时的时间单位后再来找我，我就有更多能给你了…又或者要再过两到三个时间单位？哦时间，你可真难捉摸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011525_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. More energy cells. Just what I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。更多的能量电池，正是我需要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... hey, thanks. Don't want it to run out, you're right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢…嘿，多谢。说得对，别让它没电了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right, don't get too pleased to see it working at full capacity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，看到它满负荷运转别太兴奋了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be proud. It's a nice device.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该骄傲。这个发射器真的很好用。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000116b6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something wrong? Your monitors are getting all fuzzy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出了什么事？你的显示器都花了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kind of creeping me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你吓了我一跳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you okay? You look... really happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？你看起来…真的很开心。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000116a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad the force field disruption only works here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太糟了，力场失效只能在大山脉这里起作用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a little slow to fire, but the force field disabling frequency is handy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它开火有点慢，不过用来让力场失效的频率倒是挺好用的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy, too. Can't let this thing gather dust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很高兴。不能让这东西就此蒙尘。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001167f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the Emitter fully upgraded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把发射器升级到顶了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001167e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may have already picked up both, I grab almost anything that's not nailed down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我或许已经将它俩都纳入囊中。我基本上把所有能捡的东西都捡了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I got it all down, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没，我都拿到了，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fan of the opera, huh? All right - the jukebox is installed in the Sink, got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是个歌剧迷，对吧？好吧，点唱机在汇聚节点那里能找到，我明白了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, how many? One... or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，多少个？一个…还是…？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, two codes. One for the jukebox, and one for the opera. Nice. I'll keep an eye out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你的房子里有两个代码。一个用来解锁点唱机，一个是歌剧的音频样本。太好了，我会留意的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011681_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there's an emitter code in your house in Higgs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说，你在希格斯村的住宅里有一个声波发射器的代码？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011543_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what - you want me to rob your place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，什么？你想让我抢劫你的房子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So your house is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你的房子是在那儿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I didn't rob your place, but it's this big hangar in the middle of the Crater, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么说呢，我没有抢劫过你的房子，但在环形坑里有这么大一个棚，所以嘛…

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds interesting. Sure, directions would be nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很有趣。确实，有人指路就方便多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I've been there. Higgs Village, right? Your house is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我去过那儿。希格斯村，对吧？你的房子在那儿？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011542_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Higgs' Village? Can you point it out on my Pip-Boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 希格斯村？你能在我的哔哔小子上标出来么？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000116b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well "projecto" is kind of evident. "Emitter" works better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，用“射”太露骨了。用“发射“会更好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I understood that part already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我已经理解了那部分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？嗯。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011682_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011682_2.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011682_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that we know each other better, can you tell me about the Sonic Emitter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我们彼此更加了解了，你能给我讲讲声波发射器吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011680_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011680_2.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011680_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. I don't plan on hacking your voice module this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点！我这次没打算黑进你的发声模块。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there's power in zero. It reduces anything multiplied against it - to zero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这就是0的力量。任何东西想要乘它…都会变成0。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Well, of course it does. That's the most lethal of mathematics...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *好吧，的确如此。这是最致命的数学运算…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000118ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea how you incompetents survived this long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真不知道像你们这样的无能之辈怎么能活这么久。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *We're smart. Smarter than we give ourselves credit for. I was smart enough to talk to you, give you a chance - and now look what happened!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我们很聪明。比我们自己认为的还要聪明。我真是够聪明的，居然来和你对话，给你一个机会…现在看看都发生了些什么！*
