ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you've seen some of those big, imposing Securitrons with their lovely laser guns and rocket launchers and scary faces? I'm not one of those.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能已经见过那些大块头电子保安了吧？它们身上架着激光枪和火箭发射器，一脸凶相。我和他们可不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. O was always jealous of House Industries, and he thought it would be fucking hilarious to build a tiny neurotic Securitron. Big fucking laugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: O博士很嫉妒豪斯的产业，他认为造一个神经质的小小电子保安会很滑稽。太他妈好笑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, umm... you got any coffee cups for me now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，所以你现在有些咖啡杯要给我了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mugs? Why do you want mugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杯子？你为什么想要杯子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you want mugs? Huh? You some kind of sick mug hoarder? Oh god, give me the coffee cup, please! It's sitting there in your pack, taunting me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你想要杯子？嗯？你有囤积杯子的病态癖好？哦天呐，快把咖啡杯给我，求你了！就在你的包里，只管嘲弄我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry... I'm sorry. I got a little carried away. It's just all those goddamn dirty dishes out there with no one to clean them! It breaks my heart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，实在对不起，我有点激动了，都怪这些该死的脏盘子没人洗！我心都要碎了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you do anything besides processing books?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你除了处理书籍，还能干什么其他事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What good is eradicating sedition if the malcontents have ready access to the means to make more, Citizen? I can also process pencils and clipboards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 公民，假如逆民们还有办法生产更多反动文字，又如何能消除反动呢？所以我还能销毁铅笔和写字板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a moment - pencil processors off-line? Pencil processors off-line?! Apologies, Citizen, it seems traitors have absconded with that module.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，铅笔处理程序离线中？铅笔处理程序离线？抱歉，公民，似乎有叛徒带着那模块潜逃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can find a backup copy of the module, I will happily eradicate your ability to create seditious literature!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到这个模块的备份，我很乐意帮你根除创作反动文字的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are there so many personality modules?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这里有那么多的人格模块？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I am given to understand, sir, this facility was once the property of a Dr. Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 若我没有记错的话，老爷，这里曾经属于莫比乌斯博士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He crafted the personality modules as part of a collection of experiments on the subject of machine/human interface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他精心制造了这些人格模块，作为他人机交互系列课题实验的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As to the reason for the unusual choices of devices to receive the modules, I cannot say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于为什么不同设备要安装不同的人格模块，这点我不能告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000128e9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, not now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又思考了一下，还是下次再说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready, let's do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，我们开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Just try to relax, this won't hurt - unless your sense of self is especially vulnerable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，试着放轻松，一点也不疼，除非你是一个对疼痛非常敏感的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012c9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说的没错，我对谁都这么说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... well... it's... nice to be included?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…好吧…我很荣幸…成为她们中的一员？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never. I'm all yours, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从来没有，我只有你一个，宝贝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, don't you go getting a girl's hopes up if you don't mean it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没办法满足一个女孩的愿望，就别许下诺言！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, who am I kidding, I'll believe you anyways! Why don't you take this - to remember me by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我在和谁开玩笑呢。放心，我完全信任你！为什么不收下这个，好使你能记起我呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the sexy ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有性感火辣的那些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I know you're flirting with me. And it's working. Why don't you take this - to remember me by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在知道你不过是在和我调情了，而且你成功了。为什么不收下这个，好使你能记起我呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A light switch that turns me on? I must be dreaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个如此诱人的电灯开关？我一定是在做梦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you! I bet you say that to all the light switches!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你这个家伙！我猜你对哪个灯开关都是这么说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you! I bet you say that to all the light switches!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你这个家伙！我猜你对哪个灯开关都是这么说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. I'll let you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，我到时会来找你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't keep me waiting too long, honey!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别让我等太久，亲爱的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why wait? I can talk about theorems right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要等？我现在就能聊那些定理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down there, tiger - we've got all the time in the world. No need to rush into things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 慢一点，我的小老虎，我们有的是时间，没必要那么猴急。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012c9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you take some time to brush up on your knowledge so we can keep things... stimulating?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不花点时间温习一下知识呢，这样讨论起来才…更刺激嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012c9d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd enjoy that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我乐意至极。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me too. Hope you can keep up - I work pretty fast. Here - something for you to brush up on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是，希望你能跟上，我运转的非常快。来，给你，有些能帮你复习的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not often I meet a light switch with brains and beauty. I think I'm going to like it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很少见到像你这样才貌双全的电灯开关了。我想我会喜欢上这儿的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... well, that's very sweet of you. Maybe one of these nights we can... discuss theorems?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…好吧，你嘴巴真甜。也许哪天晚上我们能在一起…讨论下定理？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... well, that's very sweet of you. Maybe one of these nights we can... discuss theorems?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…好吧，你嘴巴真甜。也许哪天晚上我们能在一起…讨论下定理？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012ca7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I'll worry you by telling you what House and his robots have been up to since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我不介意告诉你豪斯和他的那些机器人们一直在忙些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Worry about House? Why would I do that? Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *关心豪斯？我为什么要关心他？我只希望他能一个人死在某个昏暗的房子里，最后一滴体液都被榨进那些罐子里。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012cb1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And him and his dirty girl-bots. Don't even get me started on those filthy biological catcher's mitts.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *他和他那个肮脏的女机器人。别想让我碰这些肮脏玩意一下。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012cb1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you don't need to worry about Mr. House anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，现在你再也不需要担心什么豪斯先生了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Worry about House? Why would I do that? Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *关心豪斯？我为什么要关心他？我只希望他能一个人死在某个昏暗的房子里，最后一滴体液都被榨进罐子里。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012cb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And him and his dirty girl-bots. Don't even get me started on those filthy biological catcher's mitts.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *他和他那个肮脏的女机器人。别想让我碰这些肮脏玩意一下。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012cb2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I encountered your "pet" in X-8 and had to kill it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在X-8碰到了你的“宠物”，并且不得不杀了它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I encountered your "pet" in X-8.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在X-8碰到了你的“宠物”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A good hit with a hammer might fix your monitor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用锤子狠狠砸一下，应该就能修好你的显示屏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The ghosts aren't real? That changes everything. Why, I can save my computing power for other perceptual unpossibilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]那些幽灵似的影子不是真的？这简直改变了一切。哎，这下我能把算力省下来，去观测其他不可能现象了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please be my guest... the receptor is there... and the side-switching wobbly-bob, just turn that... good, good, better...
ESP.TRADUIT: 麻烦你了…接收器在这…然后转一下这边旋钮。对…对…好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... oooooh, yes, that feels wonderful. Mmmmm. This is even better than my afternoon Mentats break. Mmmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…那感觉太舒服了。嗯…这比我每天下午小憩嗑曼他特的时候还要舒服，嗯…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d04_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't fix your monitor, but if you're getting ghost reception, I can fix that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我修不好你的显示屏，但如果你看东西有重影，我能帮你解决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Oh, I tried that already. Might have contributated to the problem, now that I re-think it. But, thank you for asking before trying it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]哦，我也试过这个办法。现在再想想，也许就是那时候我把显示屏砸坏了。不管怎样，还是谢谢你在尝试砸之前先问我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, you've got a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Hmm. I didn't expect you to actually agree to that. I'm afraid that was a bit of a bluff, really. I'm not going with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？嗯…我没想到你会同意，还想着刚说的会有点唬人呢。但我不会和你走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right. A deal it is, then. Glad to hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你答应了我的条件。我还是很开心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will PERMIT you to do this. For ME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会允许你这么做，不过得听我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: PARTNER WITH YOU? MY FOE? MY RIVAL?! MY FOREMOST CRITIC?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你合作？我的敌人？我的对手？我最大的批判者？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013219_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I HAVE A STRANGE SENSATION... THAT I WOULD LIKE THAT. HOW... ODD.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有种奇怪的感觉…我觉得自己会喜欢这样的关系，这…真古怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013219_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: VERY WELL... PARTNER. THE THINK TANK IS AT YOUR SERVICE. AS LONG AS YOU DO NOT DESTROY US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好…伙伴，我们会和你合作。思想体随时乐意效劳，只要你不消灭我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013219_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He... er, I, offer a DEAL. Stay HERE. Stay PUT, and he'll... I'll let you LIVE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他……呃……我和你做个交易，你留在这里，老实点，然后他会……我会让你活下去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose now that we're reunited, you'll want to fill your torso up with those other meaty parts the Think Tank took from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想既然你我团聚了，你也会想着将思想体们拿走的其他零件装回身体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I think your upgrades are quite a bit better, but now that I'm with you the Sink's Auto-Doc can plug them back in, no problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 个人来说，我认为你身上的升级版要好一点，但既然现在我跟你在一起，汇聚节点的自动医生也可以把原装版塞回去，没问题的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, then, off we go. Klein will be in for a nasty shock when he realizes the pacification field won't work on a mind and body reunited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那么我们这就走吧。克莱因意识到平静场对重新整合思维和身体的人不起作用之后，他一定会发疯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, then - you'd best be off, hadn't you? The Think Tank will be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那么你这就走吧，你觉得呢？思想体已经在等你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't worry about me - when you're gone, I'll flush myself over to the Sink. It's amazing how far you can get in this place with a good flush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别担心我。你走了以后，我会把自己冲到汇聚节点那里。很难想象从这里你能一下子冲这么远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep myself hidden in the ductwork - Klein won't suspect I'm inside the Dome, so he won't know the pacification field no longer works on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会藏在通风管道里。克莱因不会想到我就藏在穹顶，所以他不会知道平静场不再对我们生效了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also upgrade the Sink's Auto-Doc with the procedures to reinstall your heart and spine - assuming you want all that flesh and gristle back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也能升级汇聚节点自动医生的程序，这样它就能重新安装你的心脏和脊椎了，如果你想要它们回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With any luck, I'll see you in the Sink when this is all over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，当一切了结以后，咱们在汇聚节点再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001321f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if I don't get my brain back in my head, I can't leave, ever?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果没法把大脑放回我的脑壳里，我就永远没法离开这了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no. I doubt your brain would be so unraisinable. It already knows the trick of it, you see. Doesn't need to be in a host body at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不是，我想你的大脑应该不会如此蛮不讲理。它已经掌握了窍门，现在它不需要在你的脑壳里，你也有机会离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013222_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you become friends or exist in an uneasy truce with weapons aimed at each other, it would unlock the fence for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们能成为朋友，或者哪怕剑拔弩张但能暂时休战，它就会为你解除雷达屏障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013222_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, once the Think Tank was... dealt with, of course. Your brain is a responsible sort, doesn't want mad scientists running around everywhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，得在思想体…被妥善处理之后。毕竟你的大脑相当有责任感，它不会放任疯狂科学家们到处乱窜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013222_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Data collection array... Online. Please use the terminal below to begin user synchronization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 数据收集阵列，已上线，请使用下面的终端来开始用户同步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13b_0001348d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I feel... passive? I should be angry - real angry, and I'm not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我会觉得…如此消极？我应该生气，真正的生气，但是我并没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you all, and what is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们究竟是谁，这到底是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I'm guessing that crashed satellite was yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我猜那个坠毁的卫星是你们的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THOSE WERE WORDS, WEREN'T THEY? IN THE FORM OF QUESTIONS. IT'S ASKING ME QUESTIONS. IS THIS SOME KIND OF TRICK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：它在说话，不是吗？以问题的形式。它在问我问题。这是什么戏法吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011302_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm seconds away from smashing your monitors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直想要砸烂你们的显示器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I want to know how I got here... and how I get home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想知道我是怎么来这里的，以及我怎样才能回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lobotomite?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wake up here, all cut apart, and I want some answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这醒来，发现自己被切开了，所以我需要个解释。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you the ones who performed this surgery on me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是你们给我做的手术？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... was at a theater, then... I was here. What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…之前在个影院里，然后我就到了这，这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DID... DID IT JUST SAY SOMETHING? ANYONE CATCH THAT? BOROUS, YOU WORK WITH ANIMALS, TRANSLATE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：它…它刚才说了什么吗？谁听到了吗？鲍鲁斯，你研究的是动物，给我翻译下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you all speaking through that one voice box?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们怎么说话都是通过同一个音箱的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to cut your speech off - is there something coming in on the big monitor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想打断你们的演讲。但那个大屏幕上是不是显示了什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard this place called the "Big Empty."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说这个地方叫“大坑洞”（Big Empty）？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES, BECAUSE THE INTELLECTUALLY CHALLENGED SEE AN "M" AND A "T" NEXT TO EACH OTHER AND TAKE OCCAM'S RAZOR TO IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，因为一些自作聪明的智障看到“M”和“T”紧挨着（Mountain, MT, Empty），于是就举起了奥卡姆剃刀…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHILE YOU ARE HERE, YOU WILL REFER TO THIS PLACE PROPERLY - AND YOU WILL DO THE SAME WITH THE OTHER... SCIENTISTS HERE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这待久了，你就能正确称呼这个地方。就像你也能正确称呼这里其它…科学家的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ec_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who were these visitors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些来访者是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DR. 8 AND DR. O COULD TELL YOU MORE. DR. O MORE THAN 8, THE BATTLE AGAINST THE VISITORS DAMAGED 8'S VOICE MODULE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 8博士和O博士会给你解释的。O博士会解释的更多点，在和入侵者的战斗中，8博士的发音模块损坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SUFFICE TO SAY, THOSE VISITORS ARE UNWELCOME. THEY STOLE A GREAT MANY SECRETS AND MUCH TECHNOLOGY. IMPERTINENT. THEY ALSO BROKE ONE OF MY TRAINS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白说，那些来访者不受欢迎。他们窃取了许多秘密和技术，粗暴无礼，还弄坏了我们的一辆火车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I like to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我喜欢战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the anti-aggression programming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要激活这里的反入侵程序？

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE HAD TO TAKE PRECAUTIONS AFTER THE LAST VISITORS. THEY CAUSED A GREAT DEAL OF DAMAGE IN A SHORT TIME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在上次入侵事件后不得不采取预防措施。上一批来访者，他们短时间内造成了巨大破坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SHOULD HAVE MADE SURE THEY COULDN'T MENTION BIG MT ONCE THEY LEFT. AN OVERSIGHT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本该确保他们离开后不会提及大山脉。这是个疏忽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem like the one in charge. You are...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来是这里管事的，你是……？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I AM DR. KLEIN, CHIEF HEAD RESEARCHER OF LOGISTICAL OPERATIONS AND IDEA-OLOGY HERE AT BIG MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是克莱因博士，大山脉的逻辑处理和理念学的首席研究员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I AM SURPRISED YOU HAVE NOT HEARD OF ME. I AM FIRST IN MY FIELD. FIRST CHAIR, AS IT WERE, BACK IN THE DAYS OF CHAIRS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惊讶你竟然没有听说过我，我在我的领域是第一人。如果还在以往排座次的时候，我能坐第一把交椅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know about the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了解下禁区的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT GLOWING RED SCAR? THAT LASER-LOBOTOMY-CANYON-MAZE CARVED IN THE LANDSCAPE AS IF BY SOME CHILD? IT IS MOBIUS' "FORTRESS."
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个发出红光的疤痕？那个像被激光切开的大脑一样沟壑遍布地方？那片像是小孩雕刻出来的迷宫？那里是莫比乌斯的“城堡”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FROM THAT HEMORRHOIDAL FISSURE HE SENDS HIS "AMAZING" ROBO-SCORPIONS TO TERRIFY AND IRRITATE US. HMPH. HE ALWAYS TENDED TO THE DRAMATIC.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那九曲十八弯的裂隙里，他派出那些“惊人的”机械蝎，恐吓我们，骚扰我们。嗯，他总是那么戏剧化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THIS... IS THE THINK TANK, THE NERVE CENTER OF BIG MT, THE GREATEST RESEARCH CENTER KNOWN TO MAN. AND TO US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是智库，大山脉的中枢，人们和我们所知道的最伟大的研究中心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HERE, WE TEST AND TEST AND TEST SOME MORE, IN THE NAME OF... SCIENCE. ATOMIC POWER. NUCLEAR POWER. AND SCIENTIFIC POWER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这，我们以科学的名义…不停地实验，不停地测试，测试原子，测试核能，测试科学的无穷力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I have this strange... passive sensation in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么在这我会有一种奇怪的…消极的感觉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT'S A SIDE EFFECT OF THE CEREBRAL SCRUBBING. IT WON'T STOP YOU FROM EXCRETING - OR ASKING QUESTIONS, APPARENTLY. HAVE TO CORRECT THAT NEXT TIME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是洗脑的副作用。很明显，它没法阻止你排泄或提问。我们下次得修正这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HORMONAL AGGRESSIVE TENDENCIES ARE ACTIVELY SUPPRESSED, HOWEVER. THEY ARE A NO-NO, AND NOT PERMITTED IN THE THINK TANK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，它会抑制攻击倾向的激素分泌。智库里不允许有任何危险因素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE SCRUBBING ALSO ENSURES YOUR SILENCE TO KEEP BIG MT SAFE. THIS FACILITY IS TOP SECRET, AND YOU CANNOT SPEAK OF IT TO ANYONE OUTSIDE OF BIG MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洗脑也是为了让你保持沉默，以保证大山脉的安全。这个设施的存在是最高机密，你不能对大山脉之外的任何人提起它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134eb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SHOULD HAVE DONE IT WITH THE LAST BATCH. AND THE ANTI-AGGRESSION SCRUB.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本该在上一批家伙来的时候，就建好这个反入侵的洗脑装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is Dr. Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯博士是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DR. MOBIUS WAS... NOT THE HORRIFYING CREATURE YOU SAW UPON THE SCREEN, TWISTED BY SCIENCE. HE WAS ONCE ONE OF US. A FRIEND.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯博士不是你在大屏幕上看到的那个被科学扭曲的怪物，相反他曾经是我们中的一员，是我们的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HE RESEARCHED IN DIRECTIONS CONTRARY TO THE THINK TANK. BRAINS, BRAINS, BRAINS. ALWAYS ABOUT THE BRAINS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的研究和我们思想体正好相反，大脑，大脑，大脑，总是那些大脑的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SO WE EXILED HIM. HE SAYS HE LEFT OF HIS OWN VOLITION, BUT THAT WAS TO SAVE HIM THE EMBARRASSMENT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们就驱逐了他，他坚持说他是自愿要离开的，但那是照顾到他的面子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOW HE SENDS HIS INTELLIGENCE-CONSUMING SCORPIONS FROM THE FORBIDDEN ZONE TO PLUNDER THE SECRETS OF BIG MT. HE'S A MENACE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他从禁区派遣“能降智”机械蝎，来抢夺我们大山脉的秘密，他对我们是个威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000134ef_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have other questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: MORE? VERY WELL. DO YOUR ASKING, THEN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有？好吧，那就问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_kleinquestionto_000134f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: QUESTIONS? IS IT ALLOWED TO ASK QUESTIONS?
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题？这里允许随便提问吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_kleinquestionto_000134f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My advanced degree in Curiosity says let the Lobotomite ask, Dr. Klein. The topics might be... most curious, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因博士，我的好奇学高级学位告诉我，应该让这无脑人问。实际上，这话题可能会是最令人好奇的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_kleinquestionto_000134f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead, you might make me more fertile or impregnate me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，也许你还能加强我的生育能力，或者让我怀孕呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Impregnate YOU? What, do you want to make me VOMIT inside my tank?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -让你怀孕？别逗了，你还想让我在我的容器里射出来吗？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013509_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The mere NOTION makes the edges of my biomed gel crystallize into asymmetrical patterns.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -光是想想就让我的生物凝胶晶状体边缘变得不均匀了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013509_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that's all right, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还是算了，相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Oh, that's too bad. Perhaps we can perform a sterility castration some other time, then.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -哦，那太糟了。也许我们可以改天再做绝育手术。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013519_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Submit your questions! I shall respond - with deadly ANSWERS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -提出你的问题！我会给你一个无可置疑的答案。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_borousquestiont_0001350f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think they're sterile, they breed, all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为它们是不孕的，它们能繁殖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I cannot expect a LOBOTOMITE to understand the careful surgical castrating procedures used in their creation.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我也不指望一只无脑人能理解我创造这些生物时进行的绝育手术有多精妙。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013517_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Perhaps a demonstration of my castrating POWER would settle your doubts.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -也许展示一下我做绝育手术的能力就能打消你的疑虑。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013517_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think they haven't escaped?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么原因让你认为他们没有逃出去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Because Big MT's safety measures are far more sophisticated than their primitive animal instincts. WE are their lords and masters.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -很简单，大山脉布置的安保系统比那些原始动物本能要精密得多。我们就是它们的上帝和主人。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001350c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Contained at Big Mountain? Those things are all over the Mojave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 被圈养在大山脉里？它们早就遍布整个莫哈维了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: -No, such creatures are found only here, for research purposes. They would no more be capable of escape than breeding.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -胡说，那些生物只存在于此，用作科学研究。根本不可能跑出去，更别说繁殖了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013518_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nightstalkers? Those crazy coyote-snake... things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 夜行兽？你指那些疯狂的郊狼和蛇的…混合体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are responsible for Cazadores?
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎蜂也跟你有关？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Indeed. Docile. Curious. Safe. Sterile. They are contained here at Big MT to preserve DNA and for observation.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -对。这种生物性格温顺、好奇心强、很安全，而且高度不育。它们被圈养在大山脉里以供DNA保存和实验观察。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001350d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Big Em... uh, Big Mountain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能跟我说说大坑…呃，大山脉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It is our HOME. THREATENED by the horrors of Mobius.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这是我们的家园！它在莫比乌斯恐怖威胁下危在旦夕！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013510_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -All we wish to do is continue our research, layer upon layer, above and beneath the floor of the Crater until we have our answers.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我们唯一的愿望就是继续研究，地上地下，一层层地不断研究，直到找到答案。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013510_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But NO! Mobius will not let us rest. Scaring us with his scary robots with their laser tails and blowing up all the time.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -但是不！莫比乌斯不会让我们休息。他用那些长着镭射尾巴，整天爆炸的机械蝎吓唬我们。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013510_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Big Empty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我讲讲大坑洞（Big Empty）吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -That castrated nickname of our facility is NOT its true name. The true name is: BIG MT. Where are your manners?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那个掐头去尾的外号（Big Empty）绝不是它真正的名字。它真正的名字是：大山脉（BIG MT）。你的规矩都丢哪儿去了？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013508_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does Klein want these particular technologies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么克莱因专门想要这些技术？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There is LOGIC and purpose in it. If these technologies are needed to pierce the FORBIDDEN ZONE... so be IT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -自然有逻辑和目的蕴含其中。如果必须有这些技术才能突入禁区…那就是这样。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013511_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Science! is powerful, and in the right hands... OUR hands... if we had hands, we would be nigh-unstoppable!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -科学的力量，无比强大！掌握在正确的人手中…我们手中…好吧如果我们有手，我们就将所向无敌！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013511_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know more about Mobius and the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于莫比乌斯和禁区，我想知道更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The malignant tumor that is Mobius plagues us ALL. His hunger for power, INSATIABLE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那恶性肿瘤，莫比乌斯，折磨着我们所有人。他对权力的饥渴，永远无法被满足。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001350e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -From his LAIR in the FORBIDDEN ZONE, his terrifying ROBO-SCORPION army clicks and whirs across the crater of Big MT. EVER-seeking. EVER-stinging.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -他那可怕的机械蝎大军从禁区里倾巢而出，轰鸣着横扫整个大山脉。搜索，蜇人，永不停歇！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001350e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -He must be STOPPED. Or all of Big MT... shall be DESTROYED.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -必须阻止他。否则整个大山脉…将被破坏殆尽。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001350e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you - what do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -BEFORE you is the brain of Dr. Borous. Head of Animalogy, Beastology, and DNA-Scrambling technology here at Big MT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你面前是鲍鲁斯博士的大脑。大山脉动物学、野兽学和DNA重组技术的首席。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013514_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I lay the bones and hearts of animals bare beneath my searing gaze. Especially the dogs. I did so love dogs once. Especially Gabe, that rascal.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我带着灼热的目光研究动物的骨头，心脏。尤其是狗，我以前真的很喜欢狗。特别是加布，那个小淘气。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013514_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But there are MANY animals to shape. Industrious Cazadores, the happy-go-lucky Nightstalkers... they are my living, breathing DNA test tubes.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -但还有很多动物可以塑造。勤劳的猎蜂，快乐的夜行兽…它们都是我活生生的DNA试管。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013514_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. I just had some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点。我只想问些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Just as I feared! Questions, quizzes, just as there were in American High School! And if there are NO answers, how will the Think Tank graduate?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -正如我害怕的！问题、小测，就像这里是美国中学！如果没法作答，思想体该怎么毕业啊？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013512_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you always get this dramatic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么总是像表演戏剧一样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -DRAMA? There is no DRAMA in Science! As I learned in High School, Science! is an intellectual pursuit DEVOID of bestial emotions.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -戏剧？科学中没有戏剧的位置！正如我在高中学到的，科学，是不受原始情感左右的理性工作！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013513_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Unless, of course, you are a Communist. Like Betsy Bright, who "sat" "next" to me in math. And her smoking confederate, Richie Marcus.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -当然，除非你是一个共产主义分子。就像我数学课的同桌贝琪·布莱特，还有她的烟友，里奇·马库斯。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013513_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -As I learned in my High School, American High, AHS, "Drama" is for movies, things of FICTION. Here, in the Think Tank, the ONLY star is... SCIENCE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -就像我在高中——美国高中学到的那样。“戏剧”就像电影，是虚构的东西。而在思想体里，唯一的明星是….科学！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013513_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Animal? Did you just call me an animal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 动物？你刚刚把我称作动物？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Yes, animal. Hormones, pores, GLANDS, all wrapped up in SKIN. Who knows what terrifying secrets lie beneath your EPIDERMIS?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是的，动物。激素、毛孔、腺体，全都被包裹在皮肤里。谁能知道你的表皮下还藏着什么可怕的秘密？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001350b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Scalpels shall tell us your secrets, even if we must cut DEEP for such knowledge. I was head of my Biology class at American High, you know.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -解剖刀能够告诉我们你的秘密，为了这些知识我们可能需要切得深一点。知道吗，我在美国高中时可是生物课代表。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001350b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这么说？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein knows things we don't. And I think he told some of those things to the last visitor. Dangerous things if they ever got out.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *克莱因知道我们不知道的东西。我认为他将其中一些告诉了最后那位来访者。如果那些东西从这里泄露出去，那就很危险了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013530_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who were the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Two other human specimens. One arrived not long after the troublemaker... and the last one, not sure when he showed up.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *另外两个人类样本。其中一个紧随那捣乱者而来…另一个，我也不确定他是何时出现的。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Thought the first one was going to be lobotomized in Y-17, she got out somehow.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *本以为其中一个会在Y-17执行大脑切除手术，结果她不知用什么方法逃了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *The last subject... Klein might know more. He talked to him, then let him leave the Think Tank. Hope he knew what he was doing.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *最后那个实验体…克莱因可能知道的更多。他们聊过，然后克莱因放他离开了智库。希望他知道自己在干什么。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *This human... I can't believe it... he broke out of the Think Tank. In seconds.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *这个人类…简直难以置信…他只用了几秒钟就逃出了智库。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Then he went for Yangtze, got bomb collars, and started practicing on the subjects that were still there until he got the right frequency.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *然后他去了长江集中营，拿到了爆炸项圈，开始用还留在那里的实验体做试验，直到找到正确的频率。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *We were sending robots to stop him and he was slicing and cutting through their shells with some suped-up laser gun like they were cheese... paper.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我们派机器人去阻止他，他拿着几把强力激光枪切开它们的装甲，就像切奶酪…或者纸。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *When he hacked into the mainframe, 8 tried to stop him and got fried. Me? He rerouted my processors to take control of the train network here.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *当他黑进中央处理器的时候，8试图阻止他，结果被烧坏了。我？他黑进我的处理器，控制了这儿的火车网络。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *If you see the tunnels with the trains plowed into them, you can thank our visitor for that. He wrecked the whole place.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *如果你看见有些被火车堵住的隧道，那就是这位来访者的手笔，他把这地方搞得一团糟。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *While we were trying to keep containment on the surface, turns out he used one train to punch out a tunnel and escape... sealed now, but...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *在我们试图夺回控制时，他用一辆的火车撞开隧道逃了出去…现在那里也堵了，但…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't sound impressive - breaking machines, that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听上去让人不齿，那是在破坏机器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Who asked you? You just wait until a working machine threatens you, and you'll wish I was around!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *管你怎么想。等到一个运转中的机器追杀你的时候，你就会希望我在你身边了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013535_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Giant Robot Scorpion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个机械巨蝎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, crazy right? Something right out of a Midnight Science Fiction Feature. Ridiculous. What are the odds?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *对，很疯狂是吧？就像从午夜科幻小说里跑出来的东西一样，很荒唐。可能性有多少呢？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you and 8 were attacked by previous visitors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你和8被先前的来访者攻击过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't like to talk about it. 8... he can't talk about it, they fried his voice module something good.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我不喜欢谈那些。8…他也没办法谈那些，他们把他的发音模块烧坏了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013539_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *It wasn't all the visitors, though - only one of them got out of control. He's the one that took control of Little Yangtze, our old human farm.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *不是所有的来访者，他们中仅有一位失控了。他控制了长江集中营，我们曾经的畜人场。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013539_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about this facility?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以给我介绍一下这个设施吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Big MT used to be a mountain. Then there was a... slight mishap. Now it's a crater - the Dome used to be buried, now it's exposed to the sky.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *大山脉过去曾经是一座山。后来出了一起…轻微的事故。现在它变成了一个环形坑。智智库的穹顶过去是埋在地下，现在它才重见天日。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013534_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Don't get me wrong. Makes the sky light up like a planetarium at night. All those spectra... so soothing.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *别误会我。现在夜里的天空像星象仪那样明亮。所有那些光谱…如此清晰。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013534_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Mobius and these monsters of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于莫比乌斯和他那些怪兽的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *That "genius" Mobius somehow cobbled together these really impressive-looking robot scorpions with spare parts. Even painted them.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *那个“天才”莫比乌斯用零配件就组装出这些令人印象深刻的机械蝎。甚至还给它们画了涂装。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Tried to see what makes them tick. Can't even examine them without them detonating all over me. Left with shrapnel and burns. Every. Time.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我曾想弄明白它们是怎么运转起来的。但没等我检查多久，它们就炸的到处都是，只剩下些弹片和残骸。次次如此。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Supposedly, he has even larger models, even a Giant Robot Scorpion hidden deep within the Forbidden Zone. Yeah, right. Giant monsters. Sure.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *恐怕，他还有更大的模型，甚至是一只巨大的机械蝎，藏在禁区深处。是的，巨大的怪兽。毋庸置疑。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have another name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有另一个名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, I do. It wasn't always "O." I had took that one by default because sometimes it's easier to accept the mistake as long as the purpose works.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *是的。我的名字并不总是“O”。我默认使用它，只是觉得既然这个名字能起到称呼我的目的，那我还是接受这个错误更轻松些。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013532_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't want to get into it. It's a sore topic with me. Makes my gel ripple.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我不想提起它。对我来说它是个痛苦的话题，让我的生物凝胶泛起涟漪。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013532_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *All things robotical. You see a robot, I made it. See a broken robot, I made it that way. Deconstructed it down to parts.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *制作所有机械化的东西。你看到一个机器人，是我做的；看到一个破碎的机器人，也是我做的，只是把它肢解了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013531_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I have a gift with machines. I can render anything inoperable - preserve them in a non-functioning state.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我天生擅长摆弄机器。我能让任何东西变得无法操作——让它们保持在无机能的状态。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013531_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. Just wanted to ask some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静。我只是想问些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Fine. Ask.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *好吧。问。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001352e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agenda? I don't have any agenda, not with RobCo, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 图谋？我没有任何图谋，至少没有和罗伯科公司有关的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ooohh, really? You have their tech. On. Your. Arm.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦呵呵，真的吗？你有他们的技术，就在你的手！臂！上！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000112bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some problem with RobCo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伯科公司有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, my Pip-Boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我的哔哔小子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *How dare you bring RobCo tech in here! What, are you showing off? How great Robert House and his biiiig company are?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *你怎么敢把罗伯科技术带到这里！怎么，你在炫耀吗？罗伯特·豪斯和他的大大大公司很伟大是吗？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013537_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *"Oh! We can make Securitrons better than any robot those geniuses at Big MT can make, and they'll last a thousand years!"*
ESP.TRADUIT: *“哦！我们做出的电子保安，比大山脉里那些天才们做出的任何机器人都更好，它们能运转上千年！“*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013537_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Rrrr! You're lucky I don't have hands to tear that Dip-Boy off your arm - or feet to stomp on its stupid metal guts! Ooooo, damn RobCo!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哈！你真幸运，我没有手，不能把那烂哔小子从你的手臂上扯下来。我也没有脚，不能把它愚蠢的金属内脏踩烂！啊啊啊，该死的罗伯科！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013537_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to talk to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Congratulations, you've succeeded. What, you come to humiliate me, tell me how I've yet to find a means of stopping Mobius' scorpions?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *恭喜，你成功了。怎么，来羞辱我的是吗，说我这么久还没找到办法来阻止莫比乌斯的蝎子？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013536_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Or better, ask how "progress" is going on Securitron construction at the plant? We've had setbacks in research is all. That's all. And...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *还是问我工厂里电子保安的生产有何“进展”？我们的研究陷入了瓶颈，就这样。并且…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013536_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you mean "impossible."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想说的应该是“不可能”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O really. Now the Lobotomite is master of the dictionary arts. What, do you have a doctorate in verbology? No? I do. And...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦是真的吗。这无脑人是个语言艺术大师唉。怎么，你在动词学上获得过博士学位？没有？我有。而且…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013533_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll head out, then, and be back with these... things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我这就出发，给你们带回这些…东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL. GOOD. WHAT ARE THE TOKEN WORDS SPOKEN IN THIS CASE... UH... "THANK YOU?" YES - THANK. YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：很好。在这种情形下应该说什么？呃，[QUOTE]“谢谢你”？[QUOTE] 是的，谢谢，你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013560_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, is it leaving? Uh, but... eh, Dr. Klein, the Lobotomite will need rest. Recuperation. Things like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：等等，它是要离开吗？嗯，但是…呃，克莱因博士，无脑人需要休息、恢复和诸如此类的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I volunteer my chambers so it might be stared at, my monitor radars slowly scanning its form to collect sensitive data.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意贡献出我的房间，这样就能盯着它看了，可以让我的监视雷达慢慢的扫描它的身体，来收集敏感的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -NO! That would put it too CLOSE to us! It could press BUTTONS, turn lights ON and OFF, and worse, let OTHER Lobotomites in!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-不！那样它就离我们太近了！它可能会按按钮，让灯开开关关，更糟的是，能让其他无脑人进来！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *We could give it Mobius' old room. It's where its brain got scooped out anyway, and plus, some of its parts are already there.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我们可以将莫比乌斯以前的房间给它。反正那里是它的脑子被挖出来的地方，而且它的一些其他器官也已经在那了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Might be more comforting for it to hang out with its spine and heart. Home is where the heart is, after all. See what I did there? Went literal.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *对它来说，和脊椎、心脏待在一块可能会更舒服。毕竟，家是心所在的地方嘛。看看我都在做什么？在按字面意思解释。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I SUPPOSE. WE'LL HAVE TO MOVE THAT COUCH OUT OF THERE, BEEN PUTTING THAT OFF TOO LONG.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我想…我们还要把那个手术台搬出去，它放在那很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c7_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indicating his contribution, modestly. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *8 says let the Lobotomite take the Sink Central Intelligence Personality Chip and re-install it.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*8说可以让无脑人拿走汇聚节点中央智能单元的人格芯片，并重新装上它。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *That stuffy Mobius-programmed butt-ler can walk the Lobotomite, feed it, barter with it for us.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *那个莫比乌斯编程的古板管家可以牵着无脑人出去散步，喂它吃的，还能和他交易。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would also prevent it from going to Higgs Village and taking up residence there. With my teddy bears. And it would be nice to have it so... close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：这也能阻止它去住在希格斯村，和我的泰迪熊待在一起。而且能让它待在…如此近的地方也很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOUR LOGIC COMBINED WITH MY DESIRE TO KEEP THE THINK TANK LOBOTOMITE-FREE HAS SWAYED ME. HERE, I PRESENT THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE."
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你们的话富含逻辑，而且我也不想让无脑人住在穹顶里。好吧，你们说服了我。收下吧，这就是汇聚节点的中央智能单元。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LOBOTOMITE, TAKE THIS CHIP TO THE SINK. PLUG IT IN, AND MAKE SURE THE CHIP IS CLEAN, OR IT COULD SKIP.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人，把这个芯片带到汇聚节点，插入。记得确保芯片是干净的，否则它会失效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160cb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THEN MAKE WHATEVER CRUDE BIOLOGIC DEMANDS YOU NEED OF THE SINK. IT WILL CATER TO MOST OF YOUR HORMONAL WHIMS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在汇聚节点，无论你有多么粗俗的生物需求，有什么激素激发的奇思妙想，它都能满足你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160cb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOUR LOGIC COMBINED WITH MY DESIRE TO KEEP THE THINK TANK LOBOTOMITE-FREE HAS SWAYED ME. HERE, I PRESENT THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们的话富含逻辑，而且我也不想让无脑人住在穹顶里。好吧，你们说服了我。收下吧，这就是汇聚节点的中央智能单元。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LOBOTOMITE, I HAVE SWITCHED ON THE PERSONALITY IN THE SINK. IT WILL BE ACTIVE WHEN YOU RE-ENTER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人，我已经开启了汇聚节点里的人格系统。你重新进入时，它就会生效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: MAKE WHATEVER CRUDE BIOLOGIC DEMANDS YOU NEED OF THE SINK. IT WILL CATER TO MOST OF YOUR HORMONAL WHIMS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在汇聚节点，无论你有多么粗俗的生物需求，有什么激素激发的奇思妙想，它都能满足你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are these technologies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要找回的都是些什么技术？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE TECHNOLOGIES ARE THE X-2 TRANSMITTER ANTENNA ARRAY, USED TO FOCUS COHERENT THOUGHT AT EXCESSIVELY HIGH FREQUENCIES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：这些技术包括X-2发射机天线阵列，利用极高的频率集中逻辑思维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013555_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The psycho-analytic cardiac-dampening sneaky stealth suit, a suit like NOTHING this world has ever heard, seen, or could EVER see!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-一套兼具精神分析、心率控制功能的潜行服，这套服装世界上没人听说过，也没人见过！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013556_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying, "hey, what about my item! I made something, too!" EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013557_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and 8's Sonic-Soundwave-Emitter-Projecto-Gun, able to broadcast sound at lethal frequencies. It also gives a great biogel massage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：…还有8的作品：声波发射器，一条能射的枪。它能以致命的频率广播声音，也能给生物凝胶做一次极好的按摩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013558_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THERE. WE HAVE INFORMED YOU OF ALL WE NEED. WE ESTIMATE IF YOU ARE FOCUSED, YOUR TIME INVESTMENT WILL BE MINIMAL. EH, BY OUR STANDARDS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：就这么多。我们已经告知你要去找的所有东西。我们估计，如果你足够专心，想找齐这三项技术用不了多少时间，呃，以我们的时间标准来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014330_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF YOU WORK QUICKLY, YOU WILL BE THE RECIPIENT OF A GESTURE OF GRATITUDE FROM US. WE DO NOT BESTOW THESE OLD WORLD GESTURES LIGHTLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你进展够快，你将能得到我们表示感谢的手势。我们可不会轻易做这些旧世界的手势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014330_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FINE. SO... YES. GET THESE THINGS FOR US. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO COMPREHEND THEIR COMPLICATED SCHEMATICS. THAT IS FOR US TO DO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：好。那么…是的。为我们带回这些东西。不必尝试理解它们复杂的图纸，那是我们思想体的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013559_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That does it, forget this. I'm not helping you until I get my brain back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样吧，忘掉这回事。除非我拿回我的大脑，否则我不会帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell am I even talking to you right now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到底干嘛要跟你废话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you so sure Mobius has my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让你如此确信莫比乌斯有我的大脑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE HAVE NO IDEA! THIS LINE OF QUESTIONING ISN'T IMPORTANT TO US RIGHT NOW! WHY ARE YOU ASKING THESE TANGENTIAL QUESTIONS? STOP IT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我们不知道！现在这些问题对我们根本不重要！为什么你要问这些不沾边的问题？别问了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE NEED THESE TECHNOLOGIES. YOU NEED TO GET THEM. YOU MUST GET THEM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要这些技术。你需要弄到它们。你必须弄到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013553_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can say "no," and I'll do it again. I'm leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说“不”，现在我要再说一遍。我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LEAVING? BUT YOU CAN'T. I DON'T MEAN THAT AS A THREAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：走？但你走不了。我没有威胁你的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Slightly confused. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001355a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this, I'm not going to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了这件事，我不会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "No?" Why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: “不能”？为什么不能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... are equipped to retrieve the technologies with your primitive form. We are not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：你…这个原始的身体给了你回收那些技术的能力。而我们做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001356f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *It's kind of embarrassing. You have hands. And... uh, a heartbeat, sort of. And eyes. Mostly the hands. There's door handles, and lockers, and...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*说来尴尬。你有手和。唔，有心跳之类的东西。有眼睛。最重要的是有手，而那里有些门把手、储物柜，还有…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013570_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ENOUGH. WE NEED YOUR HELP. WILL YOU HELP US?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：够了。我们需要你的帮助。你会帮助我们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001356e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help. What do you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会帮忙，你需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: EXCELLENT. THIS IS TURNING OUT MUCH BETTER THAN THE ACTIVATE-THE-RETREAT-PROTOCOLS-AND-COWER-IN-MY-ROOM IDEA I HAD EARLIER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：好极了。我先前还想着离开这，然后就此缩在我的房间里呢。现在这情况比我预想的好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001355b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Agreed. O, and I've used my robotical knowledge to um... eh... transmit the... radio map waves to...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*赞成。哦，我刚刚也利用我的机器人知识，将…呃…地图的信息传输到…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001355c_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indicating his contribution, modestly. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001355d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Settle down, 8, I would have gotten it in a second, all right?! 8's transmitted the last known coordinates of the research centers. They, um...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*别急，8，我很快就会说到你了？！8已经传给我已知的研究中心的坐标。它们，嗯…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001355e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *They... well, move sometimes. Or get buried. Or blow up.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *它们…好吧…有时位置会变。或者被埋了，要么就爆炸了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001355e_2.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indicating his contribution, modestly. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001131b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 8 IS CORRECT. ALL WE NEED ARE THE SCHEMATICS. THIS DOES NOT MEAN WE DO NOT WANT THE COLD, HARD TECHNOLOGY, HOWEVER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：8是对的。我们最需要回收的是技术的图纸。当然了，也不是说我们就不想要冰冷的，实在的技术成果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001131d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SO DO NOT GIVE INTO YOUR BIOLOGICAL TIRED-LAZINESS AND DECIDE YOU WOULD SWEAT TOO MUCH CARRYING THEM. YOU HAVE A NEW SPINE. USE IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，快去把技术带回来吧。别屈服于你那生物性的，出于懒惰的疲倦感，你现在有根新脊椎，好好利用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001131d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND EVEN IF YOU DIE IN THE ACT OF RECLAMATION, SIMPLY REACHING THEM WILL AUTO-TRANSMITIFY THE SCHEMATICS TO US. THAT IS STILL GOOD. FOR US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你在回收技术时死掉，但只要你触碰到它们，就可以将图纸自动传输给我们。对我们来说，那样也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001131d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why me? Can't you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要我去干？你们不能自己去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: UM. NO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：呃…不能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013552_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not going to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不打算帮助你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：哦（"OH"）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001356b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yes, Dr. Klein? What?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*是，克莱因博士？你在叫我？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001356c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOT YOU, O, YOU IDIOT! I MEANT "OH," IN THE SENSE OF "OH, I WASN'T PREDICTING IT WOULD RESPOND THAT WAY." CAN IT SAY NO?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：不是你，O，你个白痴！我说的“OH”，意思是“哦，我没想到它会这样回应”。它能说出“不”吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001356d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, you scoop out my brain, now you want me to save you?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，是你们切了我的脑子，现在又想要我救你们？
