ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT IS CORRECT, YES. I HOPE YOU'RE NOT DEMONSTRATING RESENTMENT NOW. IF YOU ARE, WELL, WE CAN'T HAVE THAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：确实，你说的对。我希望你现在不是在表达愤恨。不过就算是，好吧，我们也不会让它发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said something about needing technologies to stop Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到需要一些技术来阻止莫比乌斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. IT IS OUR ONLY CHANCE, A DESPERATE PLAN THAT CAME TO US AFTER MOBIUS' FIRST BROADCAST.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。这是我们仅有的机会，在莫比乌斯第一次广播后，我们就开始准备这个孤注一掷的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013551_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: MAYBE... JUST MAYBE... IF WE RECLAIM THESE BURIED TECHNOLOGIES, WE CAN PUT AN END TO MOBIUS AND THE HORRORS SPAWNING FROM THE FORBIDDEN ZONE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许…仅仅是或许…如果我们回收了这些失落的技术，我们就能了结莫比乌斯，以及来自禁区的恐怖事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013551_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What? Like... stuff? Things?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你说的是什么？像是…事物？东西？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001133a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. THINGS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：对。东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Slightly confused. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001133b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't know... might be some old Nuka Cola or Sunset Sarsaparilla bottlecaps lying around. It... It's not "currency" per se...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我不知道…或许是一些古老的核子可乐或者夕阳沙士的瓶盖，在这到处都是。它…它本质上不能算“货币”…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001133c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Still, might be enough to trick the Sink's trade routines. Mobius put that test line for caps in the code as a debug command, I think.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *不过，或许能够骗过汇聚节点的交易程序。我想莫比乌斯可能曾将有关瓶盖的测试行，作为测试命令加入到代码中。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001133c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe that was Mobius' reason. His wild speculation concerning post-holocaust economic systems was quite extensive. And of high decibel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我不认为那是莫比乌斯的设定。他曾对战后经济体系作出过大量推测，尽管没什么根据，但还是很有说服力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001133d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ENOUGH! SURRENDER THESE SO-CALLED BOTTLECAPS, NUKA AND SUNSET ALIKE. IN THEIR ROLE AS THINGS, THEY WILL SERVE AS ADEQUATE TEST SUBJECTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：够了！将这些核子可乐和夕阳沙土之类东西的瓶盖交出来吧。这些瓶盖会是合格的测试品，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001133e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What are we going to do? There's no way we can breach the Forbidden Zone. There's those robot scorpions everywhere!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我们该怎么办？我们无法攻进禁区，那里满地都是机械蝎！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The FORBIDDEN ZONE, where no brain has EVER entered! Nor ever RETURNED.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-禁区，没有一个脑子曾进入过！更别谈回来了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013562_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except Dr. Mobius. And the technologies that could save us, they are out of our reach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：除了莫比乌斯博士以外。而且那些能够拯救我们的技术，都在我们够不着的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013563_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND DR. MOBIUS MOCKS US. DID YOU SEE HIS CRACKED MONITOR? HE'S CLEARLY LET HIMSELF GO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：而且莫比乌斯博士在嘲弄我们。看到他那被破损的显示器了吗？很明显他已经放飞自我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013564_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is calmly suggesting a reasonable course of action here. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013565_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What? Ask the Lobotomite for help? 8, I think you need the fluid levels in your logic-assist-pumps checked.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*什么？向无脑人寻求帮助？8，我认为你需要检查下自己的逻辑辅助泵，看看里面的液位是不是有问题。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013566_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this Lobotomite responded, Dr. Klein, then it is clearly intelligent, perhaps even displays heretofore unknown levels of helpfulness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：如果这个无脑人能作出反应，克莱因博士，那么它显然有智能，甚至可能会展露出愿意帮助我们的可能性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013567_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But what of its brain? We scooped that out! We don't even know where we left it! And for putting it back in... none of us have the knowledge!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-但是它的脑子怎么办？我们把它挖出来了！我们甚至不知道把它丢到哪里了！至于把它放回去…我们没人懂这知识！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013568_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, but it's still aware and responsive. Look at it... it's regarding us even now, with its big teddy bear eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：是的，不过它仍有有意识和反应。看啊…即使在此刻，它还在用它的大泰迪熊眼睛注视着我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013569_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we ask it politely and leave the part about the unnecessary ruthless lobotimizing out, it might be favorably disposed to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们礼貌的询问它，别管那不必要的、残忍的大脑切除手术，或许它会愿意和我们合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013569_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume full responsibility. I take my duties in the prodding and excision of living, breathing tissue quite seriously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我承担全部责任。我对切除鲜活的人体组织的工作有点太认真了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011339_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *All right, all right. Here. Cap away. Hope that stupid chip chokes on them.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*好的，好的。瓶盖在这。希望那个愚蠢的人格芯片能会被这东西噎死。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001133f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Fine. It's not going to help. That chip will probably refuse them anyway, as stuck up as it is.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*好吧。可能不会起作用。那人格芯片也许会拒绝接收它们，就像会被噎死一样。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011340_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Why don't you make the Lobotomite a bottlecap factory, Klein? Or better yet, give it a ton of things to activate the chip?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*克莱因，你不如给无脑人造个瓶盖工厂算了？或者干脆给它一大堆来激活这个芯片？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011341_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not understand, yet I am intrigued by this potential display.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我不明白，不过我对这种可能的展示很感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011342_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is calmly suggesting a reasonable course of action here. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011343_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *No, 8, you don't need to fill up the emitter again, really. Klein means things... for trade. Display for trade.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*不，8，你不用装填发射器，真的。克莱因要的是用来交易的东西。用来展示的东西。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *All right, let's consolidate. There's got to be some junk around here... magazines, useless, more caps, medicinal supplies... useless... here.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *好的，让我们整理一下。这儿有很多垃圾…杂志，没用的，大量的瓶盖，医药用品…没用的…这儿。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00011348_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a backup copy of your... pencil processor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一份…你的铅笔处理程序的备份文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a backup copy of your... pencil processor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一份你铅笔处理程序的备份文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! Now I can turn pencils and clipboards into items more useful to society... like lead, spare parts, and duct tape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 棒极了！这下我就能把铅笔、写字板变成对社会更有用的东西了…像是铅、备用零件，还有胶带！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013583_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a soundwave file for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一份声波文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, daddy-o! Just plug it in and I'll mix you up a sweet, sweet sound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有你的，老爹！把它插进来吧，让我给你混个又甜又美的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000137dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, baby! Just plug it in and I'll mix you up a sweet, sweet sound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行啊！宝贝儿！把它插进来吧，让我给你混个又甜又美的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015382_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the basic stealth test. The robots will be looking for us, but we won't let them find us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是初级潜行测试。那些机器人在四处搜寻，但我们不能让它们发现我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This should be easy. As long as I don't screw up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该很容易，只要我别再搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the advanced test. Watch out for laser tripwires. They'll ruin our day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是高级潜行测试。注意激光绊线，碰上就玩完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not supposed to give hints, but maybe you can disable the tripwires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我其实不该给提示，但也许你可以拆除这些绊线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the expert stealth test. If you thought the lasers were bad, wait till you see the proximity mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是专家级潜行测试。如果你觉得激光绊线就够糟了，那大概是因为你还没遇到感应地雷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psst. If you hack the mines this will go lots faster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悄悄告诉你，那些地雷，拆了它们，任务就会简单很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the robot compliance test. If you sneak up on a robot, you can disable it. It's so easy even I can't mess up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是机器人适应性测试。只要潜行到一个机器人边上，并且不被发现，你就能关了它。小菜一碟不是吗，连我都不会失误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I can learn anything else here... but if you want to go again, that's fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得在这我没什么要学的了…不过你要是还想再来一次，也行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad. We hit a tripwire. That one was totally my fault, though. We can start again at the terminal. Sorry...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好，我们碰到绊线了，都是我的错。我们可以在终端机那里再来一次。真对不起…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe there's a way around the tripwires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该有路能绕过那些绊线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13t_000137f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad. We triggered a mine. If you go back to the terminal to restart the test, I'll do better next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟糕，我们触发了地雷。回去终端机再做一次测试吧，我下次一定能做得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13m_000137ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can disable the mines quickly, or find another way past. I'm sure you know best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许我们能快速解除那些地雷，或者改道绕行。你肯定知道怎么做最好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13m_000137ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad. We were spotted by robots. If you go back to the terminal to restart the test, I won't mess up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟糕，我们被机器人发现了。去终端机再做一次测试吧，我保证下次不会再搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13r_000137f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stealth Boys are a robot's big weakness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隐身小子是机器人最大的死穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13r_000137f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to recalibrate the Sonic Emitter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想重新校准下声波发射器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, daddy. Let's spin some grooves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，老爹。让我好好帮你调！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013d70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, baby. Let's spin some grooves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，宝贝。让我好好帮你调！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012efc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you made any electronic components?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有做好的电子元件吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup, here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013d72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, no more today. Try me again tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，今天没有了。你可以明天再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00013d73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a backup file for your corroded module.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你受损模块的备用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Let's fire that up so I can start making electronic components again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！赶紧激活它，这样一来我又能制作电子元件了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mean robot bugs! Mean robot bugs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶心的机器臭虫！恶心的机器臭虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13r_0001429f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found that upgrade disk you were looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到你想要的升级磁盘了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ho-ho, thank God! Finally, something resembling a useful purpose!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，感谢上帝！终于有些有用的东西了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001430d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found you some upgrade disks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一些你的升级磁盘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that'll do just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，它们会有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001430c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about these pylons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能跟我说说那些雷达塔么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ASK BOROUS. I BELIEVE HE KNOWS MORE ABOUT THE FENCE THAN ANY BRAIN. EXCEPT MAYBE MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去问鲍鲁斯。我相信关于防御屏障他懂得比其他的脑子都多，也许除了莫比乌斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: MOBIUS WAS INVOLVED IN THEIR CONSTRUCTION, IF I RECALL. BUT HE'S SUCH A HACK, HE PROBABLY WAS READING OFF OF BOROUS' NOTES AND SCHEMATICS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没记错的话，莫比乌斯也在建设者之列。但他只是个剽窃者，他可能偷看过鲍鲁斯的笔记和图纸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you please hurry? I've got a schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能请你快一点吗？我还要赶时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... great. I don't want to hear anymore about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢…太好了，我一点也不想往下听了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pylons? What pylons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷达塔？什么雷达塔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE RADAR FENCE THAT SURROUNDS THE BIG MT CRATER WILL PREVENT - ER, PROTECT YOU FROM STRAYING BEYOND THE FACILITY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：大山脉环形坑外围的雷达屏障能够阻止…呃，保护你，以免你跑到设施外面去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014336_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The mighty radar fence protects us ALL! Get too close to the blinking posts, and the proximity warning shall be your... WARNING you are too close!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-全能的雷达屏障保护我们免受任何威胁！离那些发光的塔太近，就会触发警报…警告你靠的太近了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *If you get near it, your vision will blur as the electrodes in your head shut off one by one, click click click.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*如果你靠近它，视野就会变得模糊，因为你脑袋里的电极正被逐一关闭，咔咔咔。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Possible memory loss will occur along with long-term nerve degradation. It is tied to not having a brain attached to your nervous system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：你可能出现记忆丧失，长期来看还伴有神经退化。因为你没有大脑来连接神经系统了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014339_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the nerve degradation is nothing to worry about - such degradation would take many lifespans to become evident. And all biology dies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这种神经退化没什么好担心的。毕竟这需要很长时间才会产生明显影响，没有生物能活这么久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014339_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such tiny inconveniences are less than the greater convenience - and conveyance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些小小的不便和获得的方便相比不值一提——你能传送回来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014339_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, if rendered unconscious by the pylons, you will be returned to the Sink, seemingly instantaneously by your deadened perceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想看呀，被雷达塔击晕后，在那种麻木的状态下，你会觉得回到汇聚节点就是一瞬间的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014339_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then can you help me get this done as quickly as possible? Sounds like a lot of walking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有办法帮我尽快完成任务吗？貌似这要走很多路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: AH, THAT IS CORRECT. YOU MUST WALK UPON YOUR MANY-PENISED FEET. MUCH SLOWER THAN OUR ADVANCED HOVERING ROBOTICAL FRAMES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：啊，没错。你只能用你满是生殖器的脚移动，肯定会比我们先进的悬浮机械骨架慢得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001432f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The little teddy bear could always run right into the pylon perimeter on its thick, turgid feet, returning it to us quickly and erectly - directly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：小泰迪熊可以踢着它又厚又肿的脚，跑到雷达塔边界上，然后它就能又快又硬…又干脆地回到我们身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't sound like my style. Maybe I'll do a little exploring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的风格，我得先四处调查一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU WOULD NOT DARE. PERHAPS I CAN CHANGE YOUR MIND... USING THE GREATEST OF OUR SCIENCES. THE FENCE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你不敢的，也许我能改变你的想法…用我们最伟大的科学成果——雷达屏障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014335_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I better get walking, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还是走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I take my time, explore the crater?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我花时间探索这里会怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT ILLOGIC IS THIS?! KEEP YOUR FILTHY PENIS-TIPPED FEET OUT OF OUR LABS AND SECRETS!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：这有什么逻辑？！管好你长着生殖器的脏脚，不许你涉足我们的实验室和秘密！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There are things here no Lobotomite was MEANT to see, things that would ASTOUND! And possibly terrify. TERRIFY!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-其它无脑人绝对不会有像它这样的行为。放任不管的话它早晚会造成威胁！而且是可怕的威胁。可怕啊！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, we don't come into your lab and decant your solutions.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*对对对，我们又不是要冲进你的实验室，倒掉你的实验溶液。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the magnificence of our monitors allow for true comprehension of the wonders of Big MT. Shield your jellied eyes lest they burn from your skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：只有我们卓越的显示器才能真正理解大山脉的奇迹。管好你的眼睛，免得亮瞎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, I want to get this over with as quickly as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放心吧，我会尽快搞定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The faster I can get through this, the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我越快做完这些就越好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OUR INTENTIONS EXACTLY. THE IMPORTANT THING IS YOU RUSH QUICKLY THROUGH THIS TASK SO AS NOT TO WASTE OUR TIME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我们正是这么打算的。你得赶快完成这些任务，免得浪费我们的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DO NOT GET CURIOUS OR YOU WILL END UP LIKE THE CAT OF SCHRÖDINGER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要太好奇，不然你就会和薛定谔的猫一个下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We feared you would be tempted to explore Big MT Crater and examine the many amazing non-mandatory research labs that lie off your designated path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我们怕你会禁不住诱惑，去四处探索大山脉环形坑，调查那些不在你行动事项上的令人惊叹的实验室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The many such optional explorations are discouraged. Work hurriedly, as if you have blinders on, and leave curiosities and items of interest alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别到处乱跑。赶紧行动，就像你带了眼罩，无视掉那些勾引你好奇心的地点和事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001433f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -So many sciences and developments! Pass them by! Let impatience and the desire to simply finish, to end it all, quickly and carelessly guide you!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-那么多的科学、技术！别管它们！让你的躁动与决心指引你简洁高效地搞定这一切！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014340_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying, "hey, what about my item! I made something, too!" EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014341_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Right you are, 8. In our test results, we'll make a note about how quickly you ran our maz... er, exper... Nobel... challenge.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你说的对，8。作为测试结果，我们会记下你耗时多久能完成我们的挑战，是错综复杂的…专家级的…不，是诺贝尔级的…挑战。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014342_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, there will be plenty of time afterward to partake of the experiments once our bidding is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：毕竟，完成我们的任务后，你还有的是时间参加实验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014343_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this. Where's the exit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管了。出口在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This whole place sounds dangerous. These devices sound dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这整个地方听起来很危险。这些设备听起来也很危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NONSENSE. THIS PLACE IS NO MORE DANGEROUS THAN A NUCLEAR DETONATION SITE, OUR TECHNOLOGIES NO MORE LETHAL THAN AN OVERCHARGED TESLA CANNON.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：胡说。这地方不会比核爆炸试验场危险，我们的技术也不会比一台过充的特斯拉加农炮危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001432e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Cheering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <欢呼声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) NPC : Sink [0100E6FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03hqbuddie_00014421_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...didn't think you'd make it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我没想到你能活着回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost didn't. Got my answers. Your Elijah, he met the Gods in this place, did a good job of making them question the way of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差点就回不来了。我得到了答案。你的以利亚，他见过这里的神，并且很好地使他们怀疑起自己的世界观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where he went?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他去哪儿了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's gone to the Sierra Madre. That's a special kind of hell. He won't come back. Someone smarter, tougher's going to kill him. If the Madre doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷赌场。一个人间地狱。他不会回来了。即便赌场奈何不了他，也会有某个更聪敏、更难对付的人去了结他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须去继续追踪他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to talk you out of it. Know what it means to track someone you share history with. Got a meeting of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意劝阻你。因为我也清楚，追踪某个和你有“共同历史”的人意味着什么。因为我也将和自己的那个人会面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说那个邮差？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get her to come to me. Got a message for her, like the message she had for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让她来找我。我给她捎了个信，就像她也曾给我捎过信那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make them walk the road west, straight and true, sink their feet in Old World ash. Let storms tear at them. See the Divide. See what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们走过那真实的，笔直向西的路，脚踏旧世界的尘土，倾听风暴的嘶吼，去目睹大裂谷是何种模样，去了解那里发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide? There's nothing there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷？那里现在什么都不剩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing there? Like the Big Empty? The Sierra Madre? No, the Old World sleeps there, sure as the flag I carry. The Courier knows the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不剩？就像大坑洞（Big Empty）？像马德雷赌场？不，旧世界沉睡在那里，就像我背负的那面旗帜一样。邮差会知道路怎么走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And at the Divide, her and I - there, we'll have an ending to things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后在大裂谷，我和她，就在那，一切会有个结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460a_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...didn't think you'd make it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我没想到你能活着回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueulysses\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost didn't. Got my answers. Your Elijah, he met the Gods in this place, did a good job of making them question the way of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差点就回不来了。我得到了答案。你的以利亚，他见过这里的神，并且很好地使他们怀疑起自己的世界观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where he went?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他去了哪吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's gone to the Sierra Madre. That's a special kind of hell. He won't come back. Someone smarter, tougher's going to kill him. If the Madre doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他去了马德雷赌场，一个人间地狱。他不会回来了。即便赌场奈何不了他，也会有某个更聪敏、更难对付的人去了结他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须去继续追踪他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to talk you out of it. Know what it means to track someone you share history with. Got a meeting of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意阻止你。因为我也清楚，追踪某个和你有“共同过去”的人意味着什么。因为我也将和自己的那个人相遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你指那个邮差？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get him to come to me. Got a message for him, like the message he had for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让他来找我。我给他捎了个信，就像他也曾给我捎过信那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make them walk the road west, straight and true, sink their feet in Old World ash. Let storms tear at them. See the Divide. See what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他们走过那真实的，笔直向西的路，脚踏旧世界的尘土，倾听风暴的嘶吼，去目睹大裂谷是何种模样，去了解那里发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide? There's nothing there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷？那里现在什么都不剩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing there? Like the Big Empty? The Sierra Madre? No, the Old World sleeps there, sure as the flag I carry. The Courier knows the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不剩？就像大坑洞（Big Empty）？像马德雷赌场？不，旧世界沉睡在那里，就像我背负的那面旗帜一样。那个邮差会知道路怎么走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And at the Divide, he and I - there, we'll have an ending to things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后在大裂谷，我和他，就在那，一切会有个结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_0001460b_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...don't want to argue philosophy with you. Brotherhood are preservationists. Tech in the wrong hands, it's dangerous. Mojave's proof.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我不想就理念问题和你争辩。兄弟会是群保护主义者。科技若落入恶徒之手，就会变得很危险。莫哈维废土就是最好的例子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No denying that. Proof's here in this crater, all around us. Your tribe, the Brotherhood - haven't met many of you. Wanted to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不否认这点。证据就在这环形坑里，在我们身边到处都是。你的部落，我是说兄弟会，我没怎么接触过你们，但我希望能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought you might be the last chance for the Mojave... the West. The East. But you're all the same mind, obsessed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本想或许你会是莫哈维最后的希望…不管是西部，还是东部。但事实上你们都一样，一样的痴迷不悟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah is obsessed. He's mad. It's why they ordered his execution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 痴迷不悟的是以利亚。他已经疯了。正是因此兄弟会才决定处决他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two are more alike than you know, too wrapped in the wrong bits of history to see ahead. Not judging. I know how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们两个比你认为的要相似得多。同样囿于过去的错误，无法面对未来。这不是批判。我知道那是什么感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People are like couriers, you and him. Sometimes don't even know the message they bring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们就像邮差一样，包括你和他。有时甚至不知道自己送的信是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You all had a new flag. Thought maybe new ideas along with it. What you believe isn't any better than the Bear or Bull. No future in either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们都树起新旗帜，认为其中也许伴随有新的理念。但你所信仰的并不好于双头熊，或公牛，也不见得更有前途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So says the man with the Old World flag on his back. America, the Commonwealth... burned away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这位背上画着旧世界旗帜的男人不也一样么。要知道美国，那个联邦…早已灰飞烟灭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: America sleeps. And until it's dead, I carry it. Just like I carried you. More than hope. Belief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国只是陷入沉睡。只要我带着她，她就没有死。正如我刚刚带着你一样。这不仅仅是希望，更是信仰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's voices here in the Big Empty, I want to talk to them. Not like your Elijah did. Got questions. Want to hear history give its answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坑洞（Big Empty）里的声音，我想和他们谈谈。我无意效仿你的那位以利亚。我有些问题，想听听历史会给出什么答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014618_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Christine Royce. Knight of the Brotherhood of Steel... the Circle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是克里斯汀.罗伊斯，钢铁兄弟会的骑士…隶属圆环。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to make it through this, hope someone finds this message, gets it to the Brotherhood in the West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我挺不过这一关了，希望有人能发现这条信息，把它带去西部兄弟会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tracked a rogue Brotherhood Elder, Elijah, here, to the Big Empty. Place is more than it seems, there's a crater hidden deep inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了追捕逃亡的兄弟会长老，以利亚，我来到这，大坑洞（Big Empty）。这地方不是看起来这么简单，深处是一个环形坑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Junkyard of Pre-War labs scattered across the crater's surface, all still running... like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 环形坑里散布着战前研究所的残骸。所有设施仍在运行…就像这栋一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah's dissecting these centers, one by one... tracked him to an old Chinese-American internment camp. Survivors, Ghouls, have bomb collars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚一个接一个仔细地研究了这些设施。我尾随他来到了一个以前的华裔集中营。那里的幸存者，或者说尸鬼，都带着爆炸项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robots moved in when I tried to intercept him... Elijah sent the camp Ghouls against us both, like walking bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我试图拦截他时，机器人来了…以利亚把营内的尸鬼当成人体炸弹，来攻击我们双方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got hit by the explosions, woke up here. Guess the medical robots were programmed to bring wounded victims from the camp to this center.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被爆炸击晕，醒来就在这里了。我猜是医疗机器人，它们程序里或许有把营地伤员带到这个医疗中心的功能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some kind of Auto-Doc prototype lab... manned by corpses trapped inside suits that keep them moving, no idea why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里大概是自动医生原型的实验室…一些裹着束身服的死尸在控制这里运转，具体原因尚不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure how long I'm going to last... cut open my head like a lot of the humans I've seen here, feel strange, can talk, but can't hack the term...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知我还能坚持多久…切开我的头，就像对这里许多其他人一样，感觉好怪，还能说话，但破解不了这个终端…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_9.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: …等等，外面发生了爆炸。有人在这…是谁…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc03hol_nvdlc03christin_00014622_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was curious about some things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些好奇的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, curiosity. I experience that less now that I know everything. Or maybe it was when I found out some unpleasant answers? Mmm-hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好奇心。自从我通晓一切后就很少有这种感觉了。或许是说发现令人不快的答案时的那种感觉？嗯嗯……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find things curious as well. Go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也有点好奇了，请说下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes, this is getting interesting. You are just filled with these little slices of curiosity, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，越来越有意思了。你准备要打破砂锅问到底吧，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I want to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想离开这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, that seems to be rather hormonal of you. Flight or fight response, you know, hard to cut that out completely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你的激素分泌相当旺盛。的确，这种情况下“战或逃”反应会很难抑制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014733_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain is here, safe with me. We chat over Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的大脑同我在一起很安全。我和它一边嗑曼他特，一边聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014733_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is that a problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么那会是个问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure except that I'm sure there's a very good raisin for it. I have very good raisins for almost everything I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太确定。唯一确定的是，我这么做有正当的理由。我行事一向有正当的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I forget them occasionally. Although I feel this one is especially important. Ha! Oh well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我偶尔会忘记它们。不过我觉得这次的事特别重要。哈！哦好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly. I want my brain so I can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我要拿回我的大脑，好离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you steal my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你要偷走我的大脑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, a variety of raisins... you're something of a homily. Er, anomaly? You're really quiet special, and not in the cranially-challenged way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，有很多理由…你算是个纽结，呃，应该说异常情况？你真的相当特别，我指的不是你没有大脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014739_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, you are the most successful brain extraction experiment ever performed here at Big MT. A victim of your own success, as it were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，大山脉有史以来最成功的大脑提取手术，就是取走你脑子的那次。就是说，你是这次成功的受害者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014739_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you were to go back with what your brain knows about the procedure, well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到你的脑子知道那次成功手术的流程，你若是能带它一起走，那么…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014739_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...your brain could be popped back in and you could walk right out of here. Can't have brains moving around of their own volition.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……你就能把它安回自己的脑袋里，然后径直离开大山脉。毕竟可不能让大脑由着它们的性子乱跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014739_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need my brain back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要拿回我的大脑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you? You seem fine without it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？没有它你看起来也很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And does it even want to go back with you? Maybe you should ask it. It's quite independent, has all manner of opinions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且你也不知道它愿不愿意回去？也许你该问问它。它挺独立的，而且还很有想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what - I'll leave it up to your brain. If it wants to go, then fine. If not... well, you should respect its wishes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你说吧，我会让你的大脑决定该怎么办。它若想走，那很好。但如果不想…我希望你能尊重它的意愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You aren't exactly what I was expecting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的样子和我预想的不太一样.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really. That implies pre-conceived notions - theories and a hypothesis about this meeting? Please extrapolate. What was I... supposed to be like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗，就是说对于这次会面，你预先进行了设想，推算和假设？请演算下去，我…应该是什么样呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014735_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, it might be worth a cognitive re-alignment if your theoretical Mobius is better than I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，若你推想的莫比乌斯比我要更优秀些，我就该考虑改进自身的认知方式了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whichever way you want to be killed is fine with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便选种死法吧，我无所谓。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How gracious of you. A mannerly killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可真仁慈。一次绅士般的杀戮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014737_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll trash them like I did your giant piece of junk downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会像处理楼下那台巨型机械垃圾一样处理掉它们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh now you've done it. I feel a twinge of regret over that little mistake I left on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，很高兴你能处理掉它。之前忘记把它关了，我还一直感到很后悔呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001473f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Minions - destroy this intruder! Mmm. Or perhaps make it more dramatic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 仆人们，消灭入侵者！嗯，我是不是该表达的再戏剧化点？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014740_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Minions! To me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 仆人们！到我这来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014740_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes, that's quiet a bit better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，就是这样，这听起来好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014740_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What minions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么仆人们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, have they not constructed themselves yet? That's a bit premature of me. The Robo-Scorpions, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，难道它们还没把自己拼好？看来我太心急了。我说的当然是机械蝎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014732_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They can assemble themselves from floor panels and parts scattered about, quiet inventive - never really know when they might suddenly appear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们能用地板和零部件来组装自己，这相当有创意。你永远不知道它们会从哪冒出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014732_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll save it, don't want to mix it with alcohol if I can help it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次吧，我不想喝过酒后还嗑药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, I'm tripping pretty hard right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我现在的感受就够迷幻了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016056_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll save it for later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次再说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016055_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm. I love Mentats. Delicious and smarty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊嗯，我爱吃曼他特，美味又健脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016057_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have all sorts of amazingly science-arific thoughts and ideas when those chalky tablets are zipping through my biogel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦那些药片开始在我的生物凝胶中穿梭，我的头脑里就涌现出各种各样的科学创想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius

ESP.ORIGINAL: I forget them all not long after, though, especially with the data constipating my memory core. Afraid binary streams might shoot out my chassis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我总是很快就把它们全忘光了，特别是存储核心内存不足的时候。二进制流仿佛要射穿我的机壳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014738_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to start using the dome floor and walls here to inscribe equations, although I've somewhat lost track of where they start and end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以不得不用穹顶的墙和地板来记录那些方程，尽管我又经常会找不到算式推演的开头和结尾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014738_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough. I'm here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，我是来杀你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, intriguing. I've never been killed before. Although after that time I got that phlegmy discharge in my biogel... I wished I had been.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，有意思，我从来没有被杀过。虽然那次我的生物凝胶里流出痰液的时候…我想过死掉算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014734_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if there's going to be killing, I defer to your expertise in this matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果非打不可，那么在这个问题上我会尊重你的专业意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014734_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How should we begin? Engineered viruses? Canceratic beams? Atomics? Electrocutioning? Or... should I summon my minions...? Yes, my minions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从哪里开始？改造病毒？癌变射线？核武器？电刑？还是说…我该召集我的仆从？没错，我的仆从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014734_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that better?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好点了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depth perception is a problem with this old monitor of mine. Went black a while ago. That's old age for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这个老显示屏的深度知觉出了问题。不久前突然变得一片漆黑。哦以你对时间的感知来说，应该是很久以前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014736_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should look at getting the visual nerves re-attached... it's just that the right eye would see the wrong things. The flying tortoises were the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我或许该考虑下重连视神经…我的右眼总是会看到些糟糕的东西。那群飞翔的乌龟是最糟的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014736_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you care for a Mentat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要不要来片曼他特？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014736_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... sounds like you built the Robo-Scorpions, issued threats to keep the Think Tank occupied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打断一下…据我所知是你造了机械巨蝎，然后不断地骚扰，让智库的思想体无暇他顾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I? Maybe I did. Can't have them leaving. Some reason for it. Ethics - or con-science?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？或许是吧。我不能让他们离开，出于某种理由。也许是我的良知——某种非科学的因素？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_mobiusconclusio_00014746_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and your Brain are quite alike, I'm sure it knows the raisins better than I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和你的大脑挺像的，我相信它比我更清楚原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_mobiusconclusio_00014746_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem aggressive. Why broadcast threats to the Think Tank?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不像是好斗的人，为什么要在广播里威胁那些思想体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I was probably tripping hard on Psycho when I sent that. Had to work myself up to it, not usually violent, except when I am. Then, huh! Watch out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当时我可能刚磕过药，正处于迷幻状态。我通常不具暴力倾向，可一但暴力起来，事情经常以失控收场。那时，哈！记得小心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014744_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So many chems, such varieties! Whenever I take Mentats, I can feel my entire chassis breeeeeathe like a big spherical lung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 化学药品数以百计，种类繁多！但只有曼他特能让我感到重获新生，呼吸畅快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014744_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the Psycho, sometimes get the chem despositories in my tank all switched up, go in the wrong tube - still, served its purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说回那种嗑药后的状态，大概是因为我不小心把体内的药品储存罐全部打开了，差点没把我呛死。不过，药还是发挥了作用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014744_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about your Robo-Scorpions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能跟我介绍下你的机械蝎吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, every scientist needs an army. Mine came to me after these rather large scorpions kept coming in from the dessert. Like poisonous frosting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，每个科学家都需要一支军队。我士兵的原型就是那些从沙漠不断爬进来的大蝎子。它们移动起来就像地面覆了一层剧毒糖霜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014745_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How scary, I thought! But they had survived when nothing else had. Perfect candidates for improvement, as a reward for their tenacity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多可怕啊，我想！但最后能活着进来的只有它们。完美的改造对象，作为对它们坚韧品性的嘉奖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014745_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I thought, what if they shot energy bolts and acted as walking eyes and data-drained computers and acted as bullhorns? Then I made them bigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是我想，它们除了发射能量束，能不能充当我的耳目，充当计算机，还有扩音器？所以我增大了它们的体型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014745_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, I thought about... custard. I do so love custard. Or was it mustard? Mustard custard. Mmmm. I miss sugars and salts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再接着，我又想到…奶油冻(custard)。我爱死奶油冻了。抑或是芥末(mustard)？芥末奶油冻。呣，真怀念盐和糖的味道啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014745_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a holotape to upgrade you. <REMOVE>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一个全息磁带给你升级。<移除>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost my Sonic Emitter. Can you make me a new one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把声波发射器弄丢了。你能帮我再做一个么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a shame, chief! Nobody oughta go through life without music on hand. Just head over to smarty-puck in the main room and he'll sell you one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太可惜了，头儿！没了音乐，人可怎么活。你去主厅找那个聪明精吧，他能再卖你一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014aa9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一个可以给你升级的全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You found my Smart Lights! Installing upgrade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！是我的智慧之光！正在安装升级。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00014b6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bark.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <狗叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03x8d_nvdlc03x8dogfol_00014b7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Heel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走，跟紧了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go wait somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去其它地方等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing, dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在干什么呢，小狗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pants.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03x8d_nvdlc03x8dogfol_00014b7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made you. You stick with me. Got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我创造了你。所以你得跟着我，明白么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the hell are you just standing there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在那傻站着做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pants.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03x8d_nvdlc03x8dogfol_00014b7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me, girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，丫头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bark.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <狗叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03x8d_nvdlc03x8dogfol_00014b7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go wait by the entrance. Good dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乖狗狗，到门口等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bark.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <狗叫声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03x8d_nvdlc03x8dogfol_00014b7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi there, puppy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，狗狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pants.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03x8d_nvdlc03x8dogfol_00014b7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psst. If you want to be sneaky, turn off your Pip-Boy light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，要是你想不被人发现，就把哔哔小子的灯关上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitpipb_00015320_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pip-Boy light's on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哔哔小子灯还亮着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitpipb_00015d07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all lit up. Is it Christmas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都在发光。是圣诞节到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitpipb_00015d08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody ever notices me... but they notice the Pip-Boy light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人能发现我…不过谁都能发现你哔哔小子的亮光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitpipb_00015d09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need my equipment repaired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的装备需要修理一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001533e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想聊点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lay it on me, daddy-o.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交给我，帅哥.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001537e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lay it on me, mama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交给我，小辣妹.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001537f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you do anything like that for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能为我做那样的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got yourself a sonic emitter, don't ya? Thought so. Bring that old thing on in here, and... bring me some sound samples, and I'll make that baby sing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有声波发射器吧？我猜你有。把那老玩意带过来…再给我些声音样本，我就能让那宝贝儿唱起歌来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015383_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or scream, if that's what you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也可能是尖叫，如果那就是你想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015383_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem pretty laid-back for an engine of destruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 身为一个极具破坏性的机器，你看起来倒是很悠闲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not? Ain't like I got nothing to prove. Not like that Toaster - now that boy got some issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢？我又不需要证明什么，不像那台烤面包机，现在那小子又犯病了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001537d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll talk to you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以后再跟你聊吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Catch you later, gator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见，小鳄鱼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001537c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you play music?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能播放音乐吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm... Used to, long time ago. Then Ol' Doc Mo ripped out my music drives and stuck in more acoustical processors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…过去能，很久很久以前。后来老博士莫比乌斯拆下我的音乐驱动，并装上了更多声学处理器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015381_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess you could say I got the blues, even if I can't play them no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你可能觉得我挺忧郁的(blue)，虽然我再也不能放蓝调了(blues)。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015381_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your purpose here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么用途？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dig, I'm-a acoustical wizard, kid. Ol' Doc Mo used me to prototype his sonic weapon designs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴赏。孩子，在声学方面我可是个魔术师。老莫比乌斯博士以我为原型设计了他的声波武器。
