ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015380_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get me a good sample base to work from and I can whip up a wave that makes Jericho look like a kazoo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我好的基础声样。我就能掀起巨大声浪，吹塌坚城耶利哥就像吹卡祖笛一样轻松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015380_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't you go out there and shut them down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就不能出去关了它们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: OUT THERE? WE'RE NOT GOING OUT THERE. IT'S DANGEROUS. WE'RE SMART, NOT SUICIDAL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：出去？我们是不会出去的。外面太危险了，我们很聪明，不会自寻死路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go get these technological wonders and see how much damage I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会拿到这些技术奇迹，然后试试有多大威力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'll be sure not to tamper with anything, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我保证不会乱动任何东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds suspiciously like I can't leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来我似乎没法离开这里了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a perimeter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有防御带？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I can't leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是说我没法离开这里了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's nothing more, I need to stop Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是没别的事，我得去阻止莫比乌斯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could care less about all of this. Can I go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不关心这些。我能走了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This can only work on fields here in the crater?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它只能对环形坑内的力场起作用？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. BUT NOT CURRENTLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：是的。但现在还不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, we lost that part of the schematics. Or Borous did. In one of his stupid labs - or inside one of his stupid pets.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*是的，我们遗失了那部分的图纸。都是鲍鲁斯的错，把它丢在了某个愚蠢的实验室里，或者某只他愚蠢宠物的肚子里。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It is LOST! All questions lead to this conclusion! The blue fields within Big MT shall be fielded with force... FOREVER.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-它现在丢了！所有问题只能得出这个结论！大山脉里的蓝色力场永远无法被解开了…永远！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... so this gun you gave me can disable Force Fields?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，所以你们给我的这把枪…这把声波发射器，它能够破坏力场？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153ea_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: What? I don't think so. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: MAYBE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：应该能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153ec_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: There's no "maybe." It can't. Right now. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL. NO. NOT CURRENTLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：好吧，不能。至少现在还不能.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were you saying about force field disruption?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们说的力场破坏是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This thing is pretty cool. It's got a little soundwave thing on the back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真酷！它背面有个小型声波频谱耶！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Careful where you're pointing that. That device wasn't always a weapon. It was more like a force field kind of thing... once.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*瞄准的时候小心点。这部设备最主要的用途并不是战斗，它更适合对付力场一类的东西…至少曾经是这样。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Force fields prevent us from moving! FORward or BACKward!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-力场让我们无法自由活动！无论是向前，还是向后！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THEY ARE IRRITATING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：力场相当让人恼火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sonic Emitter was specially designed to disable our own safety fields here in Big MT. When some of us lost our access passes. Dr. O.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：这把声波发射器是用来关闭大山脉内的安保力场的。以防我们中的某些人弄丢了自己通行证。是吧O博士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *That only happened once, and I know you were behind stealth fielding my lab keys, Dala, you formographer!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*那只发生过一次。而且是因为有人在我的实验室钥匙上加了隐形力场，就是你，达拉，你个“恋体狂”！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. O, you rewind that comment!
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：O博士，收回你的无端指控！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Plenty of rewinding already going on in your formography tapes... surprised the things don't snap out of their cases with repeated 'observations.'*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*“形体学”磁带已经被你反复放过不知道多少遍了吧…真惊讶这些东西被反复“观察”了这么多遍，居然没直接活过来。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the love of... Please. Stop. Fighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在…的份上，请！别！吵！了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's a weapon you can give me, hand it over, I'll put it to good use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的武器能给我吗。我会善用它的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have the gun already, I don't understand what you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你们一直有那把枪，那还需要我去干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT IS TRULY THE END OF ALL INTELLIGENCE WHEN THE LOBOTOMITE SPEAKS MORE WISDOM THAN YOU "GENIUSES."
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：难道真是智者的末日到了吗，在无脑人的言谈中，居然蕴含着比你们这些"天才"更多的智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: SO - IF WE HAVE THE SOUNDWAVE... SONIC... PROJECT-O THING GUN... THEN WHAT IN HEISENBERG'S NAME DO WE NEED FROM X-8?! ANYONE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以说，既然我们已经有这把发射声波…音波…的枪，那么以海森堡的名义，我们到底要从X-8找什么东西？！有人知道吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe we need a new frequency embedded into the gun. It was designed to broadcast many sounds once charged. We just don't know the frequency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我想我们需要给发射器安装一个新的声音频率。按照设计，它充能后应该能发射多种声波，我们只是不知道频率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -And it is LOST in X-8! Just as X-8 is forever lost to us! The sadness of my high-school days! The sadness of my YOUTH, MY youth! LOST!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-对，频率丢失在X-8了！正如我们永远失去了X-8设施！我悲伤的高中日子！我悲伤的青春时光，我的青春！丢了，再也回不来了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O really, Borous? All you did in High School was Commie fink-tattle-tale on all the kids you hated, you little teacher's pet brown-hound.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*哦，你没开玩笑吧，鲍鲁斯？你中学时可是老师最宠爱的棕毛小猎犬啊，专门把你讨厌的孩子举报成共产党的密探间谍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015400_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: GIVE. THE. LOBOTOMITE. THE. EMITTER. DOES IT HAVE AN AUDIO EFFECT FREQUENCY LOADED?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：给！那个！无脑人！那台！发射器！对了，发射器里有加载过音频效果吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015401_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Take the revelation noise, make it small, repeated, stage 1. (8's sonically ejaculating into the gun.) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015402_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O... I don't think so. Wait...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*哦…我不觉得这是什么好主意。等等…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015403_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Take the revelation noise, make it small, repeated, stage 2. (8's sonically ejaculating into the gun.) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT IS HE DOING?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：8这是要干吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I think he's sonjaculating into the gun. Getting it... warmed up.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*8不会想…和那发射器交合吧，他是不是正在做…前戏。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015406_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Take the revelation noise, make it rise up in audiogasm, stage 3, then it peters out. (8's sonically ejaculating into the gun.) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015407_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ding... turkey's done.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*叮…火鸡烤好了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015408_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU GIVE IT TO THE LOBOTOMITE. I'M NOT TOUCHING THAT THING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你们去把发射器递给那只无脑人，我是不会碰它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015409_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O, I don't think so.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*哦，我拒绝。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001540a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it if you two are going to be ashamed of your own technological needs. Let me give it a little sonic sterilization first...
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：要是你们俩对自己的“机理需求“如此羞怯的话，我去做好了。先稍稍做个声波消毒…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001540b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: wooOOOoooOOO... all right, all anti-bacterial fresh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔哦哦哦呜呜呜…完成，细菌死光光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001540b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, my little Teddy Bear. I have thoroughly removed all RobCo termlink code spew from the device. It is clean, shiny, and ready for your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着吧，我的小泰迪。我已经把射在上面的罗伯科终端链接代码都擦干净了。声波发射器现在干净又闪亮，已经准备好给你握住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001540b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O... Doctor Klein... Doctor Klein? If I may intersect for a moment.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*哦…克莱因博士…克莱因博士？能否容我打断一下。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT IS IT? THE LOBOTOMITE IS ASKING ME THINGS, O, AND I AM TRYING TO IGNORE THEM. MY PROCESSORS CAN'T IGNORE YOU BOTH AT THE SAME TIME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：又怎么了？这无脑人在问我问题，O，我正试着忽略它们。但我的处理器没法同时忽略你们俩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Well... you know how we asked it to fetch the Sonic Emitter thing? Turns out we already have it. What are the odds?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*那个…我们为什么还要让它去找声波发射器呢？这玩意明明一直在我们手里。真奇怪不是吗？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT IS THIS, A HIGH SCHOOL SCIENCE FAIR?! GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER, YOU'RE MAKING US LOOK LIKE A COLLECTION OF ROUND-EARTHERS!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：这算什么，高中科学展吗？！拜托你先想清楚了再说话，因为你，我们看起来就像一帮认为地球是圆的乡巴佬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You're always yelling! My receptors can't take it anymore - and neither can my feelings!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你总对我大喊大叫！我的接收器再也受不了了，我的感情也受不了了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I AM YELLING BECAUSE YOU CONTAMINATED SPECIMENS CAN'T KEEP YOUR PROBES OFF THE VOLUME KNOB ON MY VOICE MODULE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我大吼大叫，都是因为你。你这个受了污染的样本，总学不会把探针从我发声模块的音量旋钮上挪开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000153fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you turn those lights on for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能帮我打开那些灯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As much as I'd love to, I'm afraid not. The data from that study has gone missing. You'll have to find a backup if you want to use the Smart Lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很想帮你，但抱歉我做不到。那个研究项目的数据现在丢了，要是你能找回来，我就能开启智慧之光模式.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlike certain other lightswitches, I'm competent. I'd just love to turn those lights on for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不像其他那些灯开关，我可是很称职的。我很乐意为你打开那些灯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had some more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to answer what I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意尽我所能，为你解惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001559b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that anything like what the other light switch is working on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个灯开关也有类似的特殊功能么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmph! I suppose if you want to conflate the betterment of man's mind with... with a luminous aphrodisiac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼！除非你想把改善人思维的能力和…光学春药混为一谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our project was by far the more significant. And the more... intense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我研究的项目意义无疑更重要，而且更加刺激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were the results?
ESP.TRADUIT: 成果如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We observed a fascinating phenomenon: certain spectra of visible light actually increased cognitive function and reasoning ability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们观察到了一个迷人的现象：光谱上特定范围内的可见光确实可以提高认知能力和逻辑思维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, Doctor Mobius' brain is so big already, we had a hard time measuring it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说起来，莫比乌斯博士大脑的能力可真是太强了，搞得测量工作非常困难呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155ab_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds like what the other light switch was working on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这貌似和另一个灯开关的功能没多大区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eww! Don't lump me in with her! I'm way more fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！你居然拿她和我比！我比她有趣多了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go. We'll talk later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。我们可以下次再聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Certainly. I'm looking forward to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我很期待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015598_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What function do you serve?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么功能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doctor Mobius and I were deeply involved in research on the ability of light levels to enhance human cognition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯博士跟我深入研究过光照水平对人认知能力的作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001559a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I say, she and I just... click.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么说呢，我和她……一触即合。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really know how to break a synthetic girl's heart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你伤透了一个人工智能女孩的心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, I don't have a thing for the light switch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静冷静，我跟那个灯开关什么都没做过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... I believe you. This time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…那我相信你。姑且相信…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015599_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay then. Forget I said anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了好了，就当我没说过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, smart lights could be useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不清楚，但“智慧之光”应该很有用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew it! You've got a thing for her, don't you? Oh, you just make me sick!
ESP.TRADUIT: 果然！你就是跟她有一腿，是吧？噢，你真让我恶心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001559e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like there's some bad blood between you. Or, um, circuits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你俩位似乎有些合不来。也许是，呃，在电路上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That bitch. She thinks she's so much better than everybody just because her processors are bigger. Ooh, she makes me so mad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个婊子啊。她总觉得自己高人一等，不就是处理器大点么。噢啊，她真是气死我了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001559c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing, sweetie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，甜心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001559f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you turn those lights on for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能帮我打开那些灯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... I'd love to, sweetie, but I don't have the programming. All the data from the experiments was lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…我当然愿意了，甜心，不过我缺少相关的程序。那次实验的数据现在全丢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd have to go out into that nasty old crater and find the backup copy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能得下到那个讨厌的旧环形坑里，去找找备份文件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bet I can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小事一桩！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You bet I can! I bet that's more than that other tramp can do, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以！我可比那个荡妇厉害多了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what did you find out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it was super exciting! It turns out that some pretty colored lights can make you way better at talking to people!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！结果激动人心！实验表明某些色调可爱的光能让你更健谈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜拜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw another light switch in the other room. Do you control that one too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那边的房间也有一个灯开关，你也能控制那个么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... her. Trust me sweetie, you're better off not thinking about that frigid little ice queen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…你说她啊。相信我，亲爱的，你最好离那个冷冰冰的小冰雪女王远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001559d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, some kind of novelty talking light switch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么？某种新型的会说话的电灯开关？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was Doctor Mobius'... personal assistant! We were studying... um... oh, shoot, what was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是莫比乌斯博士的…私人助理！我们共同研究关于…呃…哦，可恶，研究什么来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah! Lightning! No, no, wait, uh... Lighting. That's right. How lighting affects human interaction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊想起来了！闪电！不，不是，我想想，唔…照明。没错，确切说是灯光如何影响人的交际能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000155a1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll handle the brains. You stay here - you'll be more useful outside my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去料理那些脑子，你呆在这儿。你不在我身体里更有用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That arrangement suits me fine. Do try not to get too many holes drilled in your head, will you? I may want to drop by for sentimental reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种安排还蛮适合我。你尽量别把脑袋搞得到处都是洞，知道不？没准哪天我心血来潮还要回去小住呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015767_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Think Tank won't hold up their bargain, we'll make them. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 思想体反悔的话，我们就只能让他们无法拒绝了。走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, I suppose I have no choice. Goodbye peaceful, soothing brain jar, hello head wounds and scorpions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我也没别的选择了。别了，平静、舒适的脑缸。你好，头上的伤口和蝎子们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right! Look out, Think Tank! This brain is coming out of its jar!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错！等着瞧吧，思想体们！猛脑出槽咯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015a7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Let me think about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，再让我想想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! Thinking without a brain. The very idea is perverse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！没脑子的东西也能思考。太阳从西边出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001576c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let's go make them share. Come on, brain, it's stomping time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让他们无法拒绝的。来吧，脑子，是时候大闹一场了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, lovely, we've reached the mindless violence portion of the program. Tell me, what exactly are you - and I use the word loosely - planning?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，又到了没脑子的暴力环节。但说真的，这就是你的所谓的“计划”？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? They promised to put us back together once I did what they wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？他们承诺如果我完成了他们的任务，就把咱们重新拼回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you believed them? Really? I know you were recently deprived of my fabulous advice, but... really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你就相信他们了？真的吗？最近我是不能给你出谋划策没错，但是…你真信了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I'm delivered into their clutches, they'll find a way past the radar fence and the whole Mojave will be their playground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我被送到他们手上，他们就能找到越过雷达屏障的办法，把整个莫哈维变成他们的游乐场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that is assuming of course that one of them doesn't take a fancy to our body and decide to slip his own brain into it instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然也可以预见，他们中的某人可能会看上你的身体，然后把自己的大脑换进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold that thought, we'll come back to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先暂且搁置，咱们等会再讨论这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. Hold that thought. That's almost clever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵。先暂且搁置。这倒是近似于聪明了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001576d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not spending the rest of my life here when there's a whole world to loot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外边还有一整个世界等着我去搜刮呢，我可不想窝在这里荒度余生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah yes, there's that greed and general sense of malice. I'd nearly forgotten it. What's the plan, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的，就是那种贪婪和邪恶感。我差点都忘了。所以呢，你想怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015779_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, we have a duty to the Wasteland, we have to get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，咱们在废土还有使命，必须要离开这里！

ESP.ORIGINAL: There go those glands again. Is the endorphin rush you get from doing the right thing really that good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 腺体冲动又来了。内啡肽的刺激真这么厉害？让你情不自禁地要做傻事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015770_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's it going to take to convince you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那要怎么样才能说服你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to find a nice little place to live, maybe in Goodsprings, and settle down where we won't get shot at. Not as often, at any rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望找个不错的地方定居，像是清泉镇。必须是个不会再挨枪子的地方，至少也别整天挨枪子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015781_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But since that doesn't seem likely... what's your plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这似乎是不可能的…所以你怎么想？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015781_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't recall giving you a choice. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有给你选择的意思？跟我走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While the brute force approach is a lovely one, really, it won't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暴力手段很可爱，真的，只是它行不通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015776_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I wanted to settle myself back in your skull and go to all the trouble of reconnecting nerve endings, Dr. Mobius doesn't have the tools here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算我愿意回到你颅骨里，重新链接那些讨厌的神经末梢，莫比乌斯博士这儿也缺少必要的工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015777_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We would have to make use of Dr. Klein's lab, and I rather doubt the brains are inclined to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得借用克莱因博士的实验室，但那些脑子愿不愿意还是个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015777_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. I want to talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，我想聊点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you do. How... scintillating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。你…真有才。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe not, but it got your attention, didn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是种可能，但你很在意，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it did. Bravo, you've managed to intimidate a brain in a jar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是的。 真精彩，你成功地威胁到了一个罐子里的大脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015769_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would. And I'd follow it up with an alcohol-and-ant-nectar cocktail every night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢。我还计划每晚再来一杯蚁露鸡尾酒呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a monster! A deranged, self-destructive monster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个怪物！神经错乱、自寻死路的怪物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015778_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't tempt me, brain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别惹我发火，脑子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll try to respect you more. Sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，我会试着更尊重您的。先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll try to respect you more. Ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，我会试着更尊重您的。女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015780_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，别在意，当我没说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I rather thought so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我就准备这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001576a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you're back in my head, I'll watch television. Lots. And lots. Of television.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你弄回我的脑袋里以后，我就去看电视，看很多很多的电视节目。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you wouldn't! That's inhuman!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…你不能！这不人道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015774_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could smash this tank you're in. How about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把你的维生罐砸了，怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: By all means, if the idea of spending the rest of your days as a true Lobotomite appeals to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请便，如果作为一个真正的无脑人渡过余生这事很吸引你的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001576b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, come to think of it, you probably wouldn't mind that, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实仔细想想，你大概也不会介意这样，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001576b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll revisit this topic later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们稍后再讨论这个话题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yes, I rather expect we will. We'll be having a very long talk about crawling through old ruins, haring off on missions of revenge. And Cazadores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，我很希望能再讨论。我们可以谈很久很久，关于钻过古老的废墟，关于疯疯癫癫的复仇之旅。还有猎蜂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015771_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yes, we'll talk a lot about them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的没错，关于这些我们能聊很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015771_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't realize it caused you so much distress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道以前我让你这么痛苦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe next time you hear me telling you that charging a Nightkin with a penknife is a bad idea, you'll listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，只是下次我指出用小刀对付夜行族是坏主意时，你最好能同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015773_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh come on, that stuff's fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，得了吧，那多有趣啊！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fun? Fun?! Is tetanus fun? Hmm? Is rickets? What about sepsis, enjoy that do we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣？有趣？！你觉得破伤风有趣？嗯？那佝偻病呢？败血症呢？你也喜欢它们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015787_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The things you do with our body are suicidally dangerous, and if you could silence your glandular impulses, you would hear me screaming at you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总通过我们的身体做些要命的事，当时如果你让鲁莽的腺体闭嘴，你就能听到我声嘶力竭的警告！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015787_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you're responsible! You're my brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然要为此负责！你是我的脑子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I most certainly am not! I am the seat of all reason and logic in our little partnership!
ESP.TRADUIT: 才不是！在我们小小的合作关系中，我是负责提供理智与逻辑那个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015782_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All those... feelings that motivate you, that sense of righteousness and that rush you get when you help someone, do you know where those come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有那些…驱使你行动的情感，就像催促你帮助他人的正义感，你知道它们来自哪里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015783_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All those... ugh... feelings that motivate you, those urges to hurt people, to take and crush and maim, do you know where they come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有那些…呃…驱使你行动的情感，那些劝诱你伤害、摧毁、劫掠以及虐待他人的情感，你知道它们来自哪里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015784_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All those... ugh... feelings that motivate you, do you know where those come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有那些…呃…驱使你行动的情感，你知道它们来自哪里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015785_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glands. They come from glands. Free of the tyranny of your ape-like and primitive endocrine system, I can see how foolish your motives are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 腺体。情感来自腺体。自从我脱离了你那类人猿的暴政，你那原始的内分泌系统，我才明白你那些情感动机有多愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015786_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is too weird. I'll be back later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太怪了，我一会儿再回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Barring the unlikely event that I evolve some sort of rocket-propelled locomotion, I will be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非我进化了，可以进行火箭推进式的运动，否则我哪也不会去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001576f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cool! I can talk to my own brain! Can my heart and spine talk, too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 酷耶！我居然能和自己的脑子说话！我的脊椎和心脏也能说话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Err... yes, well, you do know that those particular organs don't have neurons and are thus incapable of speech, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…唉，那些特定的器官没有神经元，所以不具备交谈能力，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell did Mobius get hold of my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼了，莫比乌斯是怎么拿到我的脑子的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the Think Tank extracted me from your skull, they fell to bickering amongst themselves. I'm sad to say we were quite forgotten about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 思想体们把我从你的颅骨里取出后，就开始吵架。真让人难过，他们完全把我们忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Mobius saw an opportunity to gain some leverage, and had me spirited away to his dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯博士相机行事，偷偷把我带到了他的穹顶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does my brain sound so... masculine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我的脑子听起来如此…阳刚？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, well, as to that... you'd be surprised how hard a feminine-sounding voice modulator is to find in the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，好吧，这件事啊…说来你可能会惊讶，整个禁区居然没有一个女声的发声模块。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not as though brain-sustaining life support tanks grow on trees. I had to take what I could get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也知道，维生脑缸这类东西得来不易，我只能有什么就用什么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, let's go. We're getting out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，快走。我们一起离开这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ew! Crawl back in there? Are you mad? I don't know where you've been!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呕！爬回你的头里？你疯了吗？我都不知道你去过哪儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015772_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For all I know, you're riddled with disease, or packing one of those delightful head wounds you seem to attract!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道你疾病缠身，还是你觉得那自找枪伤的脑壳会很吸引我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015772_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not crawling back into your head just to ooze right back out again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不想爬进你的脑袋里，然后又恶心地跳出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015772_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... I suppose you've convinced me well enough. I'll rejoin your body if that's your final decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧……我想你说服我了。如果这就是你最后的决定，我会回到你的身体里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015b69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, before we get to that stage of the proceedings, we have a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，在我回去之前，还有个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015b69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I could settle myself back in your skull and reconnect all those pesky nerve endings, Dr. Mobius doesn't have the tools here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算我愿意回到你颅骨里，重新链接那些烦人的神经末梢，莫比乌斯博士这儿也缺少必要的工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015b69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We would have to make use of Dr. Klein's lab, and I rather doubt the brains are inclined to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们得借用克莱因博士的实验室，但我很怀疑那些脑子是否会同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015b69_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what do you say, brain? Join me for some more wild adventures?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以……你怎么说，脑子？加入我好来些更狂野的冒险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, yes. I would love a cookie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，麻烦给我一块甜饼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... ugh... is this really what I have to look forward to?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…唉…我其实不是这个意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015768_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, you're my brain, so you'd better be more respectful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你是我的脑子，所以你最好给我放尊重点！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, had I? What exactly will you do if I don't? Not put me back in that cranial donjon you call your head? Heavens forbid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是吗？我要是不肯呢，你打算怎样？不会想把我抓进你的颅骨里关起来吧？不要啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001576e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you such a dick?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么这么混蛋？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's a fine how-do-you-do! Me! A, quote, dick, unquote. As if I'm the one responsible for the way you carry on, gadding about the Wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我不是在很好地和你打招呼么！我！你所说的“混蛋”。明明是你在废土上愚蠢胡闹，四处乱窜，好像我该为你的行为负责一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015775_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not the one that makes us clamber around tetanus-infested ancient Vaults or go charging off to New Vegas on missions of ill-conceived revenge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 又不是我决定在那些破伤风横行的远古避难所里上蹿下跳，或者打鸡血似地踏上计划不周的新维加斯复仇之旅！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015775_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And have we forgotten who got us shot in the head and buried in a shallow grave? Hmm? Do you think I enjoyed that little moment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还记得是谁害得我们挨了某人一枪，又被埋在某个浅浅的小坟坑里吗？嗯？你觉得那个时候我很享受吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015775_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you... my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是…我的脑子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, lovely, figured that out, have we? Would you like a cookie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你终于明白了，是吧，小可爱？要吃小甜饼吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001577a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Gabe, down! Down, boy! Stop it!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -加布，坐下！坐下，孩子！别这样！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015790_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Now... let the intruder have the Sonic Emitter schematics. Klein wants it, all right, boy? Let the intruder dig it up wherever you buried it.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -听话…让入侵者把声波发射器的图纸拿走。克莱因需要它。好吗，孩子？让这个侵入者把它从你埋的地方挖出来吧。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015794_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Gaaabe! I am sorry I put your brain in a bowl, boy. Oohhh, who's a good boy. YOU are!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -加～布！对不起，把你的脑子泡在罐里，我的孩子。噢哦哦哦，谁是好孩子呀。当然是你！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000157a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Gabe would bark and snarl and bite whenever ANYONE came to visit.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -加布会狂吠，追赶并撕咬任何造访的人。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000157a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -That's why I replaced his legs with spare parts and fed him a steady diet of Psycho-laced dog chow.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -所以我用备用零件替换了他的腿，喂他含疯狂药的狗粮。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000157a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Ohhhhh yes, my PET, Gabe. I'd forgotten about the old boy and the COUNTLESS experiments I'd done on him back at Higgs.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -噢，是的，我的宠物狗，加布。我差点忘了他，还有在希格斯村对他做的无数实验。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015791_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Gaaabe? Gabe, you're about to have your FAVORITE treat - a VISITOR. Won't that be nice? DON'T eat the visitor, boy. Don't. Please.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -加，加布？加布，马上就有你最喜欢的娱乐了——有访客来了。这不是很好吗？只是千万别把那人吃了，孩子。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015792_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Residential Test. Wasn't that shut down for some reason?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -住宅区测试…不是因为某个原因被关停了吗？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015793_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Oh my, you got to the Residential Test! This is really Borous, by the way, hello again. None of us thought you would get this far.
ESP.TRADUIT: -我的天，你竟然要进行住宅区测试了！我是现实中的鲍鲁斯，顺便，你好啊，我们谁也没想到你能走到这一步。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015795_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Attention students. This is the pre-recorded voice of your pre-recorded principal. Doctor Principal BOROUS!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -同学们注意了！这是预录的你们即将到任的校长的声音。鲍鲁斯博士校长！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015796_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -You may know me as the Head Chief First Researcher of Labs Z-9 and Z-14.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你们应该知道我是Z-9和Z-14两个实验室的最高首席领头研究员。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015797_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There I fought valiantly to preserve rattlesnake DNA, and put it right where it belongs, in the husk of another feared predator.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -在那里，我为保护响尾蛇的DNA进行了英勇的斗争，并把它放在了属于它的地方，放在了另一种令人畏惧的捕食者的躯壳里。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015798_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Oh, and the tarantula hawk. Can't splice enough, I always say, especially if you can make a magnificent Cazador!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -哦，那些毒蛛蜂也是我的杰作。我总是说，怎么拼接都不为过，尤其是如果你能制造出一只巨大的猎蜂！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_00015799_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Enough about ME. It has come to my attention that many of you SEEMINGLY innocent children have been subverted by Red Propaganda.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不说我了。最近，我注意到你们这些貌似无辜的孩子里，不少人居然已经被敌人的红色宣传策反了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001579a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -This is a MOST serious matter requiring the MOST serious of detentions.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这是最恶劣的问题，必须处以最严厉的留堂处置。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001579b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Can you spell detention? I'll tell you how I spell it: DEATHtention. Commie-pinko-traitors, ALL.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -写得出"留堂"(detention)这词儿吗？我拼给你看：处死(DEATHtention)。极左共匪叛国贼，一个也不留。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001579c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Now, I will send vicious cybernetic cyborg dogs through the corridors to weed all you traitors out.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -现在开始，我将派遣凶猛的赛博犬驻守走廊，确保根除所有叛徒。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001579d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -They will sniff out which among you have chosen the commie path.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -它们能嗅出你们谁走上了共产主义之路。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001579e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Especially YOU, Betsy Bright, who turned me down for the high school dance so you could smoke with RICHIE MARCUS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -特别是像你，贝琪.布莱特，曾在中学舞会拒绝我，就为了和里奇.马库斯抽大烟。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001579f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Hall Monitors will also be vigilant. Step outside during class, and they'll make sure you make a speedy jump back to your desk.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -大厅的监视者也会全天候警戒。上课时走出教室一步，它们会确保你马上跳着滚回课桌边。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000157a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Hold your urine and wait for the PROPER bathroom breaktime.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -抑制住排泄的冲动，你们有专门的小便时间。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000157a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -School is a sacred trust. Even though I am a long-ago graduate of this hated facility...-
ESP.TRADUIT: -学校意味着一份神圣的信任。即使我已从这可恨的机构毕业多年…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000158a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -...now I see its worth, and see it was corrupted by fraternities, and... GIRLS. Yuck!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -…现在我明白了它的价值，也明白它所受的污染，被那些联谊会还有…女生们。呸！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000158a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Today the cafeteria will be serving... nothing, because I didn't build one.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -今天食堂提供的是…什么都没有，因为我没建食堂。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000158a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -No cafeteria. No bathrooms. No swirlies. No chocolate pudding left in the chairs of brilliant minds. What are you going to do now RICHIE MARCUS?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -没有食堂，没有浴室，没有能塞进脑袋的马桶，聪明学生的座椅上不会再有巧克力布丁。哈，里奇.马库斯，看你还能怎么办？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000158a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Please place all filthy propaganda books in the incinerator chute in the Sink, especially those with funny pictures of me in them.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -请把肮脏的宣传册都扔进汇聚节点的焚书槽，特别是画着我滑稽样子的那些。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001589c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I am lord of this institution. Where once, long ago, I was a student here. Now, I am its OMNIPOTENT GOD-PRINCIPAL.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我是这座设施的主宰者。很久以前，我曾是这里的学生。现在，我是这的校长，是这里全能的神。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001589e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -As I soon will be LORD of Big MT. DOO DE DOO. Do you hear that? It is my trumpet of victoryness!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不久，我还将君临大山脉。嘟滴嘟，你们都听见了吗？是我胜利的号角声。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001589f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Down at the end of the hall is BALL storage. For jocks who like BALLS, like RICHIE MARCUS. Do you hear me, Betsy? RICHIE likes BALLS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -走廊尽头是个球柜，这是专门为里奇.马库斯那类喜欢球的家伙准备的。你听见了没，贝琪？里奇他喜欢“球儿.-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_000158a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -You are in the LIBRARY. Be quiet here and filled with SHHHHH.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你现在在图书馆。保持安静，别出声，嘘。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03borousx8_0001589d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一个升级你的全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, you found my mood lighting! Installing upgrade!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！你找到了我的“情感之光”模块！正在安装升级！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did he manage that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I'm afraid the trauma of our separation rendered me quite insensate. I didn't come around until I was safely ensconced in this tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不清楚。咱俩分离的创伤让我失去了知觉，我醒来时就已经被安置在这个罐子里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm quite sure whatever he did was highly scientific, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但，我能保证他做的一切都很科学，很合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems like a pretty unlikely coincidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也太巧了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hardly. Dr. Mobius keeps a close optical sensor on the goings-on at the Think Tank. As soon as he saw the opportunity, he took it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不，莫比乌斯博士一直密切监视着思想体们的一举一动。一旦发现机会，他就会马上行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that answers that. On to something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这说得通。我们聊些别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, as long as your curiosity is satisfied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，只要能满足你的好奇心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You talk a lot of science, brain, but you don't make a lot of sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑，你说了很多科学知识，但你完全没说明白啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, let me put this in terms you'll understand. Brain: smart. Heart: stupid. Spine: very stupid. You: exceptionally stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我解释到你能理解的程度。大脑：聪明。心脏：愚蠢。脊椎：很愚蠢。你：无与伦比的愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does that explain the matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这下解释清楚了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you don't have a mouth, but you can talk. Explain that, smarty-pants!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你没嘴，却能说话。这个你怎么解释，自作聪明的家伙！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have... Ugh! I have an inferior frontal gyrus wired directly into a speech-synthesizing processor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有…啊！我有，我的额下连接了一个语音合成处理器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your heart can't be wired up to a... a thought-synthesizing processor! You can't talk to it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你的心脏没法连接到…思维合成处理器上！所以你没法和它说话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, brain? You seem... awful smart all of a sudden.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，脑子？你似乎…突然变得非常聪明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been bettering myself, I'll have you know. I've been reading - actual literature, mind you, not that ¡La Fantoma! or Tæles of Chivalrie drivel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你，我一直在提升自己。我读了很多书。听清楚了，是真正的文学著作，不是什么《夜魔侠！》，或者什么瞎编的《屠龙骑士传奇》。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been studying the classics, acquiring a solid grounding in medicine and the sciences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过研读大量经典文献，我在医学、科学上打下了坚实的基础。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, I'm fairly certain this tank has been liberally salted with ground Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，我还非常肯定这个罐子里到处都是残留的曼他特药粉，就跟被充分腌制过一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158eb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this smart-talk is hurting my head. Please stop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些聪明话听得我头疼，求你别说了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we certainly wouldn't want to strain your comprehension, would we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，毕竟我们也不想伤害你的理解能力，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about my spine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我的脊椎呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Argh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I... well... look, it's all a very complex system of biofeedback and other things I wouldn't expect you to understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我……好吧……听着，这是一套非常复杂的生物反馈系统，我不觉得你能够理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you're the source of most of those glands. Unless you're arguing that my thyroid is to blame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但大多数腺体都在你身上，你不会以为都是我身上的甲状腺的错吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] And you're an expert on your own glandular delusions, are you? No, leave this one to an impartial authority: me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]那你一定是自身腺体妄想症的专家吧，嗯？你不是，所以你应该把这个问题留给真正的权威解答：也就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't seem quite right...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎不太对啊…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Admit it. You're just as glandular as I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 承认吧，你我都含有腺体，也都会受腺体影响。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, all right... perhaps I am, but at least I'm logical about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，好吧…或许是这样，但至少我更有逻辑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's so bad about letting the brains get out? They don't seem that terrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放走他们能有多糟糕？他们看着一点也不可怕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't seem so bad? They vivisected us just to see what would happen! Have you forgotten the Lobotomites? The Cyberdogs, I assume you saw those?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可怕？他们切开咱俩只为看看会发生些什么！难道你忘了那些无脑人？还有那些赛博犬？我想你应该已经见过这些了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine that kind of "science" spread across the entire Mojave. Every man, woman and child we've met reduced to a Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想看，这种"科学"要是传遍莫哈维，我们见过的所有男人，女人，甚至孩子全都得沦为无脑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是你想要的结果吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158ed_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well, I suppose I do miss those endorphin rushes when we save the day. All right - what's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 唉，我想我确实很怀念过去力挽狂澜时的那种内啡肽奔流。好吧，你有什么计划？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're part of me. I know you don't want to let that happen any more than I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我的一部分。我知道你比我更不希望那样的事情发生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] We have to do no such thing! Just don't bring them the tools they need to get out!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我们没必要那样做！不给他们逃脱所需的工具不就结了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000158e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on! We have to stop them! And stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走！我们去阻止他们！粉碎他们的阴谋！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's going to be a problem. Until they fix me, I can't leave Big Mountain either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个问题。他们不把我复原成原来的样子，我就没法离开大山脉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, I had overlooked that particular angle. Still, it's not so bad staying here, is it? We could be comfortable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我把那点给忘了。不过，就呆在这里也不坏，你不觉得吗？咱们能过得很舒服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015a74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015a72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015a78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015a77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I promise I'll take better care of myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我保证我会更小心的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I believe you - and I'm not saying I do - we still have one significant problem we're facing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我相信你，不是说我真相信你，我们仍然还有很个棘手的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015a73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promise I'll take better care of myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证我会更小心的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I believe you - and I'm not saying I do - we still have one significant problem we're facing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我相信你，不是说我真相信你，我们仍然还有很个棘手的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015a80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
