ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkjuke_00014422_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some day, I'd like to meet the man who's got no blues to sing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有一天，我会找到一个不唱“蓝调”的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkjuke_00015f2e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A most rapturous good morrow on your return to your domicile, sir. I trust you shall find things in order and the riffraff contained.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您终于回到您的住所了，真是一个令人欣喜若狂的清晨。我确信您会发现，一切都井然有序，包括那群流氓在内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkcent_00015f35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might sir care for an apéritif to balm the weariness of sirs manifold journeys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，要来杯开胃酒一洗征尘吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkcent_00015f36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps sir would care to put sir's feet up, and I might serenade sir with the dulcet tones of a light opera?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，您坐下休息时，让我用轻歌剧的悦耳声调，为您哼唱一首小夜曲如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkcent_00015f37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir's accoutrements are precisely where sir has left them, and should the toaster say otherwise I remind sir that it is a wastrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您寄存在这的装备没有人动过，老爷。但容我提醒您，烤面包机那废物可能会在这件事上唱反调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkcent_00015f38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If sir would press sir's spinal area against my primary instrument panel, I might vibrate at a soothing frequency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，您愿意背靠主仪表操纵面板的话，我就能为您的脊椎区域做柔和的振动按摩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkcent_00015f39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir is looking exceptionally sharp today, if sir will permit the compliment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我赞美您，老爷，您今天看上去格外精神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkcent_00015f3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look out! Communist! No, false alarm. It was just a plate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心！有共产党！唉，虚惊一场，只是只盘子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbook_00015f1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Commies have eyes everywhere, Citizen. And that means they're not just Commies. They're Peeping Toms!
ESP.TRADUIT: 共产党的眼线无处不在，公民。就是说，所谓的共产党，都是些偷窥狂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbook_00015f1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you haven't found any Communists in your back yard, you're not looking hard enough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 后院怎么可能一个共产党也没有？你肯定没去用心细找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbook_00015f1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I smell... sedition!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我闻到了…反动的味道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbook_00015f20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Citizen! Did you know that Communists have an organ behind their eyes that converts salt water into fresh? Or, wait... is that penguins?
ESP.TRADUIT: 公民！你知道吗？共产党员能用眼球后方的某种腺体将海水转化成纯净水。哦，等等…那不是企鹅嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbook_00015f21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you know what the word "proletariat" means, do you know what that makes you? Well read and erudite... for a Communist!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道“无产阶级”这个词的意思，但你知道他们是怎么来的吗？博览群书，博学多才…你就会变成共产主义者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbook_00015f22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't stay away, could you? Yeah, I knew you'd be back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想我了是吗？对，我就知道你会回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbiol_00015f19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so good, I might seed you just by looking at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真开心，仅仅看着你我就快射种子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbiol_00015f1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever seen a Biological Research Station this full of seed? No. No, you haven't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可曾见过有这么多种子的生物研究站？不，不，你从没见过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbiol_00015f1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, baby, bring me a sweet little dried fruit. I'll rehydrate all up in that thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快来，宝贝儿，给我些可爱的小干果，我会给它们补充水分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbiol_00015f1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Baby, don't believe a word that sink says. She's all lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝贝儿，别听水槽胡说，她满嘴谎话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbiol_0000f055_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Muggy? Yeah, Muggy's all right. Not too seedy, but hey, nobody's perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小杯具？啊，小杯杯人还不错。或许没我有种，但，嘿，人无完人不是吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkbiol_0000f056_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zzz... forceps, nurse! This man's got a severe case of shoe lung!
ESP.TRADUIT: Zzz…把钳子拿来，护士！这男人有很严重的蹄肺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkauto_00015f41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zzz... no... not that scalpel, the fish scalpel!
ESP.TRADUIT: Zzz…错了…不是那把手术刀，我要的是给鱼用那把！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkauto_00015f42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zzz... zzz...
ESP.TRADUIT: Zzz…把钳子拿来，护士！这男人有很严重的蹄肺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkauto_00015f43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zzz... Foot bone's connected to the... leg bone. Leg bone's connected to the... purple bone.
ESP.TRADUIT: Zzz…足骨连着…腿骨。腿骨连着…紫骨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkauto_00015f44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zzz... Three angry Deathclaws make for a lot of reconstructive surgery.
ESP.TRADUIT: Zzz…三只狂暴死亡爪意味着一次彻底的整形手术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkauto_00015f45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zzz... <Snort.>
ESP.TRADUIT: Zzz…把钳子拿来，护士！这男人有很严重的蹄肺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03sinkauto_00015f46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't that prove you're wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还没证明你错了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evidence to the contrary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 反例？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -ENOUGH! Stop filling my precious brain cell units with irrelevant data!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -够了！别再往我宝贵的脑细胞里塞那些无关紧要的数据了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -You sound like the OTHER visitors. Making WILD claims of a WORLD beyond, where there is a WAR beyond WAR. It is UNPROVEN! And UNTHINKABLE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你和其他的来访者们一样，毫无根据地宣称外面还有一个世界，说那里除了战争还是战争。这根本无法证实！这不可理喻！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f67_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Bother the OTHER DOCTORS with your crackpot theories, I have NO TIME! NONE of us do.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -把你的疯狂想法拿去烦其他博士吧，我没有时间和你理论！我们都没有！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f67_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's a whole world beyond this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可是这地方之外可是一个偌大的世界啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you want to leave here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你难道不想离开这里么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -NO! Beyond... is DEATH, despite mounting evidence to the contrary!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不想！外面…根本没有生命。我不管现在那些不断增加的反例！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -No matter where these strange humans wander in from with their IDEAS and new BRAINS, there is NOTHING beyond BIG MT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不管那些带着奇怪想法，还有新大脑的人类是从哪来的，总之大山脉之外什么也没有。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute - that means you're trapped here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，也就是说你们被困在这里了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -TRAPPED? NONSENSE, we are SECURE here. From evil philosophies.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -被困？瞎扯，我们被保护在这里，免遭那些邪恶思想的侵害。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Ever since my anxiety-filled days of powerlessness and being bullied in American High School, I have dreamed of such security as the FENCE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -在读美国中学时，我受尽欺凌，又无力反抗。度过那段充满焦虑的日子之后，我就一直梦想着有这样一个屏障保护我。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -That, and giant cybernetic dogs that would ruthlessly patrol and kill anyone who wasn't my friend. Like RICHIE MARCUS. And BETSY BRIGHT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我还想要只巨大的赛博犬，它会四处巡逻并无情地杀死任何不是我朋友的人，就像里奇·马库斯和贝琪·布莱特。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Who's laughing NOW, Betsy? I hope you and Richie are HAPPY, smoking in your radioactive coffins. I'm GLAD you never came to my birthday party.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -现在谁笑到最后了呢，贝琪？祝你和里奇幸福，幸福地在受辐射的棺材里抽大烟。我真高兴你从没来参加过我的生日派对。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f76_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I get my brain back, I can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我拿回自己的脑子，就能离开这。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -WHAT? Why would you do either of those things? That is MADNESS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -什么？为什么你想要做这些事？你疯了吗。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There is NOTHING outside Big MT. Eh, we're pretty sure. Eh, we would know.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -大山脉之外什么也没有。呃，我们很确定。呃，我们会知道的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That fence doesn't make much sense to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不觉得这屏障有多大意义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It makes PERFECT sense. Who are you to question the MIGHTY RADAR FENCE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -意义可大了。你是什么东西，也配来质疑伟大的雷达屏障。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about this "Radar Fence" around the Crater.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我那些围绕环形坑的“雷达屏障”的事情吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The RADAR FENCE protects us all! If evidence is correct, the one who built it - is ME!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这些雷达屏障保护了我们所有人！如果资料正确的话，建造它的人，就是我！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It keeps anything with a disembodied brain INSIDE - like US - and anything without a brain... also INSIDE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -它让没有身体的大脑们只能待在里面，像我们。对于没有大脑的身体们，也是如此！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It is the ULTIMATE DEFENSE against Communist aggression. There'll be no infectious ideas on MY watch!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -它是抵御共产入侵的终极屏障。在我的监视下，任何病态的观念都无法传染给其它人！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f66_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was this explosion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这爆炸是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -BOOM! Yes. Quite unexpected. And embarrassing. All better now after the landscaping, though. MUCH more pleasing to our monitors.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -轰！是的，很突然，也很尴尬。不过景观美化后一切都好多了，我们监测起外边也舒服多了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -And the Crater helps keep everything inside. Because it is BOWL shaped.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -而且环形坑还有助于让东西乖乖待在里面。因为它本身就是碗形的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test cities?
ESP.TRADUIT: 试验城市？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -YES. In the past... individuals would come to us. Pay for technology. And if their town, community, or city was jusssst right...-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是的。在过去…一些人会来找我们购买技术。然后如果他们的小镇，社区或者城市刚好适合…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -We could USE that city as a controlled experiment. Vault-Tec was MUCH better at it, of course, we had to make do. Get permission. Sometimes.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我们就会用那个城市做对照实验。当然了，避难所科技公司更擅长搞这个，我们只能将就着试试。试验前要先取得许可，有时候要。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -If only we could have used Commie cities... but capturing whole cities was HARD! So we captured enough Commies to make cities of our OWN!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -如果我们能使用共产主义者的城市就好了…但想占领整个城市非常难！所以我们就抓捕了足够多的共产主义者，来创造我们自己的城市！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -So we had a group of Chinese prisoners to experiment on... those were the days... but the true test was SCIENCE on unsuspecting AMERICANS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -所以我们曾有一整队中国囚犯来进行实验…那是个好时候啊。但真正的科学实验还得在那些毫无戒心的美国人身上开展。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Whether it was holograms, NEW Auto-Docs, toxins, vending machines... we wound them up, let them go into TINY ISOLATED TOWNS. Then... we OBSERVED!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不管是全息影像、新型自动医生、毒气，还是贩卖机…我们把它们打包起来，放置到那些小型的，与世隔绝的城镇里，然后…我们开始观测！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crater looks like it's been tag-teamed by giant fuckbots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个环形坑看样子已经是那些巨型操蛋机器人的天下了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw the expanse from the balcony - you've made a mess of this landscape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从阳台看过外边的景像。你们把这地方弄得一团糟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why have you leveled this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们怎么把大山脉这地方抹平了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It was not our first choice of testing grounds. BUT... we no longer have the luxuries of our TEST CITIES.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这里不是我们首选的试验场地。但…我们也不再有选择试验城市的余裕了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Then, we LOST the MOUNTAIN! After the explosion, we couldn't find it anymore. So the Crater became our testing grounds. For SCIENCE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -之后，我们失去了山脉！爆炸之后，山脉被夷为平地，所以这个环形坑就成了我们的试验地。都是为了科学！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a single, concrete fact. One. Fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一个独立、具体的事实。一个，事实。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Why are we even DEBATING this?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -为什么我们要吵这个？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -What YOU ask is of NULL importance! MOBIUS besieges us, there are more important things to worry about than DATA and FACTS!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你所问的全都无关禁药！莫比乌斯包围了我们，有比数据和事实更值得担心的事情！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Nightstalkers were created for what purpose, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么夜行兽又是为了什么目的被创造的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -To preserve coyote... no, no, wait. The snake DNA was important because... the snakes with the rattles were dying out, and...-
ESP.TRADUIT: -为了保存郊狼…不不，等等，蛇的DNA也很重要，因为…这种尾巴能发出响声的蛇已经濒临灭绝，而且…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Or maybe it was a bet from Calis in X-8? He had some mountain lion... eagle... condor... idea. "Bet you can't breed this," he said. Showed HIM.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -也可能是我在X-8时和卡利斯博士打的赌？他有一些山狮…老鹰…秃鹫…的想法。“打赌你培育不出这个”，他曾说过。我证明给他看了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f74_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Then it... spliced itself into a coyote...-y, snake thing. Which was eventually successful. Kept that DNA where it belonged - spliced.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -然后它就成了一种狼和蛇的复合体。这最终成功了。保住了它们的DNA，以一种复合的形式。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f74_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... when did you create Cazadores?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…那你什么时候创造的猎蜂？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -In... two thousand... let's see, carry the three... then count backwards from the Great Static... or beyond?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -大概在…2000年…让我想想，加上3…再在“大静电”事件往前数…又或者往后？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There were the tarantula debates... and something about hawks, which made it around... eh, 2003? May? Tuesday. It was definitely Tuesday.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那时有些关于狼蛛的争论…还有一些关于鹰的，所以大概应该是…2003年？五月？星期二。对肯定在星期二。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to have a grasp on your own research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像没有紧扣自己的研究。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -NONSENSE! That is what you speak. NONSENSE from beyond!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -胡说！那只是你的想法。荒谬至极！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_research_00015f6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I was at the top of my High School class in American High School. I knew facts. I knew FIGURES. I knew DATA.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -在上美国高中的时候，我在班上就是尖子生。我懂何谓事实，懂图形，也懂数据。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_research_00015f6a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -We would know if our research was flawed. It is NOT! We never contradict ourselves, so do not even TRY!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我们的研究是否有缺陷，我们自己清楚。根本没有！我们从不否认自己，所以你也别想试着这么干！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_research_00015f6a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way to shut it off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有办法关掉它吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel strange in here, peaceful, but on edge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里有种奇怪的感觉，平静又紧张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is the pacification field emitters that are broadcasting into the emptiness of your skull. Without a brain, your aggression is suppressed in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是“平静场”在往你那空空如也的脑壳里发射广播。没有了大脑，你的侵略性就能被抑制住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This makes no sense. How is this even possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这说不通。这怎么可能呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: But how am I still talking and walking around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我怎么还能讲话，还能走动呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is a good question. My theory is that the tesla coils in your brainpan are still connected to your brain somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问得好。我的理论是，你头盖骨里的特斯拉线圈仍然连接着你的大脑，以某种方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It really could be anywhere. Brains are a lot smarter than most researchers give them credit for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它确实在某个地方。大脑比多数研究者认为的还要聪明很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We still have your spine and heart. If you were to somehow find your brain wherever it schlorped off to, you could humanically reduce yourself again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们仍然有你的脊柱和心脏。如果你有办法找回你的大脑，你就可以再次退化成自然人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you say "three minus one" subjects before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你之前要说“三减一”个实验体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because three minus one is two. Two spoke to us, one after the other, one mean, one curious, but there was a third we didn't speak to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为三减一等于二。有两个人，一个卑鄙，另一个好奇，一前一后来同我们交谈。但还有第三个人，我们没和她说过话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last one is the minus one. It got traumatized, then taken to one of our medical centers for de-traumatization. A rather unsettling procedure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一个人就是减掉的那个，它受伤了，然后被送到我们其中一个医疗中心…疗伤，虽然这个过程没能完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00015f6b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way to remove the pacification field in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么才能关掉这儿的平静场？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would you want such a thing? You might surrender to your hormones and commit primal aggression on me... on us... again and again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么想这样？你可能会屈服于荷尔蒙，不停对我…对我们释放你的原始兽欲，一次又一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_removepacificat_00015f68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I would have to return the favor, activating my vivisectors and gently lobotomizing you from behind. Not something I would relish doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我也得回敬你的好意。我会启动解剖器，用后入式温柔地切掉你的脑子。一般我不喜欢这样做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_removepacificat_00015f68_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the only way to circumvent the field is to have a brain. And we extracted that like we do all Lobotomites here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是不可能的，有大脑的生物才能规避平静场。而我们已经把你的大脑切了，就像这儿所有其它无脑人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_removepacificat_00015f68_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Well, I have questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我明白了。我还想问些其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Courier at the helm, Science became a beacon for the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但因掌舵的是那个邮差，科学成了指明人类未来的灯塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016000_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was Old World Blues, and New World Hope. And hope ruled the day at Big MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是旧世界的蓝调，也是新世界的希望。希望重新降临于大山脉之上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016000_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Courier at the helm, it was all this and more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但因掌舵的是那个邮差，甚至这种说法都有轻描淡写之嫌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016001_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old World Blues, New World Misery - the two became one in the Courier's shadow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的蓝调，新世界的惨剧——在邮差的阴影下，两者合二为一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016001_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can be easy to see Science as evil, technology unchecked as the source of all ills, all misfortunes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们很容易认为科学是邪恶的，并且把不受控制的技术视为一切灾厄、不幸的根源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016010_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It became a reality, a withering form of nostalgia for times long past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对旧时代的怀念，讽刺性地成为了现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016027_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where once it was viewed as a form of sadness, nostalgia, it became an expression describing the potential for the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来充斥在字里行间的悲伤与怀旧，变成了对未来远景蓝图的新希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the time following the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, "Old World Blues" became more than a catch phrase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在第二次胡佛大坝战役后，"旧世蓝调"变得不只是句谈资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the times following the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, however, Old World Blues took on a new meaning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，在第二次胡佛大坝战役之后，“旧世蓝调”被赋予了全新的含义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ffa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Big Empty lived up to its name, a hollow crater of failures of a past era, a last, sad statement of the Old World.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坑洞，一如其名，不过是个空荡荡的环形坑，见证了旧时代的失败，成为旧世界悲哀的最后声明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ffb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Science is a long, steady progression into the future. What may seem a sudden event often isn't felt for years, even centuries, to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科学发展对未来的影响是个漫长、持续的过程。看似突如其来的事件，往往早已酝酿了数十上百年，只是无人察觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016006_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They stare into the what-was, eyes like pilot lights, guttering and spent, as the realities of their world continue on around them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 周边世界依然继续前进，他们却像是一群提灯守夜的人们，徒劳、疲惫地紧盯着那些前世旧物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001601b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It refers to those so obsessed with the past they can't see the present, much less the future, for what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它用来形容这么一群人，他们“沉缅往昔，不见当下，遑论将来”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ffc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is an expression in the Wasteland: "Old World Blues."
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土上有一种说法："旧世蓝调"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016012_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so it burbled and bubbled inside its tank, smug that it still could dream its future without glands getting in the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，它在脑缸里咕嘟咕嘟地吹着气泡，自鸣得意于它仍能畅想未来，不用再受腺体的干扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016025_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time, however, it became so self-obsessed it wondered if perhaps nothing existed except itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而随着时间的推移，它变得如此自恋，以至于怀疑除了它自己以外，世上没有任何东西存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016025_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It decided to test this by turning the weapons of the Big Empty against each other and seeing what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它决定做个试验，让大坑洞里的所有武器自相攻击，看看结果是否如它所想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016025_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The answer is lost to history, as is much of the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个问题的答案湮没在了历史中，一如莫哈维的大部分地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016025_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even at the end when it started to fail, however, the brain resisted going into a floating chassis like the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它开始逐渐衰弱，然而，即使在弥留之际，它也拒绝像智库一样，坐进漂浮的容器里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016026_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It never said why. Perhaps it was out of respect for the Courier's body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 背后的原因它从未提起，也许是出于对邮差身体的敬意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016026_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All things must come to an end, and to hang on to the past is something that's not to be undertaken lightly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世间万物都必须迎来终结。紧抓过去，不愿放手，可不是什么能一笑置之的小事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016026_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier, organs intact, continued onwards, a little less heavy of step, but with all the organs in the right places. As they should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 器官完整无缺，邮差再次踏上旅程。尽管步伐稍显沉重，但所有器官都各就其位，如其所应然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016009_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, brains can develop a life of their own when left to their own thoughts, and the Courier's brain was more clever than most.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，如果能让大脑独立思考，他们也能发展出自己的生命，何况邮差的大脑更是绝顶聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016009_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier left the brain at the Big Empty. A strange thing to say, but it was the truth. Brains are less important than they may seem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差把自己的脑子留在了大坑洞。说起来很奇怪，但这就是事实。大脑并没有人们看起来的那么重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the Courier's body finally passed, the brain was saddened. It kept on, remembering the vessel that had once contained it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当得知邮差的躯体已逝时，大脑感到很难过。怀揣着对曾经容器的回忆，它继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03playersbrainvoice\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The two of them constructed a litter of cyberpups, a small army of Boston terrifiers that gnawed and devoured anything in their path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他俩造了一窝赛博犬宝宝，这一小队波士顿的梦魇会撕咬啃噬掉任何冒犯他们的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016011_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, she ran across Rex at the Kings School of Impersonation. His brain was failing. That was all right, he was still smarter than the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在猫王模仿学校，她遇到了雷克斯。他的大脑正在衰败。但她不觉得这是个问题，他依旧比那些思想体聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016018_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, she ran across Rex, who had been following the Courier, just as she had. They barked for a while, and realized they had a lot in common.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里，她遇到了雷克斯。他曾经跟随邮差旅行，就像她之前一样。他们聊了一会儿，发现彼此间共同点真的是太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016019_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, she ran across the corpse of Rex. She dragged him back to the Big Empty and had him rebuilt for company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里，她遇见了雷克斯的尸体。她把他拖回了大坑洞，将他重新制造成了她的同伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001601a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cybernetic canine, gender: female, designation: ROXIE sat in her guard post in X-8.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只名叫洛茜的雌性赛博犬坚守在她X-8的岗位上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is, until her "I'm in heat" programming circumvented her "stay" routine and she loped into the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样，直到她"我发情了"的程序成功越过"呆在这"的程序，她才飞奔进了莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\robotmistergutsy\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time, the Auto-Doc found a way to deactivate the Y-17 Trauma Harnesses, releasing the corpses they had held prisoner for almost 200 years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来，自动医生找到了关闭Y-17防创束身服的方法，让那些被监禁了200多年的枯骨们终于重获自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Auto-Doc, always gentle and methodical, kept sewing up the Courier in all the right places when the skin split open from repeated wear and tear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生总是那么温柔、那么有条不紊，每次邮差的皮肤在饱受折磨而开裂之后，都能恰到好处地为他缝合伤口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ffd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Auto-Doc was just glad to have purpose again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生很高兴重新有了目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ffd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It heard its simpler brothers and sisters who got shipped to the Sierra Madre were bored out of their skulls in that toxic, dead city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它听说那些简易版本的兄弟姐妹们，它们自从被送到马德雷，那座充斥着毒气的死城以后，终日无所事事，闲得都要发疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03autodocvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ffd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was rumored by the other personalities that he had a brief fling with the light switches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据其他人格助手传言，他和电灯开关们有过一段风流韵事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016024_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although he forgot their names once too often and was soon left in the dark as punishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过他总是弄混她们的名字，所以没过多久他就被关在了一片漆黑里，作为惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016024_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blind Diode Jefferson eventually discovered a new sound... silence. It only made him more filled with the blues than before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 盲二极管·杰弗逊最终找到了一种新声音…寂静。这让他比之前更忧郁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blind Diode Jefferson, with sounds the Courier brought him, created a symphonic counter-frequency that saved Big MT from sonic invasion in 2910.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利用邮差带来的声音，盲二极管·杰弗逊创造了一个交响乐团级的反频率。这帮助大山脉成功抵御了2910年的音波入侵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you didn't hear about it - good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没听说过这件事——那就对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03jukeboxvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Muggy continued to collect coffee cups until his wheel got a flat just out of reach of a dirty coffee cup, and his tiny robotic brain exploded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小杯具继续不停收集咖啡杯。直到某天，它为了去够一个脏杯子不慎滑倒，摔爆了他小小的电子脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016007_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Muggy did his best to collect coffee cups, although in his quest, he accidentally trapped himself in Higgs' Village.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小杯具依旧尽其所能去收集马克杯。不过在一次探索中，它不小心把自己困在了希格斯村里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016008_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might have been the end for poor Muggy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小杯具本以为会这样可悲地死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016008_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except... he found it peaceful there, tidying up the kitchens of the Think Tank Professors back when they had been flesh and bone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到…通过清扫智库博士们在人类时代使用的厨房，他居然在那里找到了平静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016008_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, except for Dr. O, who was an asshole for having created Muggy in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，除了O博士，那个最初创造了小杯具的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016008_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Muggy left O's house deliberately dirty, punishing the dishes and cups that lived there in blind revenge for serving Dr. O.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了报复O博士，小杯具故意把O的房子弄得特别脏，并盲目地虐待那里的杯碟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03muggyvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016008_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It learned several new murderous techniques from the Courier, and built a Blood Shrine to itself in the Cuckoo's Nest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凭借从邮差那儿学来的谋杀技巧，它后来把疯人院变成了自己的血腥圣殿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016022_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cave floor was soon filled with the horror of a hundred gutted toasters, a silent, grisly, unplugged audience...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久，这个洞穴就成了面包机一族的恶梦。数以百计的面包机残骸充斥其间，成了此处恶行无声的、可怕的、断电的见证者…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016022_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...their purpose... to toast bread... unfulfilled.
ESP.TRADUIT: …它们…烤面包片的目的…永远无法实现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016022_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After one of its more psychotic episodes, however, the other Sink personalities decided enough was enough, and dumped the Toaster in a bathtub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，在烤面包机又一次变本加厉的神经病行为后，汇聚节点的其他人格助手忍无可忍，于是把它扔到了浴缸里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016023_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sparking and hissing, the Toaster swore its enemies would rue the day when they had bread - and no way to toast it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘶嘶地冒着火花，烤面包机发誓它的敌人们一定会后悔一辈子。因为就算它们有面包，也再找不到烤面包的办法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016023_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Toaster continued its psychotic spree, reducing all appliances in range to scrap electronics and spare parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 烤面包机继续精神病似的胡闹，将可触及范围内的一切家电都破坏成电子碎片和零件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03toastervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ffe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once it learned of the Innovative Toxins Plant, however, it gained new purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，当获悉新型毒素工厂的事情后，她有了新的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sought to develop anti-toxins to flush into its drains and counteract the poisons bleeding into the soil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她开始研制抗毒剂，并打算研制成功后将它冲进排水管道，中和掉渗入土地的毒素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, it gained access to the Magnetohydraulics Plant and nearly flooded all the Big Empty in an attempt to scrub the crater clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，她得到了磁能水力工厂的权限。之后，为了把环形坑刷洗干净，她几乎淹了整个大山脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001600b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sink continued to ruthlessly scrub any particulate matter that came near it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水槽继续无情地擦洗任何靠近她的微粒物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001601c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of them eventually transferred to the Lightwave Dynamics Plant - and began a long, unrequited affair with one of the holograms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一个开关后来被调到了光波动力学工厂。之后很长一段时间里，她无果地单恋上了里边某个全息影像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch01voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015fff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This persisted until the day someone dropped a flashlight in the Sink, and the two of them united in their hatred of the "showboat."
ESP.TRADUIT: 她俩依旧无休止地斗嘴，直到某天有人把手电筒掉在汇聚节点，才促使她俩结成了反"引人注目者"同盟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03lightswitch02voicesinkfemale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016017_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The light switches continued to bicker and flicker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电灯开关们和以前一样，一边闪着光，一边不停地吵嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Book Chute continued to devour all seditious materials until it nearly choked on a paper clip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 图书机继续吞食所有反动材料，直到差点被一枚曲别针噎死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It adamantly maintained it was a Chinese paper clip, and the whole thing had been an elaborately orchestrated assassination attempt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它坚称，那是一枚中国造曲别针，并且整件事是场精心策划的暗杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever the reason, it slowed down for a while, carefully appraising each document and clipboard that came to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过不管怎样，它好歹慢下来了，知道在文件、写字板送到的时候应该先仔细审查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bookchutevoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00015ff5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Biological Research Station, obsessed with seeding everything in sight, ran out of fertile plots and blew a circuit trying to seed itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生物研究站沉迷于向视野内的一切播种。在播种完所有肥沃的土地后，它试图向着自己播种，结果烧毁了电路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016020_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Biological Research Station, obsessed with seeding everything in sight, requested a transfer to the X-22 Botanical Garden...
ESP.TRADUIT: 生物研究站沉迷于向视野内所有东西播种。后来它申请调职到X-22植物园工作…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016021_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...so that it might, in its own words, "sensually fertilize the garden's smooooth contours."
ESP.TRADUIT: …他希望这样就能，套用他自己的话，"在植物园那凝脂细肤上尽情播种"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016021_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Garden sent back a polite refusal, saying it had prior commitments with a Vault it had helped infect before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植物园礼貌地拒绝了，因为她早在战前就已和某个被她“感染”的避难所定下了婚约。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03bioresearchlabvoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016021_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sink was strangely silent, which it had never been in previous years. The lack of personality modules made the base lifeless and sterile.
ESP.TRADUIT: “汇聚节点”陷入诡异的寂静，这里在过去的岁月里从不如此。缺少人格模块使这里成了一个毫无生气的乏味之地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016014_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sink atop the Dome gained a frontier town feel with the few modules installed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安装了几个人格模块后，穹顶上的“汇聚节点”有了点边陲小镇的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016015_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They shouted at each other across the HQ occasionally, either threatening each other, or announcing a discovery. It kept things... lively.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些人格偶尔会互相喊叫，有时是宣布新发现，有时又在互相威胁。这让汇聚节点显得…生机勃勃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016015_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secretly, the Sink Central Intelligence Unit was relieved that not all of the personality chips had been found. What was there, was enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人格芯片并没有全部被找回来，对此汇聚节点的中央智能单元暗暗地长舒了一口气。在这的家伙就已经够麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016015_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sink atop the Dome bustled with the voices of a small town, constantly chirping, arguing, and snarling at each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穹顶上的“汇聚节点”现在喧闹得像个小镇，人格们叽叽喳喳，不停地互相争论、喊叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016016_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, this all happened productively in the interests of its new owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这一切都服务于新主人的意趣，在卓有成效地进行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016016_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sink Central Intelligence Unit discovered, despite its inversion code, it was comforted by the sense of community the other personalities gave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汇聚节点的中央智能单元发现，尽管有反转代码，但他还蛮喜欢其它人格带来的这种社区生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016016_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...a cobweb tracery of symbols that told of a thousand brilliant thoughts, now lost to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: …那些密密麻麻的痕迹，曾诉说了无数灿烂的思想，如今已湮没在时间洪流中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001601e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...but these equations were nothing more than thin white traceries of lines, not unlike cobwebs in the corners of a failing mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: …但这些方程式不过是些细白的线条痕迹，跟一个失败的大脑角落里的蜘蛛网没什么两样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_0001601f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, truth be told, the Courier had barely explored the Crater in an attempt to rush through and be done with the whole thing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，为了尽快结束这次事件，邮差只是风风火火地穿过整个环形坑，几乎没怎么探索这里…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016003_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps that was for the best, however... curiosity, while sometimes rewarded for its efforts, often proves to be equally dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这未尝不是最好的结果…因为好奇心驱使的行为，哪怕偶有回报，也往往被证明是同等危险的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016003_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier had scoured much of the Big Empty, although secrets still remained in the crater's depths.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差几乎走遍了大坑洞，不过在其深处，依然存在着未被发现的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016004_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps that was for the best, however... curiosity, while sometimes rewarded for its efforts, often proves to be equally dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这未尝不是最好的结果…因为好奇心驱使的行为，哪怕偶有回报，也往往被证明是同等危险的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016004_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sink Central Intelligence Unit was impressed by the amount of exploration the Courier had undertaken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汇聚节点的中央智能单元对邮差探索地点之多感到十分震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016005_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Facilities believed lost, destroyed, or ones that had simply gotten up and walked to new locations had been re-discovered by its intrepid new master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 被认为消失了，毁坏了的设施，哪怕是自己站起来挪去了新地点的设施，都统统被它勇猛无畏的新主人找了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016005_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Internally, the artificial personality debated as to whether it preferred the old management to the new...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在内心深处，这位人造人格开始思考，新旧主人相比较，哪个更好…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016005_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and concluded that the Courier's thorough approach to research and investigation was admirable and worthy of its respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: …最后它得出结论，邮差研究和调查的方法是如此缜密细致，值得它的赞赏与钦佩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maincomputervoicesinkmale\nvdlc03end_nvdlc03endingsl_00016005_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow... what is this place? Are we... outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇……这 是什么地方？我们……出来了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13l_0001602f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's too bad. Those robots would normally help defend us and the facility if we're attacked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，这可不太好。平时都是这些机器人在抵御外敌，保护我们的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13r_0001602d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were never allowed to blow the robots up before. Cheating gives me such a thrill!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们以前从未被允许炸掉这些机器人。作弊的感觉太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03stealthsuitvoice\nvdlc03aur_stealthsuitx13r_0001602e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't get to the point, I'm going to start shooting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再不说到重点，我可要开枪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only "wrinkle" is the one that bullet made going into my brainpan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一的"褶皱"就是那颗穿透我脑壳的子弹留下的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016081_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there any other data transmitted in your threat broadcast?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在威胁广播里还给他们传递过其他信息么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, my overly aggressive chemmed-up broadcast was designed to keep reinforcing the "forget," "fear," "rinse," and "repeat" program.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我嗑药发疯时极具侵略性的广播，就是为了不断强化他们的"遗忘"、"恐惧"、“清洗”和"重复"程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016097_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and the "get me the things to castrate your only possible escape attempt."
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我还说了："给我拿回这些技术，好让我掐灭你们最后一丝逃生希望"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016097_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I couldn't delete you or your arrival anymore than I could the other visitors. Only so much Science can do when you started talking to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我能删除他们对其他来访者的记忆，但我没法删掉你的。在你与他们交谈开始，科学就无能为力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016097_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're really quiet difficult to ignore, you know. It's because you're... well, bah! Rather intriguing, if you'll forgive an old brain for saying so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，你令人很难忽视。你…呃，呸！相当引人注目，请原谅我这个年老的大脑说出这种话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016097_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Think Tank downloaded the schematics, not the items. They can rebuild them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但智库不只拿到了技术产品，他们还拿到了图纸。他们能借此重现那些技术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. That means my plan is a total failure. That is unfortunate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，就是说我的计划彻底失败了。真不走运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001608f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, at least I tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，贵在尝试嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001608f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is the purpose of the technologies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些技术到底服务于什么目的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The X-2 Antenna can be used to focus your alpha wave frequency thought patterns. The Sneaky Suit? Why, it houses a cardiac regulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: X-2天线能帮助你集中α脑电波，改善思维模式。潜行衣？它内置了心率调节器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the sonic soundwave projecto-emitter was never intended as a weapon. It was a medicinal vertebrae-pulse-de-sensitizer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声波发射器原本不是被当成武器设计。它本该用于医疗，能通过发射脉冲，来降低脊椎对外界刺激的感知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In short: Brains, a heart, and courage... spine. I think there was a story once where a band of murderous thugs sought these things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简要来说：大脑、心脏和勇气…我说脊椎。记得有个童话，讲的正是一群暴徒要寻找这三样东西。（绿野仙踪）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They had them all the time in the story. Didn't stop them from murdering to get them, and it won't stop the Think Tank, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 故事里他们不停的找啊，为了达成夙愿他们不惜杀人。而思想体们，他们早晚会步这些暴徒的后尘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand why they wanted me to gather the technologies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白思想体们为何要让我取回那些技术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I consider "coincidence" to be profanity, along with the words, "astrology," "herbal tea," and "luck." So watch it, Potty Mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我认为"巧合"一词极为无礼。"占星术"，"草药茶"和"运气"也是。注意你的言词，大嘴巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016095_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Klein said they had the idea to get the three technologies after your broadcast. Coincidence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你广播之后，克莱因才提出要搜集这三项技术。这是巧合吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Oh, I don't think they understood, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 哦，我认为他们也不清楚这些技术的用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016096_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first one, the ruthless one who smashed up our toy trains, asked for weapons, power. Items he could use to destroy a nation with force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一位来访者，他残酷无情，并且还弄坏了我们的玩具火车。他追求的是足以毁灭一个国家的武器与力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other... the other asked a different question, and with it, got the true answer. About what makes nations... and what breaks them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一位…他问了一个不同的问题，并得到了正确的答案——什么能孕育一个国家…又是什么能摧毁它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He spoke to the Think Tank, to Klein. Showed them the flag of the Old World... and it made them remember. All of it. All that had happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和思想体们，和克莱因谈了他的问题，向他们展示了旧世界的旗帜…这使他们回忆起一切，回忆起所有过去发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They shared things with him that they shouldn't. He now carries those ideas, that knowledge elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 思想体们还向他分享了一些不该分享的知识。他已经带着这些知识，这些理念离开了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about the other visitors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于其他的来访者你知道些什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not much, except they contaminated Big MT and installed new ideas in the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，除了他们污染了大山脉，给思想体带来新想法外，我知道的并不多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One caused a great deal of infrastructure damage with his brain and smartyness. Ruthless, that one. Played a little rough with the trains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一个家伙很聪明，而且冷酷无情。他造成了大规模的基础设施破坏，还对列车玩了点粗暴的小把戏。
