ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the last one was the most dangerous. Him... eh... slipping away... that was almost as bad as the Think Tank escaping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但最后那个才是最危险的。他…呃…溜走了。这和思想体溜走是同等危险的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you set your threats on a loop to keep them occupied?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你循环播放威胁广播，好让他们无暇他顾？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I certainly wouldn't loop it on purpose purpose purpose. I am far too sophisticated to make such a childish error error error.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。我当然不是不小心按到了循环键，我可不会犯下如此幼稚的错误错误错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, some kind of medical condition?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你是说我得了什么病吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016093_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cranial injury. From the attack outside Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我一次脑袋受伤后留下的，当时我在清泉镇外遇袭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016094_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？你到底在说什么呀？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016086_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bullet that went into my brain? Doc Mitchell tried to patch me up, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你指子弹射进大脑后留下的伤痕？米切尔医生尽力修补了它，不过…

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016087_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you blaming me for this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这都是我的错？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were other visitors, though. Why am I different?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这里也有过其他的来访者，为什么只有我是特别的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there must have been other signs of a larger world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面那个偌大的世界，能证明其存在的事物应该数不胜数才对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There have been other visitors to make them doubt their perceptions, but you are the one who dialed back their monitor-micro-magnifiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前的确有些来访者令他们质疑过自己的观点，但只有你，迫使他们回拨了显微镜的准焦螺旋，看到一个更大的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016083_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were irrefutable proof that there was a world outside. And then there was the whole "brain" fiasco, which forced me to take steps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无可辩驳地证明了外面存在着一个世界，再加上你大脑的那场特殊手术，这逼迫我不得不采取行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016083_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, your brain had a special kind of... uh... wrinkle, a unique-ity that they had never thought to try in all their countless escape attempts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，你的大脑有某个特别的…呃…“褶皱”。这个位置，他们在先前的无数次手术中，都没尝试过动刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016083_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand why you sent the threats - and the Robo-Scorpion army - against the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不理解你为何要恐吓那些思想体，并派遣机械蝎军队和他们对抗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you lobotomized the Think Tank, why terrorize them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你已经阉割过思想体们的脑子，为何还要威胁他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's simple. Despite their many failings, they are rather bright. They are the "Think Tank" for a raisin. That, I didn't change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，道理很简单。尽管他们有着种种缺点，他们依然非常杰出。他们能被称为"思想体"，并非浪得虚名，这点我从未否认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016090_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without something to distract them, make them afraid, they would simply de-deuce what had happened. And when they start deucing it up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不分散他们的注意力，使其产生恐惧感，他们就会开始分析当前情势。而一旦他们开始分析…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016090_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you came along, the final variable solved. They saw that their world was larger than they perceived. Bacteria, finally able to see its host.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后你来了，最后一个变量解决了。他们意识到世界并不仅限于此处。细菌，终于见识到它们的宿主了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016090_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Ouro-bor-ous?" What the hell does that mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: "乌洛鲍鲁斯(Ouro-bor-ous)"到底是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Really? It is so unlike me to make an error in anything I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 真的吗？出错可不像是我会做的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016084_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Minor detail, but a snake devouring its own tail is "Ouro-borus," not "Ouro-borous."
ESP.TRADUIT: 小细节，衔尾蛇的古希腊语是"乌洛波洛斯(Ouro-borus)"，不是"乌洛鲍鲁斯(Ouro-borous)"

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] A snake that sucks its own dingle-thingy, I believe. Borous was always too obsessed with animals and their dingle-thingies.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]据我所知，是一条吞食自己排泄物的蛇。鲍鲁斯总是痴迷于动物和它们的排泄物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016085_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's kind of an asshole thing to do to your friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟对朋友做出如此混账的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it? Hmm... I suppose it is. But really, they started the whole "excrement hole" behavior loop in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？嗯…或许吧。但归根结底，这"混账"的行为循环是从他们先开始的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016088_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. O... which is actually not his real name multiplied, since you can't multiply his real name in the first place... Ouro-bor-ous, Klein...
ESP.TRADUIT: O博士…这其实不是他的真名，他的真名不能拿来做乘法运算…还有乌洛鲍鲁斯（Ouro-bor-ous），克莱因…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They have all forgotten themselves. And not only themselves, but the world, sense of time, and history. All that is left is what's here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们所有人，不仅忘了自己的一切，也忘记了世界、时间观念、历史。剩下为数不多记忆都只是关于这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reprogrammed their chronometers, geometers, and cartography programs. This is now their world, here, Big MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改写了他们的计时系统，几何系统和地理系统。现在对他们来说，大山脉这里，就是整个宇宙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a merciful lobotomy, really, thinking back. They were my friends, but... sometimes they would take things too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细回想，的确，那并不比大脑切除手术仁慈多少。他们是我的朋友，可他们…有时会做些太过火的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the world isn't ready for that kind of too-far-thing-taking. That's my professional opinion, anyway, and I am told I was once quiet professional.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那种过火的事，是世界不能承受之重。不管怎么说，这是我的专业意见。而以前有…某些人也高度评价过我的专业水平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any event, you showed up at the Think Tank, and because you had suffered a cranial injury in just the right place...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，后来你出现在了智库，而且因为头部的那个位置正好受过伤…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullets in the head are usually much more fatal, and yours was a light case of bullet-head-itis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 常人脑袋中枪早就没命了，你却只有弹头导致的轻度炎症。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... it was enough for the Auto-Doc in the Sink to change its programming to fix the problem. And the brain extraction technology for once, worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但…为了修正问题，汇聚节点的自动医生还是改变了手术程序。大脑提取技术也因此碰巧完美奏效了，这是多年来的首次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That gave the Think Tank the knowledge its brains shouldn't... couldn't... sh'couldn't possess. With that knowledge, the procedure can be reversed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次手术让思想体们获得了他们不应…不能…不应能拥有(scouldn't)的知识。有了这一知识，大脑提取手术将能被逆向执行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they obtain that procedural data, they can use it to mush and modify their cranial selves into hosts to slip past the Radar Fence, I'm sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信，如果获得了手术的数据，他们就能找到办法把大脑安回身体里，从而越过雷达屏障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And once they're off the reservation...
ESP.TRADUIT: 而一旦他们离开这里…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My threat broadcast is designed to instill... and install... fear. And along with the emotional download, other data rides the fear carrier wave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发威胁广播的初衷是灌输…和安装…恐惧。但与此同时，其它信息也伴随着恐惧载波，被一并发送了过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It prompted them to focus on retrieving those technologies and bring them to "attack" me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些信息使他们专注于取回这些技术，并拿它们来"攻击"我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And coincidentally... pardon my language... all those technologies are needed to put a brain, your brain, back into its skull. Properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巧合的是…原谅我的用词…这些技术恰恰是把大脑，特别是你的大脑，重新安回颅内所必须的知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_testduplicate00_0001608d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep going, I want to hear the rest of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请继续，我想听听之后的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's why they have all those stupid names?
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是乎他们就有了这些蠢名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] O, you figured it out. No pun intended.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]O，你竟能领会此中深意。我可没在阴阳你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016091_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Klein... Mobius... O's a circle... 8's an infinity symbol... they're all loops, I get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因…莫比乌斯…圆环型的O…像无穷符号的8…这些名字都代表了循环，我似乎明白了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I don't know if they're stupid, I was trying for accuracy.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 那些名字很蠢吗？我已经尽力用得精确了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016092_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A recursion loop is designed to prevent the flow of information. So...
ESP.TRADUIT: 递归循环是用来阻碍信息流的，这么说…

ESP.ORIGINAL: So all this insanity is because of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说这里所有的疯狂都是因为你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you trap them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给他们下套，想困住他们，这总得有原因吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Radar Fence to keep the Think Tank hemmed in wasn't really enough. They keep testing things, they would have found a way to disarm it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想困住他们，只靠一个雷达屏障可不够。像他们那样不断的进行实验，早晚能找出解除屏障的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect I have Plan 9s in place, but I may have coded myself to forget them, just in case... they're probably very dangerous, lethal, or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还制定了几个“计划9”，但后来为了以防万一又编程删除了相关记忆…或许因为这些计划非常危险，致命，甚至更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I had to do something else to keep them occupied here. Or as you like to say "trapped." I prefer to have several Plan 9s in case the 7s fail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此我只能做些别的事情，来让他们老实地呆在这里。或是如你所言，“下套”。我向来习惯尽可能多的制定"计划9"，以防"计划7”失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d11_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspect I have Plan Cs in place, but I may have coded myself to forget them, just in case... they're probably very dangerous, lethal, or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还制定了几个“计划C”，但后来为了以防万一又编程删除了相关记忆…或许因为这些计划非常危险，致命，甚至更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I had to do something else to keep them occupied here. Or as you like to say "trapped." I prefer to have several plan Bs in case the As fail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此我只能做些别的事情，来让他们老实的呆在这里。或是如你所言，“下套”。我向来习惯尽可能多的制定"计划9"，以防"计划7”失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012d12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you reprogrammed yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…你重编了自己的程序？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Now, "trap" is a rather harsh word. Like "excrement." Not an inappropriate word, but still - rather harsh.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我说，"下套"这个词显得我真恶劣，像在说"混账"一样。用词倒不能算错，可就是，太刺耳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016089_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... yes, I did... take some liberties with their programming. It's all right, they don't remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但…没错，我确实…确实困住了他们，剥夺了他们的自由。没关系的，他们根本不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016089_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly didn't until you said "trap." And then I said "excrement." And then...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一直这么想的，直到你说"下套"，然后我说"混账"。我…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016089_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You reprogrammed their names as part of recursion loop? What, to trap their processors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把他们的名字编入了递归循环？怎么，为了给他们的处理器下套吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I believe I did, and with good raisin. Who am I to be trusted with such things?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我确实做了，而且有正当的理由。做了这样的事，我也没指望谁还会信任我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001608a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you forgot your master plan - surprised you remember your own name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎把计划都给忘了。我很惊讶你还能记得自己的名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This name's as real as you or I, although I believe your brain expressed similar incredulity at the nature of such an appellation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个名字就和你我一样真实。尽管对于该称谓的本质，你的大脑也表达过和你一样的怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Someone's been watching too many Old World science fiction movies," it said. I believe it meant me.
ESP.TRADUIT: “某人是看了太多旧世界科幻电影吧”，它说。我想这就是在说我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must admit I have a vulnerability for holotape fantasies of planets and robots and all that is forbidden. As for the name I was born with...
ESP.TRADUIT: 必须承认，我真的很喜欢看科幻电影，醉心于那些对星球啊，机器人啊之类禁忌事物的幻想。哦，说回我与生俱来的名字…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...like the Think Tank, we were all reprogrammed to forget them, take on new names. It enforces the recursion loop in our perception programming.
ESP.TRADUIT: …和思想体一样，我们的程序都被重新编写过，让自己忘了它，然后接受新的称谓。之后新的名字就会在我们感知程序中强制执行递归循环。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything you've told me doesn't add up... your plan, even your name, "Mobius."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉我的一切都不合情理……不管是你的计划，还是你的名字，[QUOTE]莫比乌斯。[QUOTE]

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Dr. Mobius," rather catchy, isn't it? It's my name, my new name, overwrote the old one.
ESP.TRADUIT: "莫比乌斯博士"，琅琅上口，不是吗？这就是我的名字，覆盖更改后的新名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016079_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any tactics I could use to attack the Think Tank?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么和思想体战斗的建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't want to keep them out of trouble, I want to kill them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我无意阻止他们闯祸，我想直接干掉他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That will be difficult. It would be like fighting five scaled down versions of me that have better depth perception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不太容易，相当于你得面对五个大部分能力弱化，但深度知觉能力强化的我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001608e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they have an arsenal of vivisectors, brainial beams, and a rather nasty WooEEEOooWooEEEOoo ray that can make your atoms do a happy dance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且他们配备有完备的武器库，包括解剖器、脑波射线，还有一个能让你身体里原子欢快起舞的非常讨厌的“喔哦哦哦”射线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001608e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could survive those highly-improbable odds and ends, then deceasing them is definitely an option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是确定能挺过那些稀奇古怪的物事，那杀掉他们当然也是一种选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001608e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although I doubt killing them would do anything except make you feel better. Or let you brag to other humans about your primal violent-ness-ness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我怀疑你只是为了找点乐子，或是能向别人夸耀你那原始的暴力行为？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001608e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was the plan you had?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的计划是什么样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something ingenious and needlessly complicated, I expect. I may have already told you and forgotten it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该是个新颖巧妙并且复杂繁琐的计划，我想。也许我已经跟你说过，只是后来又忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016082_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I forgot I had forgotten pencils until one day I found one. Spent days studying its purpose before my memory circuit kicked in. Felt quiet silly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试过忘了自己已经不记得铅笔是什么，直到有一天我找到一根。在记忆恢复前，我花了好几天来研究它的作用。感觉挺蠢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016082_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how I can stop the Think Tank?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么做才能阻止思想体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brain told me the Think Tank needs to be stopped. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的大脑告诉我必须要阻止那些思想体，你能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I recall... I had a plan that was working, eh, whatever it was. I don't think it reached fruition. I would recall fruit if it had happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我想想…我似乎有一个能奏效的计划，呃，之类的。但我想这个计划没能有结果。如果有结果的话，我应该能想起“果实”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't trying to kill them, just keep them out of trouble. What was that plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想要杀死他们，只想让他们别再惹麻烦。计划到底是什么来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blast! I probably... uh... wrote it down on the... floor somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了！我大概…呃…把它写在了…某处的地板上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001607f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm going to kill you after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我还是打算杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Oh... you're not thinking about doing it, you are going to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？哦…你不只是想想，你要付诸实践了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016099_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, intriguing. I've never been killed before. Although after that time I got that phlegmy discharge in my biogel... I wished I had been.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，有意思，我从来没有被杀过。虽然那次我的生物凝胶流出痰液的时候…我就想死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001441f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if there's going to be killing, I defer to your expertise in this matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果非打不可，那么在这个问题上我会尊重你的专业意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001441f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How should we begin? Engineered viruses? Canceratic beams? Atomics? Electrocutioning? Or... should I summon my minions...? Yes, my minions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从哪里开始？改造病毒？癌变射线？核武器？电刑？还是说…我该召集我的仆从？没错，我的仆从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001441f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sonic Emitter should be sterilized and more than enough for you to encircle your warm hands around, cradling it gently with your finger muscles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：声波发射器已经仔细消毒过了。你完全可以用你温热的小手拿起它，用手指轻柔的抚弄它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O... I think it wants a combustion pistol.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*哦…我想它要的是那种需要点火才能射击的手枪。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001609e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -A GUN! Are you MAD?! We can't give it a GUN! GUNS kill, leave big open holes in you that are like sores but WORSE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-枪！你疯了吗？！绝不能让它拿枪！枪能杀人，能在你身上开个大洞，就像溃疡一样，甚至比溃疡更糟。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b3_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: There's no "maybe." It can't. Right now. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. 8 is correct. We already have given the teddy bear a lethal sonic death ray filled with his sonic ejaculate and sterilized by my soft WooWOOing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我支持8博士。我们已经给了小泰迪一把声波发射器，一把能发出致命声波射线的武器，并且也经过了我雷达温柔的“喔哦哦呜呜”消毒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Abraxo is Fallout's world cleanser, like powdered Draino. Yum. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Giving the teddy bear a gun would be the equivalent of following a glass of hemlock with an Abraxo chaser. Delicious and redundantly deadly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给泰迪熊一支枪，就像喝了杯烈性毒芹汁之后，再灌盒阿伯莱萨清洁剂。美味又致命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Abraxo is Fallout's world cleanser, like powdered Draino. Yum. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF WE'RE GOING TO BRING THE SOCRATIC METHOD INTO IT, FINE. GIVE THE LOBOTO-BEAR A COMBUSITON GUN. BOROUS? DON'T YOU HAVE SOMETHING LIKE THAT?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：如果非要搞苏格拉底式反诘法，好吧，那就给这只无脑熊它要的火器。鲍鲁斯？记得你有这种东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Are you MAD?! We can't give it a GUN! GUNS...-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-你也疯了吗？！绝不能让它拿枪！枪会…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -...wait, I said that already. Yes, I have THE Cyberdog Gun. With the little floppy metal ears and the curious nose sensor. Here.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -…等等，我说过这件事了。对了，我是有支装在赛博犬上的枪，长着小金属耳朵和灵敏的鼻子探测器。在这呢，给。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FINE. DONE. THAT GUN MAKES ME UNCOMFORTABLE ANYWAY, ALWAYS WORRIED ITS GOING TO HUMP MY CHASSIS. ANYTHING ELSE, LOBOTOMITE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：很好，这件事就这样吧。那把枪我不爽很久了，总担心它会顶起我的底盘。还有什么其他事，无脑人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Top shelf ammunition. Let's see... hollow point, that's worthless but tasty... oh, and here's some Jay-F-Pee. As if bullets need jackets.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-顶级的弹药。我找找看…空尖弹，便宜又好用…哦，居然有些被甲平头弹（JFP）。就跟子弹也得穿夹克似的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The JFP might make it ill and poop a lot, but when you're hungry, you're hungry.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -被甲平头弹（JFP），吃了可能会让它生病，然后大量排便。但你饿了的时候，就饿了不是吗。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They certainly did. Batteries for my vib... vivisectors... would always come up short right before climax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：确实。我的震动…解剖器总是在准备到高潮前没电。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I think Wattz manufactured holodisks. Or was it holotapes? Never can keep those two straight. Anyway, we're out of small energy cells. Dala.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我认为是瓦特兹公司制造了全息磁盘。又或者是全息磁带？总是分不清它们。不管怎样，我们能量电池都用完了。达拉。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160bb_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying he has some energy cells, although he's reluctant to admit it, since he uses them for, um, bad things. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You have some? Why do... actually, never mind, I don't even want to know.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你说你有些电池？你是怎么…算了，当我没问，我一点也不想知道。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And no, I don't want to handle your batteries. Just... pass them on to the Lobotomite yourself.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *另外，我也不想碰你的电池。我…你还是自己把电池递给无脑人吧。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160bd_2.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying "okay." EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Are you... echoing what he said, or... are you asking for real?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你…是在附和他，还是说…你真真的在询问？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's asking, yes. Dr. Klein, there are many other personalities. If you recall, you hurled them off the Sink balcony after your argument with Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：是的，他是在询问。克莱因博士，还有另外一些人格芯片。不知你是否还记得，某次和莫比乌斯博士争吵后，你把它们从汇聚节点的阳台上全扔了出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT IS NOT AN ARGUMENT IF ONE IS CLEARLY RIGHT AND THE OTHER IS CLEARLY WRONG!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：如果其中一个人完全正确，另一个人却错的离谱，你就不该将其称为争吵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I REMEMBER NOW. YES, LOBOTOMITE, THERE ARE OTHER CHIPS. IF YOU WANT, FIND THEM. I BELIEVE THEY ARE STORED ON HOLOTAPES IN MANY OF OUR FACILITIES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我想起来了。没错，无脑人，还有其他的芯片，你想要就去找吧。它们都存储在全息磁带里，你能在各个不同的研究设施里找到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BUT YOU SHOULD STAY OUT OF THOSE - NO EXPLORING AND DISCOVERING THINGS. THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE" SHOULD BE ENOUGH FOR YOUR... HEH... NEEDS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我奉劝你远离那些，无关探索和发现的东西。汇聚节点的主"智能"单元应该足以满足你的…哼…需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather have a good old-fashioned gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿要把传统意义上的好枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] WHAT DID IT SAY? SPIT "LEAD?" WHAT, LIKE PENCILS?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：它说什么？能射出"铅块"的东西？比如说铅笔？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001609c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sonic gun looks like an energy projectile. Got anything that spits lead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这声波枪看上去是射能量束的。有没有什么能射铅块的武器给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 克莱因：不。给你的还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001609d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I just go back upstairs and to the main circular console?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我只要回楼上，找那个圆形的主控台就行了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. SIMPLY... SPEAK TO IT. WITH VERBAL WORDS TRANSMITTING IN AN OPEN AIR MEDIUM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：没错。只要…对它说话就行。让语音信息在空气介质中传输。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THERE IS NO MORE WE CAN DO TO AID YOU AND OUR PATIENCE LEVELS ARE DEPLETED. NOW GO. REST IN THE SINK IF YOU MUST. BUT LEAVE US TO OUR RESEARCH.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经没有什么可以帮你了。我们的耐心水平也已耗尽。赶紧走吧，有需要可以在汇聚节点休息。别再来打扰我们研究了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one of these chips, huh? Guess they're rare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就一块芯片，哈？它一定非常稀罕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] ARE THERE OTHER CHIPS?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：还有别的人格芯片吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This chip looks like it was mass-produced. Are there other chips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这块芯片看起来是量产的，还有其他的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] RARE? I GUESS. MIGHT BE MORE SOMEWHERE, I FORGET. I MEAN... SUCH KNOWLEDGE IS ENCRYPTED DEEP IN MY DATABANKS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 克莱因：罕见吗？也许吧。可能还有别的芯片，只是我忘了。我是说…这些知识在我的数据库中被深度加密了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, having a store available would be helpful... it has a store connection right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有个商店能用总是有帮助的…它连接了一个商店，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So just plug it into the circular map-thing in the Sink upstairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以把芯片插进楼上汇聚节点那圆形地图一样的机器里就行了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. YOU MAY NEED TO WIGGLE IT IN A BIT, BUT DON'T FORCE IT. WE CAN'T RE-CODE THEM IF YOU BREAK IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：没错。可能要你稍微拧一下，但别用太大劲。弄坏了，我们也没法重编一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THERE IS NO MORE WE CAN DO TO AID YOU AND OUR PATIENCE LEVELS ARE DEPLETED. NOW GO. REST IN THE SINK IF YOU MUST. BUT LEAVE US TO OUR RESEARCH.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经没有什么可以帮你了。我们的耐心水平也已耗尽。赶紧走吧，有需要可以在汇聚节点休息。别再来打扰我们研究了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Uh, if you're done, can we move again? My biogel's starting to crampagulate.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*呃，没别的事的话，我们能动了吗？我的生物凝胶都要开始扭成一团了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OF COURSE. GO MAN YOUR SCIENCE STATIONS. GO! I AM SURROUNDED BY CHILDREN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：不然怎样。回你的研究岗位上去。快去！没一个懂事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just spit it out before you bore me to death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在烦死我之前，你最好能说出点什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening, let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在听，你说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... these have been sterilized, too, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…这些也消过毒了，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So these will work in the Sonic Emitter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这些会作用于声波发射器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice. This should be enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这应该够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use some more... energy... stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些…能…用来充能的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] HMMM. YES, I BELIEVE WATTZ ELECTRONICS TENDED TO MAKE THE BATTERY SHELF LIFE ON THE LOW END.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：嗯，好吧。我觉得瓦特兹电子公司故意把电池寿命做得越来越低。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Energy Cells have a high expenditure rate. Some extra reserve cells could offset that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能量电池的消耗率很高。准备些额外的备用电池可以抵消该影响。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]克莱因：不。我们拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this gun all? Uh, can't have enough guns, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这把枪？呃，可以再多给些，真的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] FINE. BOROUS, MORE AMMO. THE GOOD STUFF.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：好吧，鲍鲁斯，要更多的弹药，高质量的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, this gun looks really hungry. I'd like to make sure it gets fed lots of bullets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这把枪看起来饿坏了。我得用更多的弹药才能喂饱它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 克莱因：不。给你的还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a shit what you have to say. Tell me why you hauled me here. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的我他妈的一点也不关心。你们把我拖到这里到底想干嘛，快说！

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT RESPONSE SEEMED DEMANDING, AS IF CUTTING TO THE CASE. UH... CHASE. HOW SURGICAL. REMINDS ME OF...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：它似乎是在表达某种强烈的要求，想要直奔…主题。像外科手术般精确，让我想起了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: These technologies seem more useful... medically, somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某种程度上说，这些技术似乎更具…医学价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] HEAL YOU? WHAT, PUT YOU BACK TOGETHER LIKE SOME GIANT HARD-BOILED YUMYUM DEVILED EGG?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 治好你？怎么做，把你的身体部分都放回去，像只巨型恶魔美味芥末蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : (YumYum is a specific brand of deviled egg in Fallout.) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cardiac, spinal, and brainwave aspects of this tech... couldn't they heal me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这里有心率，脊椎和脑波方面的技术…有了它们难道还不能治好我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] WHATEVER. THE ONLY MEDICINE MOBIUS WILL NEED IS A RESUSCITATOR AFTER WE... YOU... BREAK IN THERE.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 怎么想随你。在我们…在你…突入禁区以后，莫比乌斯唯一需要的医疗品就只有呼吸机了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's actually not the conclusion I would have drawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是我会得出的结论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] BIOLOGICAL? PFF. RIDICULOUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 生物学？天马行空，无稽之谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't these items seem more... biologically-focused than that, though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但比起那些，这些技术看起来不是更具…生物学意义吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] WHATEVER. I'M AFTER RESULTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不管了，我只追求结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then there's no time to waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别浪费时间了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I go after him, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到他，然后呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE DOOR SHOULD BE UN-SEALED. NOW, INSTEAD OF BEING SUBJECTED TO THREATS, WE CAN NOW SEND AN EQUALLY THREATENING MESSAGE TO MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大门应该已经打开了。如今，我们不用再受制于莫比乌斯的威胁。相反，我们可以给他发送对等的恐吓信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND THAT MESSAGE IS SCIENCE! DELIVER THIS MESSAGE, AND BIG MT SHALL BE FREED FROM MOBIUS' REIGN OF TERROR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那信息就是科学！传达了这条信息，大山脉就能摆脱莫比乌斯的恐怖统治，重获自由！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: UM, YOU CAN GO NOW. THAT'S YOUR CUE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你可以走了。该你出场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LET ME CHECK SOMETHING... OF COURSE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看…就是它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I HAVE IT. THE OVERRIDE SEQUENCE TO OPEN THE FORBIDDEN ZONE DOOR IS HIDDEN IN THE SCHEMATICS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了。开启禁区大门的覆写序列就藏在这些图纸之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL, NOT HIDDEN, IT'S ACTUALLY RIGHT THERE, BEHIND THE PROGRAMMING EQUIVALENT OF COFFEE STAINS...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，没被藏起来。实际上它就在这儿，在这段咖啡渍似的程序后面…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT'S EMBEDDED IN WHAT SEEMS TO BE RECURSIVE CODE... IT'S BADLY COMMENTED, THERE AND THERE... OH, AND NULL POINTERS. VERY SLOPPY, MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它被嵌套在像是一段递归代码里…这里和这里，都注解得好糟糕…哦，竟然还有空指针。莫比乌斯，你还真是马虎啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ef_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU SEE, USING THE ANTENNA TO BOOST THE EMITTER'S SONIC FREQUENCY, AND THE STEALTH SUIT TO BYPASS THE FORBIDDEN ZONE LOCK... YES, THAT COULD WORK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，使用天线来加强声波发射器的频率，使用潜行甲来解开禁区的锁…没错，这应该可行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ef_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WAS THAT MY PLAN? IT MUST HAVE BEEN. SOMETIMES I TRULY SURPRISE MYSELF. THE DOOR IS OPEN... AND NOW, MOBIUS WILL GET HIS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的计划吗？理所当然是的。有时候我真的会让我自己都惊叹。禁区的大门即将打开…马上，莫比乌斯就会得到他应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ef_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I MEAN, TECHNICALLY, THESE ITEMS COULD ALL BE USED TO PUT YOU BACK TOGETHER ONCE YOU HAD YOUR BRAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，从技术上讲，在你取回你的大脑后，这几件物品也能用来把你的器官拼回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BUT FOR NOW, THEY CAN BE USED IN THE NAME OF AGGRESSION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但此时此刻，它们显然更适用于进攻和战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you remember what other biological effects the other items had?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得其他物品有什么生物学功能么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I'm waiting for you to draw a conclusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我在等你下结论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'M THINKING. THIS IS ALL VERY COMPLICATED.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在思考。它太复杂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the suit's a cardiac regulator, and the sonic frequency is a spinal vibrator?
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行甲原本是个心率调节器，而声波发射器是脊椎颤振器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'VE GOT IT. THE CARDIAC REGULATOR IN THE SUIT, THE ANTENNA FOR BRAINWAVES, AND THE SONIC FREQUENCY FOR THE VERTEBRAL NERVES...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂了，潜行装甲是为了里面的心率调节器，天线可以用于脑电波，声波发射器的频率可以用于脊椎神经…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016102_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These devices all seem very scientific. Very.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些设备看起来都很科学，非常的科学。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] YES, THAT'S WHAT I BELIEVE I SAID.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 是的，我想这就是我说过的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, the antenna focuses brainwave patterns, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，这个天线可以集中脑电波的形态，对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] PLEASE LET ME THINK. THIS MAKES MY BRAIN HURT.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 容我再想想，伤脑筋啊…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let you think it over, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你想清楚再给我回复。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The antenna looks like it could break things beyond repair. Maybe it could break in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这根天线看起来破坏力很强，应该能打烂禁区的大门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] SO YOU'RE SAYING... IT'S THE X-2 ARRAY, NOT THE ANTENNA I SHOULD BE EXAMINING? THAT WAS... MOST LIKELY MY PLAN, YES.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你是说…我该检查的是X-2的阵列，而不是那根天线？这…跟我设想的一样，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The antenna, any chance it was damaged, or broke the X-2 array once removed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那根天线，有没有可能它坏了，或者在被摘走后弄坏了X-2的天线阵列？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] YES, YES, THE ANTENNA CAN DO DAMAGE...
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 对，对，天线能用来搞破坏…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...AND IT DID DO DAMAGE, ONCE YOU REMOVED IT FROM X-2. WAS THAT MY PLAN? IT MUST HAVE BEEN.
ESP.TRADUIT: …它也确实造成了破坏，一旦你从X-2拔了它。那是我的计划吗？应该是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think the X-13 sneaky suit can slip in and get to Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: X-13潜行甲能自己溜进禁区，找到莫比乌斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I SUPPOSE IT COULD. IF IT COULD BE QUIET FOR MORE THAN A FEW MOMENTS, ALWAYS TALKING, TOUCHING THINGS...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 也许可以，但前提是那个叽叽喳喳，情感过剩的家伙能把嘴闭上那么几小时…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...HMMM. IT DOES HAVE AN INTERFACE DISRUPTOR WEAVE AGAINST ELECTRONICS. LIKE THE FORBIDDEN ZONE DOOR.
ESP.TRADUIT: …嗯，它内置的交互干扰器确实能对付电子设备，比如禁区的大门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160fe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would the suit's dampening abilities allow me to sneak into the Forbidden Zone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行装的消音功能可以帮助我潜入禁区？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO, THAT'S TOO EASY. AND IT WOULDN'T WORK BY ITSELF. IT'S... SLIGHTLY CO-DEPENDENT.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不，没那么简单。而且它不能自己动的，它需要…依附在人身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the new frequency for the Sonic Emitter can blast open the Forbidden Zone door lock, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许声波发射器的新频率能爆开禁区的门锁，或者…？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] ITS RANGE IS LIMITED, AND IT WOULD NEED A BOOSTER OF SOME SORT, A... CARRIER, BUT...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 它的范围有限，还需要一个加压放大器之类的东西，某种…载体，但是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016100_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the frequency in the Sonic Emitter's a sonic key of sorts? Like an electronic lockpick?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能声波发射器里的频率会是个声波密钥？类似电子开锁器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] IF THAT WAS THE CASE, I'D USE AN ATOMIC KEY ON THE DOOR AND BE DONE WITH IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 这要行得通的话，我早就做了把原子钥匙，然后早早把这事了结了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016101_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to advance my boot into your voice module if you don't give me some solid data.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你如果提取不出什么可靠数据，看我不踢爆了你的发声模块。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you have me get them if you don't know how they would help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你都不知道这是干什么的，干嘛还让我去回收它们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you even know what these technologies do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连它们干什么用的都不知道？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I KNOW HOW THESE TECHNOLOGIES WORK. OF COURSE I KNOW.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道它们的用途。我当然知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF YOU REMEMBER, WE DESCRIBED THEM IN CLEARLY ABSTRACT CONTRADICTORY STATEMENTS BEFORE. WHY WOULD WE DO THAT IF WE WEREN'T CERTAIN ON...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该记得，之前我们清晰明了地描述过它们，它们的作用非此即彼。这说明我们不可能不知道它们…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...ON HOW TO USE THEM, YES. SO LET ME... HMM, A BIT, I... I'LL FIGURE IT OUT.
ESP.TRADUIT: …怎么使用，对。所以让我…嗯，一小会儿，我…我马上就能搞清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ed_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Yes..." what?
ESP.TRADUIT: "对…"什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: NO... I MEAN YES. JUST NEED TO ANALYZE THESE TECHNOLOGIES FOR A MOMENT. THEY ARE EXTREMELY ADVANCED, YOU KNOW.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不对…我是说，对。我只是需要些时间去分析这些技术。你也知道，它们非常先进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么不对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your answer isn't filling me with confidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的回答没什么说服力啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, glad that you received the schematics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，很高兴你得到了图纸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do these technologies have the information you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些技术里有你要的信息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So genius, what now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么大天才，接下来呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. HMMM. AH, YES. YESSS... YES... AH. HMMM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，嗯嗯，啊，对，对…没错…啊，嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would Mobius want my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么莫比乌斯想要我的大脑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY DOES HE SEEK OUR DESTRUCTION? WHY DID HE BUILD ROBOT SCORPIONS WITH INTELLIGENCE-DRAINING STINGERS?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他想消灭我们？为什么他要造出带有“降智”尾刺的机械蝎？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT IS BECAUSE HE HASN'T CLEANED HIS BIOGEL IN... A LONG TIME. CLEARLY, HE'S GOT SOME SORT OF PSYCHOLOGICAL CORROSION. HE'S MAD.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是因为他一直没有清理他的生物凝胶…一直没有。显然，他的精神被腐蚀了。他疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said before that Mobius might have my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前说…拿走我的脑子的可能是莫比乌斯博士？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. IN ALL PROBABLE LIKELIHOODS, YES. POSSIBLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。在所有的可能中，这个的可能性要大些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT IT MAY HAVE GONE TO MOBIUS IS MERELY AN INKLING. I DON'T KNOW WHY, BUT IT MAY BE SOMETHING INVOLVING THE SURGERY CODE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是隐约觉得应该是莫比乌斯干的。具体为什么我也不清楚，但貌似和手术代码有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ACTUALLY, I DON'T KNOW. ALL I KNOW IS IT MISPLACED ITSELF. OR IT FLOATED OFF. THEY GET INTO ROBOTS SOMETIMES AND GO ON A TEAR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，我不知道你的大脑去哪了。我只知道它不见了，可能是被水冲走了。它们有时也会钻进机器人里，然后跑去鬼混。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about this "brain extraction" you all performed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道一些关于你做的"大脑提取"手术的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL, WE DIDN'T ACTUALLY DO IT. WE TRIED TO CLEAN UP AFTER, AS ALWAYS, BUT USUALLY THE AUTO-DOC RUNS ON REMOTE. BUT WE PROGRAMMED IT. OR, MOBIUS DID.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，事实上不是我们做的手术。我们只是惯例事后去做个清理。通常是由远程控制的自动医生主刀。但自动医生的程序是我们写的，或者说是莫比乌斯写的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: STILL, THIS NEW WRINKLE WITH THE TESLA COILS IN YOUR SKULL WAS UNEXPECTED. I MEAN WE PREDICTED WE'D HAVE A BREAK-THROUGH EVENTUALLY, BUT...
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，我们也没想到，在你颅骨的这个“褶皱”里，会多出新的特斯拉线圈。啊我的意思是，我们本来预期最后会有新的发现。但是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ec_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DALA KNOWS MORE. SHE SUPERVISED YOUR SPINE-PEEL. AND THE HEART CIRCUMCISION. THEN DUMPED THEM BOTH INTO THE TANKS IN THE SINK ABOVE. QUITE SANITARY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉比我更了解情况。她是进行剥离你脊椎操作的负责人(教母)，还有心脏移除(割礼)。最后又把它们放到贮槽里。整个过程都非常的卫生(圣洁)。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ec_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SURE TOOK HER TIME. SHE ALWAYS TAKES LONGER THAN PROJECTED WITH LOBOTOMITE SURGERIES, NOT SURE WHY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这当然费了她不少功夫。但话说回来，每到做大脑提取手术的时候，她总得比平时花更长的时间，莫名其妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000160ec_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scare them? How?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐吓他们？要怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, tell them I'm still alive, we had a nice chat, and we agree on a few things. That's true... isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，像是告诉他们我还活着，我们进行了一次很愉快的交谈，甚至还在某些事上达成了一致。毕竟事实如此嘛，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, you could kill me and lie about it. Either way, it would be interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，你也可以杀了我，然后向他们撒谎，说我还活着。不管你选哪种方式，都一定会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you are partial to lying and deception... well, you could tell them a ludicrous lie. The more over-the-top, the better, that's my experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你如果打算撒谎骗他们…好吧，那就编造一个尽可能荒谬的谎言。越荒唐越好，这是我的经验之谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're more than a little gullible. Better make it convincing, though, or it'll be the dissection table and vivisectors for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们其实还挺容易上当的。不过还是编的像话些，如果他们识破了你的谎言，你就得等着上解剖台了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you speak of me, please try and make me look good. I am Dr. Mobius, after all, not some lab assistant teacher's aide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，你要是谈到我，请尽量把我说得好些。毕竟，我可是莫比乌斯博士，不是什么给实验室助理打下手的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to make the effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there's many things they have forgotten, sitting in their bowls. Friendship. The thrill of discovery. Love. Masturbation. The usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，脑子泡在缸里，他们忘记了太多东西，像友谊、对新发现的喜悦、爱、自慰、日常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much like your brain, I am certain there is something you can spark within each of them. Memories, hormones...
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你的大脑一样，我相信一定有什么东西，能重新点燃他们的这些情感。比如说回忆、荷尔蒙…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...a wise man once said, the eyes do more than see. Make them see, if you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: …某位智者曾说过，眼睛不仅仅是用来看的。让他们看到这点吧，如果你能做到的话。（艾萨克·阿西莫夫同名科幻小说）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, if not, you can always make them succumb to fear... it certainly worked for me. For a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，如果不这样，你也可以让他们屈服于恐惧…一度，我认为这是最有效的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you came along, and bravery and/or desperation trumped that little idea. Back to the drawing board, I suppose. Or is this the end? Hard to tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到你来了，他们的勇气和绝望压倒了恐惧。于是一切仿佛又重回开始，又抑或这将是终结？我也说不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any suggestions for how to make them change their minds?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么办法能让他们改变主意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd really, really like to kill them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我真的，真的很想杀了他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm. Well, if you're determined to go down that road, so be it. They will undoubtedly switch off the pacification field when you return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好吧。既然你意已决，那就随你好了。你回去的时候，他们肯定不会再打开平静场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001610f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I could do to stop them that doesn't require violence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么方法可以兵不血刃地阻止他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... you could try and appeal to their humanity. That's a tired cliché. And really, when they were humans, they weren't very good humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个…你可以试着唤醒他们的人性。这都是些陈词滥调了。而且说真的，即使在他们还是人类的时候，他们也不算是什么好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquemobius\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016111_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't let you dissect the Mojave. Or let you leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能放任你们去解剖莫哈维。不能放你们出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES, YOU CAN. YOU DON'T REALLY HAVE AN ALTERNATIVE THAT I CAN SEE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：噢，你当然能。这件事上你根本没有别的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016110_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'M NOT GOING TO HARM IT, I'M GOING TO DISSECT IT UNTIL ITS DEAD. WHY THE SUDDEN INTERSECTION, DALA.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我们不会伤害它，只是在它完蛋前详尽地解剖一番。为什么突然打断我，达拉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... it's personal. But... I would hate if its dying screams revealed any odious personal habits I... or any of us might have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：呃…只是个人看法。但是…我怕它垂死的尖叫会暴露我…或者我们某些人的怪诞习惯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot stand a breathing, a sweet breathing organism, breathing in, and out, to suddenly not breathe. We must keep it alive. For study. Slow study.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我不能接受一个能呼吸的，贴心的，鲜活的小有机体忽然不再吸气，吐气了。我们得让它活着，好进行研究，慢慢地研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DALA, THESE... VOCALIZED PAUSES ARE... UNLIKE YOU. WHAT DO YOU CARE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：达拉，你怎么…支支吾吾的…这可不像你。你到底想说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein, um - are you sure we've calculated all the combat probabilities here? I mean, the Lobotomite confronted Mobius...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*克莱因，唔。你肯定我们计算到了这场战斗的所有可能性？要知道，这只无脑人可是从莫比乌斯那儿活着回来了…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Plus, you know, we haven't had a C-O-M-B-A-T drill in forever. I don't think we could form a tactical attack triangle if we wanted to.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *还有，你也清楚，我们从没做过任何作-战训练。我不觉得开打后，我们能顺利组成那个战术进攻阵型。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124cc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein, uh... you know, this Lobotomite, it's a great sounding board. You respect Idea-ology, right? This one's... well, it's... got good ideas.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*克莱因，呃…你知道的，这只无脑人…向它咨询总能获得很棒的回应。你一向推崇理念学，不是吗？它…呃，它…总有很好的理念。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RELEASING THE W-O-M-B-A-T WAS NOT MY PLAN, O, SO GET OFF MY VOICE BOX.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我没考虑过让这只树-袋-熊活着。O，所以你离我的音箱远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SILENCE, DR. O. THIS IS A THINK TANK DECISION. SAVE YOUR OBJECTIONS UNTIL AFTER I HAVE DECIDED OUR COURSE OF ACTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：安静，O博士。这是智库的决定。在我决定了行动方案后，不要再有异议了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You know what, Klein? Stick a straw in your tank and suck yourself. Long and deep.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你知道吗，克莱因？拿根吸管伸进罐子里吸自己脑浆吧你。插得越长越深越好。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And you know what, I don't like the way you say my name. Never did. It's "O," as in "O, look what I stepped in." I'm proud of it - all right?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*还有知道吗，我不喜欢你叫我名字的方式，一点都不喜欢。应该念"O"，就像在说“哦，看我发现了什么。”我为我的名字骄傲，好吗？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And my name is Zero - yeah, a big fat zero, with a slash through it.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*还有，我的名字是零——没错，又大又圆，带着斜杠的零。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE SLASH... AS A DESIGNATOR OF... WHY, THAT IS BRILLIANT. BUT HOW DID YOU...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：用斜线…作为标识符…太妙了。但你是怎么…？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *The Lobotomite taught me that. Taught me a name is more than... um... that I should take pride in... things. Like... names... and...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*那只无脑人教会了我这些，教会了我名字不仅仅是…唔…还是我应该为之自豪的东西，比如说…名字…和…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You know what, forget it, Klein. I hate you. And your theory of brainial beam oscillation? The Chinese had it first, you copycat!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *你知道吗，别管这些了，克莱因，我讨厌你。还有你那有关脑波振荡的理论，那是中国人先搞出来的，你个无耻的剽窃者！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HOW DARE YOU! BRAINIAL BEAM OSCILLATION WAS SOLELY MY DISCOVERY! I EXPRESSLY TOLD YOU THAT AND DELETED ALL EVIDENCE TO THE CONTRARY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：放肆！脑波振荡理论完全是我的发现！而且我之前早就告诉过你，还删除了所有不利证据！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Silencing opinionators.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我闭嘴不代表我没意见。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoco\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d7_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 suggests a plan of action. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124d9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：8，怎么连你也?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY ARE YOU ACTING LIKE THIS? YOU'VE NEVER REFUSED TO COMMIT NECESSARY... SURGERY BEFORE. AND THIS LOBOTOMITE NEEDS ITS SURGERY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么会这样？你从未拒绝…进行必要的手术。现在这只无脑人就需要进行手术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124db_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124dc_1.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124dc_2.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124dc_3.ogg

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 blanks out. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedoc8\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU? YOU SOUND... BRAIN-SCRUBBED, BLINDLY AGREEING WITH THE LOBOTOMITE. WHAT...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你到底是哪不对劲？你听起来像是…被洗脑了一样，对那无脑人言听计从的。发生什么了…？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A NOBLE SPEECH, BUT... THERE IS NO ROOM IN MY VOCABULATORS FOR "FRIEND" AND "LOBOTOMITE" IN THE SAME SENTENCE. THE VERY CONCEPT - REVOLTING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：真是精彩的辩论，可惜…我的词汇表不允许"朋友" 和"无脑人"出现在一起，这叫人反胃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PERHAPS YOU ARE IRRADIATED WITH CAMARADERIE RADIATION. WE HAVE CHEMS FOR THAT, WE CAN SAVE YOU FROM YOUR EMOTIONAL... ADDICTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你们都感染了“同志情谊”的辐射。没关系，我们有药，专治这种情感上的…瘾症。
