ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124df_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I, for one, cannot bear to let this continue.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-我，就我个人而言，我绝对不能容忍这种事情继续下去。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I don't see what is to be gained by throwing another body into our labs... especially one that has done us a service, gone where we feared to go.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我看不出继续把又一个活物扔进实验室对我们有什么好处…更何况它还曾帮助过我们，前往我们惧怕的地方。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -This Lobotomite doesn't deserve our knives. It deserves our respect. We should care for it. Feed it. Nurture it - give it the life Gabe never had.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这只无脑人不应该被解剖，它值得我们尊敬。我们应该照顾它，喂养它，培育它——给它加布没能有的生活。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -If I may, I feel as if I must be the voice of reason here.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-恕我冒昧，但这里此刻需要我理性的声音。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -This Lobotomite is much like us, regarding even animals and pets as nothing more than avenues to promote Science! There is good here.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这只无脑人和我们很像，明白动物、宠物之流只不过是科学进步的踏脚石！这点很好。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Instead of ending its life on the table, we should prolong its suffering, in the name of Science. Like good old Gabe, the FINEST of lab specimens.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -比起在手术台上结束它的生命，我们更应该延长它的痛苦，为了科学。就像亲爱的老加布，是最好的实验样本。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniquedocborous\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Klein, please. Let's see what its insides look like. Finally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：克莱因博士，拜托了。让我们看看它的内部结构吧，让我如愿以偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Klein, I must... intersect. Please... do not harm the Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：克莱因博士，我必须…打断一下。请…请不要伤害这只无脑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03femaleuniquedala\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_000124e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY AM I EVEN LISTENING TO YOU FOOLS? THE DETERMINATORS ARE GREATER THAN THE HESITATORS. SO HESITATORS, BE QUIET.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我干嘛要听你们这些蠢货的话？坚定之人胜于犹豫之人。所以犹豫者们，都把嘴闭上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012504_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY AM I EVEN LISTENING TO YOU FOOLS? ENOUGH OF THIS MUTINOUS CHORUS! IF THERE'S A WORD I HATE, IT'S "MUTINY."
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我干嘛要听你们这些蠢货的话？想合起伙来造我的反是吧！要问什么词令我最厌恶，那一定是“背叛”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012505_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND THE WORD "JISM," WHICH NEVER MADE ANY SENSE TO ME. IT'S RIDICULOUS, PUTTING "J" AND "SM" TOGETHER LIKE THAT. NONSENSE!
ESP.TRADUIT: "精液"(jism)也是，对我来说没有任何意义。荒谬的东西，把"J"和"SM"像这样组合起来，愚蠢之极！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012505_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I COUNT AS FIVE. LIKE THE MIGHTY HUMAN HAND I ONCE HAD, WITH ITS FIVE PENISES CLENCHED IN A FIST.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一个就能顶五个。就像曾经我那有力的人类大手，它的五根生殖器紧握在一个拳头里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012505_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE ARE BIGGER, SMARTER, AND FLOATIER THAN YOU, LOBOTOMITE. WE DON'T WISH TO FIGHT YOU, SO SURRENDER YOUR BRAIN. NOW.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：无脑人，我们比你更强大，更智慧，更能飘浮。但我们无意与你战斗，所以，把脑子交出来，快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00012507_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mobius and I talked it over, reached an understanding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和莫比乌斯谈过了，而且我们达成了某些共识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU ARE LYING. NO, YOU ARE NOT. YOUR HEARTBEAT, PERSPIRATION... ALL EXCESSIVELY CONFIDENT AND SURE OF YOURSELF.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在撒谎。不，你没有。你的心跳，渗出的汗…证明你现在过于自信，且得意自满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016113_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY WOULD YOU REASON WITH THAT MANIAC? HE'LL DESTROY US ALL!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能和那个疯子讲道理？他会害死我们所有人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016113_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think I killed Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为我杀了莫比乌斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. WAIT. YOU DID, DIDN'T YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。等等，你是杀了他吧，难道你没有？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016114_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may have noticed the pacification field is down. Guess what happens now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大概已经注意到平静场罢工了，猜猜看接下来会发生什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard one of the previous visitors to the Dome spoke to you, asked you some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说前不久有位来访者来穹顶拜访过你，还问了些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: HMM? OH YES, THE LAST VISITOR... WELL, THE ONE JUST BEFORE YOU. HAD AN INTERESTING NAME FROM SOME LANGUAGE THAT'S ALMOST UNPOSSIBLE TO SPEAK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，是的，上一个拜访者…想起来了，在你之前那个。}他的名字很有趣，取自某种已经几乎没人能说的语言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016112_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT DID WE SPEAK ABOUT...? MELANCHOLY FELLOW, HAD QUESTIONS ABOUT... HISTORY? BUT...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们聊了什么来着…？那个忧郁的家伙问我有关…历史的问题？但…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016112_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OUR CONVERSATION GOT INTERRUPTED... TWICE, I BELIEVE? ONCE WHEN THE TRAINS GOT DERAILED, AND THEN A SECOND TIME...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的谈话被打断了…两次，大概吧？第一次是在列车脱轨时，然后第二次…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016112_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...ODDLY ENOUGH, NOW THAT I'M ACCESSING MY DATABANKS, I DON'T RECALL WHAT THE SECOND TIME WAS. MOBIUS' INCESSANT TRANSMISSIONS KEEP DISTRACTING ME.
ESP.TRADUIT: …真奇怪，我的数据库竟然检索不到第二次的记录，一定是因为莫比乌斯不停发送的信息干扰了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016112_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALSO, WE DIDN'T BRAIN-SCRUB THE VISITOR. HE MAY HAVE LEFT WITH SOME KNOWLEDGE HE SHOULDN'T'VE. I BELIEVE. MAYBE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我们没有擦除他的记忆，因此他可能带走了一些不该带走的知识。我猜…大概。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016112_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH WELL, I'M SURE IT'S OF NO CONSEQUENCE. I DON'T MAKE MANY MISTAKES IN CALCULATION OR PERCEPTION, SO PROBABILITY FAVORS ME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，我肯定这无关紧要。我的演算与推测极少出错，因此，一定是因为这对我有利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016112_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can bring the Mojave, this world to you. You'll be safe, and you'll still be able to experiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把莫哈维废土，这个世界带到你们面前。这样你不但安全，还能继续进行实验。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can still do that... here, quietly, for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仍可以做实验…不过得为了我，在这里，安安静静的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: FOR YOU? AND FOR SCIENCE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了你？也为了科学？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001611f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I HAVE A STRANGE SENSATION... THAT I WOULD LIKE THAT. HOW... ODD.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有种奇怪的感觉…觉得自己会喜欢这样的关系，这…真古怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001611f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: VERY WELL... PARTNER. THE THINK TANK IS AT YOUR SERVICE. AS LONG AS YOU DO NOT DESTROY US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好…伙伴，我们会和你合作。思想体随时乐意效劳，只要你不消灭我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001611f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you willing to risk it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意冒这个险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] THAT SOUNDS LIKE SOMETHING MOBIUS WOULD SAY.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 这种说话的口气确实是莫比乌斯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016125_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016125_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You FOOLS had best listen. Or MOBIUS will bring his army here, to sting you STUPID.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些蠢蛋最好乖乖听话，不然莫比乌斯会派他的大军到这儿，把你们全蛰成傻子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] MOBIUS DOES NOT FORM ALLIANCES. HE WAS A TERRIBLE LAB PARTNER, AND HE WOULD MAKE A WORSE ALLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 莫比乌斯不会和人结盟。他是个糟糕透顶的实验室搭档，更是一个糟糕的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016126_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He offers a deal - stay here, stay put, and he'll let you live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有个提议，你们乖乖待在这里，他就放你们一条生路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT'S NO DEAL AT ALL! THERE'S A WHOLE WORLD BEYOND THE CRATER... FILLED WITH IDEAS AND POSSIBILITIES!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件事上我们绝不会妥协！一个全新的世界就在这环形坑之外…一整个充满各种理念和可能性的世界！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016120_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE COULD HAVE ESCAPED, SEEN IT ALL FOR OURSELVES. TESTED IT, PRODDED AT IT. MADE IT SQUIRM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以逃出去，亲眼目睹它的全貌，亲手测试它，刺激它，让它蠕动起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016120_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Do you think I killed Mobius? No, he lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 你以为我杀了莫比乌斯？不，他还活着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU MUST HAVE KILLED HIM. HE WOULDN'T HAVE JUST LET YOU WALK IN, TAKE YOUR BRAIN... WOULD HE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定已经杀了他。他不会就这样放你进去，拿回你的脑子…他会么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001611e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NO... SOMETHING IS WRONG. YOUR PERSPIRATION... HEARTBEAT... ALL TELL A DIFFERENT STORY, I THINK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…有什么不对劲。你的汗液…心跳…都在表明事情是另一个样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001611e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Science provided a way, Klein.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科学提供的是途径，克莱因。（不是目的）

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你所言不虚。而且这种说话时的分贝变化…的确是莫比乌斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016123_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016123_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing is unpossible for SCIENCE! Mesons, lasers, atoms, brainwaves... all are at MY command!
ESP.TRADUIT: 科学无所不能！介子，镭射，原子，脑波…尽在我的掌控！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] "A WAY" IS CORRECT. AS IS, "AWAY." WHICH IS WHERE YOUR BODY IS GOING ONCE WE'RE DONE PEELING YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] "一种途径(a way)"用的很好，就像在说"分离(away)"。等我们剥掉你的皮，你就真的“分离”了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016124_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's plenty of medical ways to pull off that... stunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 许多医疗技术都能完成这一…绝技(stunt)。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你所言不虚。而且这种说话时的分贝变化…的确是莫比乌斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016121_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016121_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: COUNTLESS brain extraction surgeries exist... but only one IMPLANTATION one - from MOBIUS!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑提取成功的手术数不胜数…但植入成功的却只有一例 – 来自莫比乌斯的案例！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] "STUNT" IS CORRECT. AS IS, "SHUNT." WHICH YOU WILL BE INTIMATELY FAMILIAR WITH AS WE'RE DISSECTING YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] "stunt"这词恰如其分，就像在说"分解(shunt)"，因为我们马上就要解剖你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016122_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mobius and I... we... formed an alliance. Sort of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯和我…我们…结盟了，之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] THAT IS THE MOST INSANE THING I'VE EVER HEARD. THERE IS NO WAY MOBIUS WOULD... CONDESCEND TO STEP INSIDE YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]这是我听过的最疯狂的事情，莫比乌斯他绝不会屈尊纡贵，寄居在你的体内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016127_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: BESIDES, THERE IS NO WAY SUCH A THING COULD BE ACCOMPLISHED. IT'S UNPOSSIBLE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，迄今没有任何一种技术能实现这件事，这不可能办到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016127_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> You think I am the Lobotomite...? No, for my skull houses the BRAIN OF MOBIUS!
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 你以为我还是原来那只无脑人吗…？你错了，现在这颅骨里装的可是莫比乌斯的脑子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] MOBIUS DOES NOT FORM ALLIANCES. HE WAS A TERRIBLE LAB PARTNER, AND HE WOULD MAKE A WORSE ALLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 莫比乌斯不会和人结盟。他是个糟糕透顶的实验室搭档，也会是个糟糕的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03maleuniqueklein\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_00016128_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm okay. Talk to you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没事了，下次再聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back any time you want a drink. Or to get... clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感到口渴，或者…想清洁一下，请随时回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\oldworldblues.esm\nvdlc03sinkvoicesinkfemale\nvdlc03dia_nvdlc03dialogue_0001634a_1.ogg
